GSP31yuktdipu:659: tasmāt ko 'tra hetuḥ anyatra pramāṇamihaivaitadapramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati hiṃsāto dharma iti
GSP31yuktdipu:672: ubhayābhidhānācchāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti cet syānmatam tadeva śāstramahiṃsāmāha, tadeva hiṃsām /
GSP31yuktdipu:677: sāmānye hi śāstramahiṃsāmutsṛjya viśeṣe kratulakṣaṇe 'pavādaṃ śāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:679: tadyathā - dadhi brāhmaṇebho dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:683: yathā khalvapi śāsre pratiṣiddhaṃ kanyāgamanamiti nedānīmabhirūpaḥ pratigṛhya, tāmabhigamyādharmabhāgbhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:692: kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmānna vayaṃ vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratyācakṣmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:693: no khalvapi brūmaḥ śāstracoditāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ pravartamānasyāniṣṭaphalasambandho bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:694: kintarhi sati svargaprāptinimittatve vedavihitasya karmaṇaḥ samanuṣṭhānaṃ prāṇijamupaghātamantareṇa na sambhavati iti hitakāmairabhyupekṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:695: yasmāt na hyetaduktaṃ yadanyeṣāmupaghātenātmānugrahaḥ kārya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:710: yadi cānuśravikasya praśasyatā nābhipretā syāt prakarṣapratyayānupapattiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:720: satrādvimucyate, mṛtyunā ca /” punarapyāha “kurvanneveha karmāṇi jijīviṣecchataṃ samāḥ /” tasmādāmaraṇāt karmaṇāmatyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:724: teṣāṃ cāsvābhāvikatvāt aśakyamarjanaṃ prayogataḥ pūrvaṃ kartumiti pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:727: yatra hetuśāstrayorvipratipattirbhavati tatra vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādanumānasya balīyaḥ śāstramityavaśayamabhyupagantavyamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:733: sannagnihotrāyāgnihotraṃ na juhoti tameṣā devatāparuṇaddhyasmāllokādamuṣmāccobhābhyām /” tasmādanityāni karmāṇi /
GSP31yuktdipu:741: yadi punaḥ karmāṇi nityakartavyatayeṣyante tena sannyāsaśāstraṃ hīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:749: yathaiva karmaṇāṃ samanuṣṭhānaṃ śāsti śāstraṃ tathā sannyāsamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:751: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:752: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
GSP31yuktdipu:754: na karmaṇā mṛtyumṛṣayo niṣeddhuḥ prajāvanto draviṇamicchamāṇāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:756: brāhmaṇaṃ cātra bhavati- “tadya idaṃ viduḥ, ye ceme 'raṇyāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:758: arciṣo harahna āpūryamāṇapakṣamāpūryamāṇapakṣādyānṣaḍudaṅḍeti māsāṃstānmāsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarādādityamādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'māṇavaḥ sa etān brahma gamayati /” punarapyāha- “etameva
GSP31yuktdipu:759: viditvā munirbhavati, etameva pravrājino lokamicchantaḥ pravrajanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:760: etaddha sma vai pūrve vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ nākāmayanta, prajayā kiṃ kariṣyāmo
GSP31yuktdipu:761: yeṣāṃ nāyamātmā nāyaṃ loka iti te ha sma putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ carantīti /” tasmādete tyāgasannyāsayorubhayorliṅgam /
GSP31yuktdipu:762: āha - yadyapyevaṃ śāstraṃ tathāpi samanuṣṭhāne vidhirasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:765: tasmin sati samanuṣṭhānaṃ jyāyo na tyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:768: yo hi vidhyarthena liṅā loṭā kṛtyairvāpūrvopadeśaḥ kriyate sa vidhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:772: / tasya tu vihitasya prarocanārthaṃ yā stutiḥ so 'rthavādaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:774: “vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva tena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati, sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati” iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:775: evaṃvidhāṃ hi stutimupaśrutya phalārthine hi yajamānāya vidhiḥ prarocate /
GSP31yuktdipu:778: evaṃ cenmanyase yamāmnāyaḥ śreyāṃsamarthaṃ manyate, taṃ prarocanāya stauti tathā sannyāsasiddhiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:782: yadi khalvapyarthavādaḥ stuvannapi na prarocayet yaduktaṃ prarocanārtho 'rthavāda iti tadbhavadbhirhāpitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:785: yadi prarocanārthatvamasya neṣyate tena tarhyarthāntaraṃ vaktavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:790: ihāyamāmnāyo vidheyatvena vā sannyāsaṃ stūyāt avidheyatvena vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:794: yaddhi kartavyatayā neṣṭaṃ tadapuruṣabuddhipūrvakaḥ svatantraḥ puruṣaniśśreyasārthaṃ pravartamāna āmnāyaḥ kimiti prarocayeta ?
GSP31yuktdipu:798: abhūtārthena vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvadbhūtārthena prarocayati tathā satyamṛtatvaprāpakasya sannyāsasyāparigrahe viṣayārāgādanyo heturvaktavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:800: kasmāt ? na hyetadyuktaṃ yadaśreyasi mārge pramāṇabhūta āmnāyo mātṛmodakanyāyenehitārthinaḥ prāṇinaḥ pratārayet /
GSP31yuktdipu:804: tathā ca śābarāḥ paṭhanti grāmagamanaṃ bhavataḥ śobhanamityatrāntareṇa vidhiṃ stutireva devadattaṃ grāmagamanāya prarocayatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:806: yadi khalvapi kiñcit satyaṃ kiñcidanṛtaṃ brūyādvedaḥ tathā sati pauruṣeyavākyavadvedavākye 'pi āśaṃkā prasajyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:813: anupalambhādadoṣa iti cet syāccaivaṃ yadyasau vidhirupalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:821: itikartavyatānupadeśāt sannyāsānupapattiriti cet- athāpi syādyadi sannyāsamapyāmnāyo vidheyaṃ manyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:822: tena yathā gārhasthyasyetikartavyatāṃ bhāryodvahanādikāṃ mantravadupadiśati tathā sannyāsamapyupadiśet
GSP31yuktdipu:828: tatra kiṃ śāstramupadekṣyati ? yāvatī khalvitikartavyatā sannyāsāṅgaṃ tāmupadiśati śāstram
GSP31yuktdipu:829: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “tapaḥśraddhe ye hyupavasanti araṇye śāntā vidvāṃso bhaikṣacaryā carantaḥ sūryadvāreṇa te virajasaḥ prayānti yatrāmṛtaḥ sa puruṣo 'vyayātmā /” tatra tapaḥśraddhe ye hyapavasantītyenaṃ śraddhayopetaṃ yamaniyamalakṣaṇaṃ dharmamāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:832: vidvāṃsa iti pūrvarātrāpararātrādiṣu kāleṣvanirviṇṇasya yogino jñānābhyāsam /
GSP31yuktdipu:846: kasmāt ? atyantābhāvaparyāyo hi kṣaya iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:851: yāni hi yajeraṅgāni paśupuroḍāśādīni tāni parimitāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:852: parimitānāṃ sādhanānāṃ tantvādīnāṃ parimitaṃ kāryaṃ paṭādi dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:858: yadi punaḥ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ karmākṣayaphalaṃ syāt sa punarāvṛttyabhāvāt prāṇināṃ nopalabhyeta
GSP31yuktdipu:861: vayaṃ,yacchabda āha tadasmākaṃ pramāṇam /” sa cāsya hetoramṛtatvamāha
GSP31yuktdipu:869: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “atha ye ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte
GSP31yuktdipu:875: ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilā māṣā iti jāyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:876: tato vai yo 'nnamati yo retaḥ siñcati sa bhūya eva bhavatīti /”
GSP31yuktdipu:880: evaṃ sati parasparavirodhinorarthayoścoditatvāt ubhayānugrahāsambhave sati śāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:887: evamihāpi nāsti sambhavaḥ yadeko 'rtho nityaśca syādanityaśceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:889: tadvaditaratrāpīti cet syānmatam- yathaiva bhavatā nityānityayorekatrāsambhavānnityatvasya
GSP31yuktdipu:890: bhaktyā kalpanā kṛtā tathaivānityatvasyāpi kariṣyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:893: vināśe hi bhaktyā kalpyamāne sarvapramāṇavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:897: na tu nityatve bhaktyā kalpyamāne doṣo 'yamupadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:901: yathā khalvapyamṛtaṃ vā mṛtamatijīvo mā te hāsiṣurasavaḥ śarīramityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:905: nātyantāya mṛtyuṃ tarati, kintarhi prakṛṣṭaṃ kālam /
GSP31yuktdipu:909: āha, atiśayayoga idānīmasya hetoḥ kathamanumātavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:911: yatra hi kriyā sakṛt pravartate yatra cāsakṛdāvartate tatrātiśayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:920: devatāṅgabhāvagamanāt kṣayātiśayānupapattiriti cet- athāpi syāt yo hi yajñe dravyamātrasya sādhanabhāvamanumanyate taṃ prati
GSP31yuktdipu:932: yadi dravyasamavāyinīṃ devatāmupalabhya tadaṅgabhāvagamanādakṣayo niratiśayaśca heturavāpyate itīṣṭaṃ vaḥ, tena tarhi yadvā tadvā vedoktaṃ karma kṛtvā śakyo 'vāptumarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:933: kiṃ prāṇivināśahetubhiḥ kratubhiḥ ? katham ? na hi kiṃcitkarma vidyate yatra śarīrasyāṅgabhāvo na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:934: sarvadevatāmayaṃ ca śarīraṃ yasmādāha tasmādvai vidvānpuruṣamidaṃ brahmeti manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:938: tena yaḥ phalaviśeṣo 'bhinirvartyate so 'pi tathājātīyaka iti śakyamanumātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:940: āha, yadi nāyaṃ śreyāniti kṛtvāsya jijñāsornātra samādhiḥ tena tarhi yaḥ śreyān phalaviśeṣaḥ sa upadeṣṭavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:942: tadviparītaḥ śreyān tadityanena karmavidhiniṣpāditasya svargaprāptilakṣaṇasya phalasyābhisambandhaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:962: yadā tu pradhānasaṃyogo vinivartate tadā nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpyabhāva iti kṛtvā na punardvandvānyanubhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:963: āha, kimarthaḥ punarayaṃ pradhānasya puruṣeṇa saha saṃyogaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:976: yadvā vyaktaṃ ca avyaktaṃ ca te vyaktāvyakte, te vijānāti iti vyaktāvyaktajñaḥ, tadvijñānāt saṃyogo nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:977: vakṣyati caitat, “dṛṣṭā mayetyupekṣata eko dṛṣṭāhamityuparamatyanyā” iti (ISk 66) /
GSP31yuktdipu:979: rūpaṃ punaḥ mahānahaṃkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:982: viśeṣataḥ paṃca karmayonayo vṛttyādyāḥ prāṇādyāśca pañca vāyavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:986: adṛṣṭaṃ brahmādau stambaparyante saṃsāre śarīrapratilambha ityetad vyaktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:990: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ bhedamabhedaṃ ca vijñāya saṃyoganivṛttiṃ labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:992: iha yadādarśananimittaḥ pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṃyogaḥ tasmādasya pratidvandvibhūtena jñānena viyogahetunā bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:995: yathā tamasā tirohitāni dravyāṇi ghaṭādīni nopalabhyante, tatpratidvandvibhūtena tu pradīpena
GSP31yuktdipu:1003: āmnāyanibandhano hyayamartho jñānānmokṣa iti, na yādṛcchikaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1005: jñānamanantaṃ brahma yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman so 'śnute
GSP31yuktdipu:1008: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān na bibheti kutaścana //”
GSP31yuktdipu:1009: “tameva viditvāmṛtatvameti nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate /” tathā brāhmaṇe 'pyuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1010: “tarati śokamātmavit /” “brahmavid brahmaiva bhavatīti /” tasmādāmnāyaprāmāṇyādapi manyāmahe jñānānmokṣa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1013: yadi jñānavācina āmnāyakhaṇḍakādamṛtatvamavāpyata ityetadabhyupagamyate, tena kriyāvācino mahata āmnāyāntarasyānarthakyaṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1014: kiṃ kāraṇam ? na hyanāyāseneṣṭāvāptau satyām āyāsabhūyiṣṭhe karmaṇi pravartamānaḥ kṛtī bhavatīti
GSP31yuktdipu:1016: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP31yuktdipu:1018: ucyate- yadi punaḥ karmāṇyatyantakartavyatayeṣyante, jñānavācina āmnāyasya kathamarthavattā siddhā bhavati ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1021: vidvān yajeta vidvān yājayediti vacanāt, tathā sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kratāvadhikāraḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1025: yadi niyamato viduṣaiva karmāṇi kartavyānītyabhyupagamyate tena yaḥ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃsārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1028: yaśca śāstramiṣṭāpūrte samupāsyate te dhūmamabhisaṃbhavantīti tadetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ hīyate
GSP31yuktdipu:1040: yacca kriyāyāḥ phalaṃ śrūyate agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmo, rāṣṭramagniṣṭomena jayatīti tadvirudhyate
GSP31yuktdipu:1043: yathāvahantītyevamādyāḥ kriyāḥ svaṃ phalamupasarjanīkṛtya taddvāreṇa yajerupakurvantyastaccheṣabhūtā bhavanti evaṃ kriyāpi jñānaphalabhūtatvāttaccheṣabhūtā syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1050: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijighatso vipipāso vijaro vimṛtyurviśokaḥ sannyastasaṃkalpaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1054: punarapyāha- “dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca” yā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1057: eke punarācāryā manyante dṛṣṭameva jñānasyājñānanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ tasmānna śāstreṇa vidhīyate
GSP31yuktdipu:1064: yattu khalvidamucyate vidvānyajeta, vidvān yājayet, śrotriyasya ca karmaṇyadhikāra iti tasyāmayamarthaḥ- adhītya vedaṃ kriyānupūrvo ca jñātvā karmaṇi pravartitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1071: nāstyanayoḥ samuccayaḥ kintarhi sarvārthā kriyā jñānaṃ pratiṣiddhārtham /
GSP31yuktdipu:1074: itareṣāṃ tū mūlāśrame karmaṇa eveti tasya nāyaṃ vādinaḥ parihāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1076: evaṃ bruvāṇasyāsya vādinaḥ svasamaya eva virudhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1077: yaduktam- vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ nākāmayanta, kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmaḥ ? atha yaduktaṃ putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāya bhaikṣacaryāṃ carantīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1085: ya imāmadbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ vasunā vasumatīṃ pūrṇāṃ dadyādetadeva tato bhūya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1091: sa eva vartyatāṃ prājñaiḥ kiṃ nyāyyo 'tha matibhramaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1096: vidyā kanyeva ṣaṇḍāya dīyamānā na śobhate //
GSP31yuktdipu:1099: iti śrīmadācāryeśvarakṛṣṇaviracitāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatau yuktidīpikānāmni vivaraṇe prathamamāhnikam
GSP31yuktdipu:1128: samāsāntaravidhānādadoṣa iti cetsyānmatam- yadyetasmin samāse doṣo
GSP31yuktdipu:1135: ucyate- pūrva eva samāso 'stu, sambandhiśabdaḥ sāpekṣo nityaṃ vṛttau samasyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1136: yattūktaṃ viśeṣaṇāntaropādānātsamāsānupapattiriti- tatra brūmaḥ sambandhiśabdānāṃ sambandhyantaramanapekṣya svarūpapratilambha eva
GSP31yuktdipu:1138: tadyathā devadattasya gurukulamiti sambandhiśabdatvāddevadattaśabdamapekṣamāṇo 'pi guruśabdaḥ kulaśabdena saha vṛttiṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1139: evamihāpi mūlamityayaṃ śabdaḥ sambandhiśabdatvānmahadādyapekṣo 'pi prakṛtiśabdena saha vṛttiṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1143: yatra hi vākyapratipādyo 'rtho vṛttyā na labhyate yathā ṛddhasya rājñasya puruṣaḥ iti tatra saviśeṣaṇānāṃ vṛttirneti vyavasthitaṃ śāstre /
GSP31yuktdipu:1155: yatra hyartha upapadyate bhavatyeva tatra saṃjñāśabdeṣvayavaparāmarśaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1175: yathaiva hi satāmātmādīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ nopapannamevamasatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmapīti nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1177: evamubhayapakṣavyudāsātsvapakṣasiddhiriti cet athāpi syāt- sadasatoḥ kriyāsambandhaṃ pratyaviśeṣa upadarśyate bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1182: sa khalveṣa vādī satkāryavādaṃ pratyācaṣṭe tasmātsvaka evainamadhikāre nivartayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1185: yadi mūlaṃ sarvāsāṃ prakṛtīnām avikṛtyaiva tayā bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1187: yadi khalvapi pradhānasyāpi prakṛtyantaraṃ syānmūlaprakṛtitvaṃ nopapannaṃ bhavet /
GSP31yuktdipu:1191: yathā hi mūlādīnāṃ bījaṃ prakṛtistasyāpyanyattasyāpyanyadityanavasthā evaṃ mahadādīnāṃ pradhānaṃ mūlaprakṛtiḥ tasyāpyanyadityanavasthā prasajyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:1195: asaṃśayametadevaṃ syāt, na tu heturatropadiṣṭo bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1200: ihārabhyamāṇā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇāntarairīśvarādibhirārabhyate, puruṣeṇa vā, guṇairvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1204: yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1205: idānīṃ sattvaṃ rajastamaḥ puruṣa iti padārthacatuṣṭayaṃ pratijñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1226: akriyamāṇe hi saptagrahaṇe na jñāyate kriyānprakṛtigaṇaḥ prakṛtivikṛtisaṃjño bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1232: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣa iti vakṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1236: evaṃ tarhi naivāhaṃkāro vidyata iti patañjaliḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1246: evaṃ tarhi dharmādīnyaṣṭau rūpāṇi buddhervakṣyamāṇāni, ahaṃkāraśca vaikārikataijasabhūtādirūpatvāt trilakṣaṇo vakṣyamāṇaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1247: tatra rūpabhedāttattvabhedo mā bhūdityevamarthaṃ saptagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1249: kaṇṭhoktamapi yuktimantareṇa na tarkaśīlāḥ pratipadyante kimpunaḥ kleśopapāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1255: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāraḥ ṣoḍaśaparimāṇasya so 'yaṃ ṣoḍaśakaḥ saṃghaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1264: 'haṅkāratamātrapūrvakatve siddhe sati indriyamahābhūtaparvaṇoḥ punaḥ śruterniyamo bhaviṣyati
GSP31yuktdipu:1265: tadyathā pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā ityatra kṣutpratīkārasamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāmarthādeva sarveṣāṃ bhakṣaṇe samprāpte punaḥ śruterniyamo bhavati, tadvadidaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1269: kathaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti yathā vijñāyate, ṣoḍaśakastu vikāra ityevaṃ mā jñāyīti
GSP31yuktdipu:1272: atha mataṃ vṛttaparipūranārthamayamasminpradeśe paṭhitastuśabdo yatra nirdoṣastatraivāyaṃ draṣṭavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1275: mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ saptetyapadiṣṭe kimiti sāṃśayikā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1277: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ syāt yadyapyetadarthataḥ siddhaṃ tathāpyayamācāryaḥ sphuṭapratipattyarthamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyādriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1280: rātsasyetyevamādiṣvantareṇa prayatnamiṣṭato 'vadhāraṇe siddhe anyatra ajādī guṇavacanādeva stautiṇyoreva ṣaṇyabhāsādityevamādiṣu yatnaṃ karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1284: sati vā punaravadhāraṇārthatve tuśabdasya kathamivātra śakyamavadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum ? yāvatā mahābhūtānāmapi śarīrādilakṣaṇaṃ kāryamupalabhyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1287: yasmāt kila pṛthivyādīnāṃ sanniveśaviśeṣamātraṃ kāryaṃ muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalādivannārthāntarabhūtam
GSP31yuktdipu:1301: āha - na tarhi idaṃ pratipattavyaṃ ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1305: iha puruṣārthena hetunā sāmyātpracyutānāṃ guṇānāṃ yo 'yaṃ mahadādirviśeṣānto vipariṇāmaḥ sa tattvāntarotpattiniyamena vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1310: yathā tanmātrairārabdheṣu pṛthivyādiṣu ahaṃkārāttadyogyaṃ grāhakāntaramindriyalakṣaṇamutpadyate, naivaṃ pṛthivyādivikārāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ grāhakāntaramasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1315: yathā pradhānātsūkṣmataramavasthāntaraṃ nāstīti tatra prakṛtibhāvasya pratyastamayastathā teṣu vikārabhāvapratyastamayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1322: āha- naitadyuktimantareṇa śraddhīyate, tasmādupapādyatāṃ kathamasyāprakṛtitvamavikṛtitvaṃ ceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1330: yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1334: kiṃ ca niṣkriyatvāt śuddhatvāccaiṣāṃ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā parispandalakṣaṇā vā kriyā vibhutvādanupapannā
GSP31yuktdipu:1339: yadi guṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāmārambhaḥ tadā teṣāmapyacetanatvaṃ syāt, cetanāstu te /
GSP31yuktdipu:1344: kiṃcinnaiva kāraṇaṃ naiva kāryamiti caturvidhaṃ kāraṇavṛttaṃ pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1361: / yathā vrīhyāti prameyaṃ prasthādinā pramāṇena paricchidyate evamihāpi vyaktādiprameyaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇena paricchidyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1370: sati hi vyabhicārasambhave vastvavadhāryate - tadyathā gaurevāyaṃ nāśvaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1372: na ca prameyāprameyayoḥ pramāṇaparicchedyatve 'sti prasaṃgaḥ yannivṛttyarthaṃ prameyasyaivetyavadhāryate
GSP31yuktdipu:1375: paramarṣerhi bhagavataḥ jñānaṃ sāṃsiddhikamapramāṇapūrvakamiti vaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1376: sāṃsiddhikāśca bhāvāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtāśca dharmādyā (ISk 43) iti vacanāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1377: ubhayāvadhāraṇe sati ubhayorapi pakṣayorye doṣāste prasajyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1387: sādhyamānarūpāṇi hi vastūni nāntarīyakatvāt svarūpaniṣpattaye sādhanasambandhaṃ pratyākāṃkṣāvanti
GSP31yuktdipu:1399: tatra yadā tamaḥ prakṛṣyate tadā tenābhibhūtatvāt sattvasya tatkāryamanumānaṃ trikālāṅgamuttiṣṭhate
GSP31yuktdipu:1402: yasya tu niṣpattivaikalyātpramāṇapratibandho neṣṭaḥ tasya svarūpahānaṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāptam
GSP31yuktdipu:1403: katham ? etāvaddhi teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ yaduta prameyaparicchedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1405: āha- bahūni pramāṇānyācāryairabhyupagamyante tāni sarvāṇi kiṃ bhavānanumanyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1408: kintarhi vidhānaṃ vidhā, tisro vidhā asya tattrividhaṃ triprakāramityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1410: nimittāntarānugrahopajanitābhiḥ kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnarūpabhedābhiḥ śaktibhirupakārādbhinnamiva pratyavabhāsamānaṃ dṛṣṭādiśabdavācyaṃ bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:1411: / na tu yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ viṣayopanipātibhirindriyairupajanitāvadhyo buddhayastatheha vidyante yāḥ parikalpyamānāḥ svatantrāṇi trīṇi pramāṇāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1415: yathā sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāmekaśabdādivastusanniveśe 'pi prakāśādikāryabhedādrūpasaṃkaro na bhavati, yathā vā śabdasparśarūparasagandhānāmekadravyasanniveśe 'pi
GSP31yuktdipu:1416: grāhakāntaragamyakatvāt, yathā vā kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇasampradānāpādānakarmalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmekadravyasanniveśe 'pi kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnāni svarūpāṇi na
GSP31yuktdipu:1419: na hi kṣaṇabhaṅgasāhasaṃ yuktimantareṇa daṇḍabhayādapi pratipadyāmahe, na tu tasyāmavasara iti sthīyatāṃ tāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1420: āha, kathaṃ punaretad gamyate yathā trividhameva pramāṇaṃ na punaranekavidhamapīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1429: sarveṣāṃ paraparikalpitānāṃ pramāṇānāmasminneva trividhe pramāṇe 'ntarbhāvāditi yāvaduktaṃ syāttāvadidamucyate sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:1430: athavā sarvapramāṇeṣu siddhaṃ sarvapramāṇasiddhaṃ- saptamī siddhaśuṣkapakvabandhairiti samāsaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1436: anyāni punarasmāt trayāt yathābhinnāni tathā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1442: anumānaṃ dvayoravinābhāvinorekaṃ pratyakṣeṇa pramāya tatpūrvakaṃ sambandyantare yat paścānmānaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1445: mūlalakṣaṇaṃ tu ācāryo vakṣyati svayameva prativiṣayādhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:1455: tatra kathamidaṃ niścīyate trividhameva pramāṇaṃ, na punarnyūnamadhikaṃ veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1459: prajñātaḥ, tena sādharmyāt, sādhyasyāprasiddhasya sādhanamadhigamo yastadupamānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1460: avabodhavidhistu yenānupalabdho gavayaḥ sa tasyopalabdhyarthamadhigatagavayaṃ paryanuyuṅkte kiṃrūpo gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1461: sa tasmā ācaṣṭe- yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1468: yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti cāptopadeśabalāt pratipattā aprasiddhaṃ gavayamupalabhate na sādharmyamātrāt
GSP31yuktdipu:1470: yattu khalviti ha uvāca yājñavalkyasya ityetadaitihyaṃ nāma pramāṇāntaramupakalpyate tadapi vaktṛviśeṣāpekṣatvānna śabdādarthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:1473: yadi hyāptopadeśa upamā syāttena yathā svarge 'psarasaḥ, uttarāḥ kurava ityevamādiṣvantareṇa sādharmyopādānaṃ pratipattirbhavati evamihāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1474: gavayantu ayamākhyātā pratipādayiṣyan prasiddhasādharmyagarbhaṃ śabdamupādatte na kevalam
GSP31yuktdipu:1475: pratipattāpi tasmādeva pratipadyate na śabdamātrāt, tasmātpṛthagevāsyopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ śabdavyāpārāttadantarbhāva iti cet syānmatam śabdavyāpārasahito 'yaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1476: prasiddhasādharmyalakṣaṇārtho gavayapratipattau na kevalaḥ, tasmādasya tatrāntarbhāva iti tadapyanupapannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1490: yatra hyarthavaśātpratipattirutpadyate na tatra pratipattā vaktṛviśeṣamapekṣate dṛṣṭārtho 'yamadṛṣṭārtho 'yamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1495: yo hi manyate prasiddhasādharmyādeva gavayapratipattiriti yathāśvastathā gavaya ityetasmādapi tasya sampratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1502: tadyathā bahuṣu niṣaṇṇeṣu ko 'tra devadatta ityukte yo mukuṭī kuṃḍalī vyūḍhoraskastāmrāyatākṣa iti pratyāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:1503: tataśca samākhyāsambandhapratipattiriti pramāṇāntaratvaprasaṅga ityevamanavasthā pramāṇānāṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1505: evaṃ hi na tāvat parata upamānaṃ pramāṇāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:1506: yadā svayameva gāṃ gavayaṃ copalabhya vikalpayati yathāyaṃ tathāyamiti tadā tasyārthasya pramāṇāntareṇādhigatatvāt pramāṇameva tanna bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1512: śravaṇādyathā guḍaśabdaṃ śrutvā mādhuryamaśabdakaṃ pratipadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1515: sā tu dvividhā, vyabhicāriṇī cāvyabhicāriṇī ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:1519: yā tvavinābhāvinī avyabhicāriṇī yathā kesarivarāhayorupagahvare sannipātamupalabhyottarakālaṃ kevalaṃ kesariṇaṃ varāhavraṇāṃkitaśarīraṃ prayāntamupalabhya pratipadyate jito varāha iti tadanumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1522: tatra yadā kesariṇo jayamupalabhyāvyabhicāriṇamitarasya parājayaṃ pratipadyate kimanyatsyādṛte 'numānāt ? adhigatobhayasambandhisamudāyasya hi pratipattuḥ pratyakṣībhūtānyatarasambandhino yā
GSP31yuktdipu:1529: ? yasmāduktaparimāṇe dravye droṇaśabdo vartate, na nyūne nādhike /
GSP31yuktdipu:1530: tatra droṇa ityukte yadatyantasahabhuvāṃ tadavayavānāmanyaśabdavācyānāmapi sannidhānam tadarthāpattireva
GSP31yuktdipu:1532: abhāvo nāma tadyathā dhūmasya bhāvādagnerbhāvaḥ pratīyate evaṃ dhūmābhāvādagnyabhāva ityayaṃ pratidvandvisāhacaryakalpanayārthāpattirabhihitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1533: tatra yadā vyabhicārasāhacaryakalpanā tadā pramāṇābhāva eva /
GSP31yuktdipu:1535: yatra tu kvacidekāntaḥ syāt yathākṛtakatvānnitya iti tatrānumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1539: tadyathā gehe nāsti caitra ityukte bahirastīti sampratyayo bhavati, tatra gehābhāvo bahirbhāvasampratipattiheturarthāntarāpattireva pratidvandvisāhacaryakalpanayā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1540: katham ? yathaiva hi divā na bhuṅkte devadattaḥ pīna ityatrābhojanapratiyogino
GSP31yuktdipu:1541: meduratvasyopalambhāddivāpratiyogini kāle rātrau bhujiravasīyate evamihāpi gehābhāvābhidhānasāmarthyāttatpratiyogini viparyayaḥ kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1542: anyathā tu yadyabhāva evābhipretaḥ syānnāsti caitra eveti brūyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1547: kasmāt ? yasmād bhojanecchādisahacaro hi vyāpāro 'nuṣṭhīyamāno yadi sahacāriṇaṃ gamayati
GSP31yuktdipu:1551: āha, yo 'yamanādau saṃsāre devamanuṣyatiraścāmabhinne 'rthe bāhye stryādau pratyaye pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ kuṇapakāminībhakṣyādyākārabhedabhinnapratyaya itikartavyatāṅgamutpadyate
GSP31yuktdipu:1556: yena hi yo 'rtho 'bhyastassukhāditvena tasya vināpi tenārthena
GSP31yuktdipu:1558: tadyathā vyāghro 'tra prativasatītyukte vināpi bāhyenārthenābhyāsavaśādeva svedavepathuprabhṛtayo bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1565: yadi pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhetyupagamyate tena tarhi asau pratyakṣamanumānamāptavacanaṃ cetyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1566: kasmāt ? yato na dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa pratyakṣarūpaṃ kadācidapyupalabhāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:1568: ārṣapratyayasambhavādayuktamiti cet- syādetat, astyārṣo hi dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa sarvapadārtheṣu sāṃsiddhikaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1576: na hi yogināmapramāṇapūrvakaṃ jñānamiti yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1580: tadyathā santamase vrajato drāgiti vijñānamutpadyate - asti me pratīghāti dravyaṃ purastādūrdhvamavasthitamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:1583: na hi tatra niścaya utpadyate idaṃ taddravyamasti purato vā vyaktamastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1586: yadi caivaṃjātīyato 'pi pratyayaḥ pramāṇamabhyupagamyate tenānavasthā prāpnoti
GSP31yuktdipu:1588: kāmakrodhalobhayaviṣādadvārako vikalpaḥ samyaṅmithyā vā yasmādaneka utpadyate tasmānna laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1589: yattu khalvidamucyate- abhyāsavāsanāpekṣāsatsvapi vyāghrādiṣu pratipattirutpadyate / iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1592: sā tu mithyājñānatvātpramāṇatvena na parigṛhyate ityayamadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1593: tasmāt siddhaṃ dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa rūpāntaranupapatteḥ pratibhāyāḥ pṛthaganabhidhānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1622: upāttaviṣayāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttyupanipāti sattvodrekādarajastamaskaṃ yatprakāśarūpaṃ tad dṛṣṭamiti yāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1635: viṣayanirbhāsā hi jñānasyotpattiḥ adhigamarūpāpi loke savyāpāreva pratīteti kalpanayā karaṇabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate na paramārthataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1642: yathaiva hi ghaṭādayo 'rthā jñānamantareṇa na tadrūpā nātadrūpā iti na śakyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1643: pratipattum, evaṃ jñānamapi puruṣapratyayamantareṇa na viṣayarūpaṃ nāviṣayarūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1651: āha- yadi hyadhyavasāyaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ laukikaḥ prayogo 'rthavān
GSP31yuktdipu:1654: yathā prasthapramito vrīhirāśiḥ prasthaśabdavācyo bhavati evaṃ pratyakṣapramito
GSP31yuktdipu:1658: yadi pratyakṣapramitatvādviṣaye pratyakṣaśabdastena tarhi anumāmapramito 'rtho 'numānamiti syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1663: kutaḥ ? na hi sukhādayaḥ śrotrādivṛttigrāhyāḥ, yogināṃ cātindriyaṃ jñānamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1664: yathānyāsaṃ tu kriyamāṇe te 'pi viṣayāḥ, teṣāṃ yo 'dhyavasāyastasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kena vāryate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1668: na cāgnyādibhiḥ kaścidanumīyata ityatastulyaśabdavācyatā na bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1671: prativiṣayaṃ dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne yāvatkiṃcit prativiṣayaṃ vartate 'nugrāhakatvenopaghātatvena vā tat sarvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1673: adhyavasāyagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣo bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:1678: na cādhyavasāyādṛte yatkiṃcidviṣayaṃ pratipadyate tena kiṃcit pramīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1680: tadyathā- adhyayanādhikāre brāhmaṇā ānīyantāmityukte ya evādhīyante ta evānīyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1682: evaṃ tarhi śrotrādīnāmanyatamamantaḥkaraṇaṃ cetyetad dvāradvāribhāvena catuṣṭayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1684: āha- astvatra sandehaḥ, naikena kenacit kaścidviṣaya upādīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1687: yadi punaḥ sarveṣāmeva pramāṇatvamabhyupagamyate tena yacchāstramekameva darśanaṃ khyātireva darśanamiti taddhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1699: naivātra sandehaḥ prāptaḥ, kintarhi śrotrātivṛttereva grahaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1700: āha- kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yena nimittāviśeṣe 'pi śrotrādivṛtterevātra grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti, nāntaḥkaraṇasyaiva pratyakṣatvam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1706: tadyathā- gauranubandhyaḥ ajo 'gnīṣomīya iti vāhīko nānubadhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1707: āha- yadīyaṃ śrotrādivṛttireva pratyakṣamityabhupeyate ka evaṃ sati
GSP31yuktdipu:1709: ucyate- rāgādiviṣayaṃ yadvijñānaṃ liṅgaliṅgipūrvakam, yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamatītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1716: adhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne mṛgatṛṣṇikālātacakragandharvanagarādiṣu api yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1730: sāmānye hi viṣayamātre 'dhyavasāyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vidhāya viśeṣe
GSP31yuktdipu:1733: bādhyate, yathā taddhi brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1748: 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamityabhyupeyate, tena rāgādiviṣayaṃ vijñānamatīndriyatvātpratyakṣaṃ na prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1750: ucyate- na tarhīdaṃ pratigrahaṇamindriyaviśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo vartate tasmin yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1752: adhyavasāyaviśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo 'dhyavasāya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1764: ucyate- astu tarhīndriyāṇāṃ prati viṣayagrahaṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1767: evaṃ tarhi prativiṣayādhyavasāyaśca prativiṣayādhyavasāyaśca prativiṣayādhyavasāya iti sarūpāṇāmekaśeṣaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1769: dvitīyenāntaraṅgasya prātibhasyeti rāgādiviṣayaṃ yogināṃ ca yadvijñānaṃ tat saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1777: yasya hi yat kāraṇaṃ sa loke tatpūrvaka ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1778: yathā tantupūrvakaḥ paṭo, devadattapūrvako yajñadatta iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1780: śeṣa iti vikāranāma, śiṣyata iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1784: tatra pūrvavat yadā kāraṇamabhyuditaṃ bhaviṣayattvaṃ kāryasya pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1787: na hi meghodayo 'vaśyaṃ vṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati, vāyvādinimittapratibandhasambhavāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1790: tadyathā yadā lauhadaṇḍādisādhanasampanne vyāpāravatā kumbhakāreṇādhiṣṭhitāṃ mṛdamupalabhya ghaṭasya, tadā pūrvavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1791: śeṣavat- yadā kāryanirvṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇasadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1795: na hi dvayasamāpattipūrvaka eva prāṇabhṛtāṃ prādurbhāvo, droṇādīnāmanyathotpattiviśeṣaśravaṇāt
GSP31yuktdipu:1796: ucyate- yadā tarhi prabhānuraṃjitamantarikṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā candrārkayorudayaṃ pratipadyate tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1802: ucyate - yadā tu nadīpūraṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṭiṃ pratipadyate tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1807: ucyate yadā tarhi parṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śālūkaṃ pratipadyate, aṃkuraṃ vā dṛṣṭvā bījamiti tadā śeṣavat
GSP31yuktdipu:1812: tatra yadā prasaṃgināṃ himavilayanādīnāṃ deśakālaliṅgaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate tadā muktasaṃśayaṃ pratipattirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1821: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma yatraikadārthayoravyabhicāramupalabhya deśāntare kālāntare ca tajjātīyayoravyabhicāraṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1826: tadyathā kvacit sādhanavato mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭaniṣpattimupalabhyānyatra sādhanavataḥ piṇḍāntarādghaṭāntaraniṣpattiṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1830: ucyate- yadā tarhi sahabhuvāmekasya viśiṣṭaguṇamupalabhya śeṣāṇāmapi tadvattvamanumīyate tadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1831: tadyathā vṛkṣādekasya phalasya pākamupalabhya śeṣāṇāṃ vṛkṣāntarāṇāṃ ca pāko 'numīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1834: na hi sarveṣāṃ phalānāṃ tulyakālaṃ pāko bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1836: ucyate- yadā tarhi samudrādekamudababinduṃ prāśya śeṣasya lavaṇatānumīate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1837: sthālyāṃ vaikaṃ pulākamupalabhya śeṣāṇāṃ pāko 'numīyate tadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1843: tatraivaṃ pramāṇe parikalpyamāne kāryakāraṇayostatsaṃghātānāṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamohasvabhāvopalambhāttanmātrāhaṅakārapradhānānāṃ samadhigamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1853: atrāpi ca deśāntaraprāptilakṣaṇāt kāryād gatilakṣaṇasya kāraṇasyādhigamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1856: yatra hi niyamataḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇamadhigamyate taccheṣavaditi ayamasmadabhisandhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1879: dvitīyena manvādinibandhanānāṃ ca smṛtīnāṃ vedāṅgatarketihāsapurāṇānāṃ śiṣṭānāṃ nānāśilpābhiyuktānāṃ cāduṣṭamanasāṃ yadvacastatpramāṇamityetasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1882: evaṃ sati yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ śiṃśapādiśabdānāṃ nirvikalpamanumāne 'ntarbhāvastrilakṣaṇatvāditi tadayatnataḥ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavatīti vyākhyātāni pramāṇāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:1890: tatra yaduktametāvadbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sakalapadārthāvabodha iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1891: ucyate- syādetadevaṃ yadyekarūpamevānumānamadhītaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi trividham /
GSP31yuktdipu:1892: tatra satyameva pūrvavaccheṣavatī prāganubhūtasambandhaviṣayaphale iti kṛtvā na tābhyāmaśeṣapadārthādhigamo 'bhyupagamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1895: katham ? yathā hi kṛtakatvānityatvayorghaṭe sahabhāvamupalabhyānyatra śabdādau
GSP31yuktdipu:1898: candanādipūrvakatvasiddheḥ, kāryakāraṇasya sukhādijātīyatayā tatpūrvakatvasiddheḥ, śayanādīnāṃ ca saṃghātatvātpārārthyasiddheḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1900: yeṣāṃ tu śeṣavadeva sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ tasya kāryadvāreṇa samadhigamahetutvāt puruṣasyāgrahaṇaprasaṃgaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1901: vṛttau kāryopacārādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam, yadyapi puruṣasya kāryābhāvastathāpi
GSP31yuktdipu:1907: yadi vṛttyā grahaṇaṃ puruṣasya sūpapādamabhaviṣyat saṃhatapārārthyamācāryo hetutvena nāvakṣyat
GSP31yuktdipu:1915: svarūpaṃ hi sādhanasya dvividham- sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:1918: tatra yadā hetuḥ parapakṣamapekṣya yathārthena svarūpeṇa sādhyasiddhāvupadiśyate tadā vītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1919: yadā tu svasādhyādarthāntarabhūtānāṃ prasaṃgināṃ kṣepamapohaṃ kṛtvā pariśeṣataḥ sādhyasiddhāvapadiśyate tadāvītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1920: tadyathā na cet paramāṇupuruṣeśvarakarmadaivakālasvabhāvayadṛcchābhyo jagadutpattiḥ sambhavati pariśeṣataḥ pradhānāditi tadā punaravītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1921: tatra yadā vīto hetuḥ svabuddhāvavahitavijñānasarūpaṃ vijñānāntaramādadhānena vaktrā pratipādyādau vākyabhāvamupanīyate /vākyamantareṇārthasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1927: kimasti nāstīti ? kutaḥ saṃśaya iti paryanuyuktaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1933: ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kimasti nāstīti ? kimasyāścintāyāḥ prayojanamiti pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭe - śāstratattvādhigamaḥ, tataśca mokṣāvāptiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1936: atha nāstīti niścīyate tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānāttadvadanye 'pi padārthā na santīti vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhamārṣaṃ darśanamapahāyātmagrahadṛṣṭivigamāllokottarmavalambanaṃ śūnyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1940: sādhyasya yadavadhāraṇamasti puruṣa iti sā pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1950: yastu tasya sādhyasahabhāvitvalakṣaṇaḥ prapañcaḥ so 'vayavāntarāṇītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1952: tasya sādhanasya sādhyena sahabhāvitvanidarśanaṃ yadasau dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1953: tadyathā saṃhatyakāriṇāṃ parārthatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā śayanāsanarathaśaraṇānām /
GSP31yuktdipu:1960: yathā śayanādayaḥ saṃhatatvātparārthā evaṃ cakṣurādibhirapi parārthairbhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1966: vākyamapyanekaṃ yadā guṇībhūtasvārthamarthāntaropakāritvāditareṇa saṃsṛjyate tadā śāstramapyekaṃ vākyamityavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1970: yathā hi svayamutpadyate niścetuḥ pratyayastathaivānyaḥ pratyāyya ityetannyāyyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1971: na ca svayamevārthaṃ pratipadyamānasya jijñāsādīnāṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1984: tadbhāve bhāvāditi cet syādetat satsu jijñāsādiṣu tattvādhigamaṃ prati pravṛttirbhavati, asatsu na bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1993: yadi sādhyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñetyucyate tena sādhyasya hetordṛṣṭāntasya vā yadavadhāraṇaṃ tadapi pratijñā prāpnoti, nimittāviśeṣāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1997: yo hi sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ heturityetallakṣaṇamācaṣṭe tena prāksādhanamabhidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1998: tato vaktavyamamuṣya samāsavacanaṃ heturiti na caivamuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2001: yadi hi samāsagrahaṇaṃ kriyate kiṃ prāptaṃ yo
GSP31yuktdipu:2002: 'yamādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ caikajātisamanvayo dṛṣṭa ityevamādiḥ sādhanaprapañcaḥ so 'heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2004: liṅgābhidhānādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam, liṅgaṃ hi naḥ sādhanam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2008: kasmāt ? tasya dvidhā bhinnasya pañcadhā sādhanabhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2011: tatrāpi vītaḥ pañcaprabhedaḥ ityataḥ samudāyānniṣkṛṣṭasyaikasya liṅgatvamaśakyaṃ vaktumiti
GSP31yuktdipu:2015: atra śabdo vā yena sādhyasādhane nidarśyete sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt ? artho vā yatra nidarśyate
GSP31yuktdipu:2016: kiñcātaḥ ? na tadyadi tāvacchabdaḥ parigṛhyate tata upanayalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:2018: kasmāt ? na hi yathābhidhānaṃ tathā sādhyamityekakriyā yujyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2025: ucyate- yaducyate svaniścayenāṅgabhāvagamanātparapratyāyanārthaṃ jijñāsādyanabhidhānamiti atra brūmaḥ- na, uktatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2027: sarvasya cānugrahaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaṃ śāstravyākhyānaṃ vipaścidbhiḥ pratāyate, na svārthaṃ svasadṛṣabuddhyarthaṃ vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2029: athaitadaniṣṭam- yaduktaṃ sandigdhaviparyastāvyutpannabuddhyanugrahārtho hi satāṃ viniścayaḥ śāstrakathetyasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2031: na hi vayameṣāmāvaśyakamabhidhānamācakṣmahe, kintarhi yadā prativādī
GSP31yuktdipu:2032: paryanuyuṅkte- kiṃ jijñāsasa iti avaśyamabhidhānīyaṃ śabdamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2034: dharmeṇa, kiṃ nityo 'nitya iti ? kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ ? mūrtatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2035: yastu na paryanuyuṅkte na taṃ pratyete vācyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2036: kvacidānarthakyāt sarvatra prasaṅga iti cenna itareṣāmapi tatprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2038: tathā ca bhavatoktaṃ kasyacittu kiñcit prasiddhameva bhavatītyanyataroktirapi sādhanaṃ bhavati, śabda ivārthadvayapratītatvādubhayānabhidhānamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2043: yo hi paryanuyuñjīta kiṃ prayojano 'yaṃ śakyo vāyamartha iti
GSP31yuktdipu:2047: kintarhi yaṃ pratyeṣāṃ pratipattāvaṅgabhāvagamanaṃ taṃ pratyetāni sādhanamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2048: yadapyuktaṃ sādhyābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñābhyupagamāddhetudṛṣṭāntayorapi tatprasaṅga iti ayuktametat
GSP31yuktdipu:2050: yadyapi sādhyaśabdo 'yamaviśeṣeṇa siddhatvādarthāntaramācaṣṭe tathāpi yaṃ prati jijñāsāsaṃśayaprayojanaśakyaprāptayastasya vyudasya saṃśayaṃ sādhyasyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā, na hetudṛṣṭāntayostadastītyasadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2052: yadā tu jijñāsādayo hetau dṛṣṭānte vā bhavanti tadā kiṃ kṛtakaḥ śabdo 'tha na kṛtako 'tha buddhirnityā kṣaṇikā veti bhavatyeva tadavadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2055: / yathā sādhyavatvenepsitaḥ pakṣa iti pratijñālakṣaṇamācakṣāṇo bhavānna
GSP31yuktdipu:2056: sādhyalakṣaṇamācaṣṭe, kasmāt ? sādhanīyaṃ sādhyamiti loke siddhatvāt, evaṃ sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ hetulakṣaṇamācakṣāṇā vayaṃ na sādhanamācakṣmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:2057: kasmāt ? sādhyate 'neneti kṛtvā sādhanamiti loke siddhatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2059: liṅgaṃ hi naḥ sādhanaṃ, tacca nirdiṣṭaimiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2060: yattūktaṃ vītāvītabhede sati pañcadhā sādhanabhāvāditi, atra brūmaḥ, ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2066: katham ? na hi samāsaśabdasyāyamartha iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2067: yatpunaretaduktaṃ śabdārthakalpane 'niṣṭaprasaṅgād dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāyoga iti, astu tāvacchabdo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2086: yathā vākyam evaṃ ca tadarthaśca mukhyau śabdārthau,
GSP31yuktdipu:2089: tathaikasya sādhanasya sādhyadharmatatsahabhāvitvalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmabhidhānaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntādināvayavāntaraṃ naḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2090: tatra yaduktaṃ pratijñāhetvarthābhidhānād dṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanānāṃ nāvayavāntaratvamiti etadayuktam
GSP31yuktdipu:2096: tatrānvayadinā svarūpeṇādhigate pradhānalakṣaṇe dharmiṇi parapakṣapratiṣedhamātreṇopasaṃhāre kriyamāṇe pariśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2098: tena yathā hetuvirodhātparamāṇvadibhyo na vyaktamutpadyate tathā hetvabhāvāt pradhānādapi notpadyate iti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2101: tathā sati kaḥ pariśeṣaḥ syāt ? svarūpeṇa tu paricchinne
GSP31yuktdipu:2103: na cetparamāṇvādibhyo vyaktamutpadyate pariśeṣataḥ pradhānādeva vyaktamutpadyate iti yathoktebhyo 'nvayādibhya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2106: yadi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānātsarvaṃ parokṣamadhigamyate ityabhyupagamyate prāptamidaṃ yeṣāmapyarthānāṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabdhisteṣāmapi tasmādeva grahaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2124: tadyathā samīpāvasthitasya śakunerayatnena cakṣuṣā grahaṇaṃ, yathā yathā tu viprakarṣaṃ pratipadyate praṇidhāya cakṣurgṛhyate tāvadyāvatkrameṇādarśanamupasaṃprāptaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2127: tathā nātisamīpāvasthitasya dravyasyāsphuṭamākāramavadhārya paścādyathā yathārādupasaṃpadyate tathā tathā pratipadyamānadarśanaśaktayo 'numātāraḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2129: tathā girisaritsamudrasamīpavartinaṃ śravaṇapratighātinaṃ prāk śabdamupalabhya paścāttasminneva deśe śabdamagṛhṇānāḥ śravaṇopaghātamanumimate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2134: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tasmādapi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānādyanna siddhyati pratyakṣagrāhyamapi svayamadṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇāntarapratibaddhaviṣayabhāvamatyantaparokṣaṃ vā svargāpavargadevatādi
GSP31yuktdipu:2136: sarvavādasiddhiprasaṅgādaprāmāṇyamiti cet syādetat, yadi tarhyāgamaḥ pramāṇīkriyate tena pratiśāstraṃ ye 'bhiyuktāsteṣāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:2140: tasmādbhiṣajeva bhavatā paropadeśaḥ prayukto nāsmānayaṃ prīṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2149: yasya khalvapi yo viṣayastasya tasminviṣaye vaco 'ntareṇāpi sādhanaṃ pramāṇamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam
GSP31yuktdipu:2154: yathā kṛtakatvādidharmo 'nityatvādau viṣaye dṛṣṭastadabhāve cādṛṣṭa ityanitye
GSP31yuktdipu:2155: 'rthe niścayamādadhāti evaṃ śabdo 'pi svārthe tajjātīye na dṛṣṭaḥ pratipattiheturbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2159: jātidravyaguṇakriyāsu ca, tathā ḍitthādiśabdaḥ, tasmādevaṃjātīyakānāmapi cānumānādabhedaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2173: tathā hi kṛtakatvāditi liṅgaṃ caṇḍālakāpālikairapi prayujyamānaṃ sāhacaryāpekṣaṃ niścayamādadhāti
GSP31yuktdipu:2180: sa eva hi śabdo deśāntare, kālāntare tu svārthaṃ na pratyāyayati arthāntaraṃ ca praśaṃsati
GSP31yuktdipu:2185: na hi pratyakṣābhimatasya liṅgina upalabdhau gavāderliṅgaṃ nopalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2201: yatha vṛddhyādayaḥ śabdāḥ svārthābhyuccayādiṣu prasiddhā ādaikṣu viniveśyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2203: sarvābhidhānaśaktitvācchabdasyādoṣa iti cet syānmataṃ sarvābhidhānaśaktiḥ śabdaḥ sarvābhidheyaśaktiścārthastayoḥ puruṣavyāpāreṇa śaktyavavacchedaḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2207: tasmācchabdasya svābhāvikaḥ sambandho vaktrapekṣayā vyajyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2212: na hi yathā vakrapekṣayā sarvārthasya sataḥ śabdasya śaktyavacchedastathā sarvārthaṃ liṅgaṃ vaktrapekṣayārthāntarādavacchidyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2213: yathā caikaḥ śabdo jagatyevamuditaḥ puruṣaviniyogāpekṣaḥ sarvamarthamabhidhātuṃ samarthastathaikaṃ liṅgaṃ kayācidyuktyā sarvārthapratyāyanasamartham /
GSP31yuktdipu:2220: jātyādisādhyatvāt jātiguṇadravyakriyāṇāṃ ca parasparato 'rthāntaratvaṃ, samudāyaśca sādhyaḥ tasmādayuktameṣāṃ tadapekṣayā sāmānyaviṣayatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2225: sāmānyaparikalpanā, sā tu pramāṇaviṣayā na tu prameyaviṣayā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2232: yasya hi śabdasyārthaḥ pratyakṣato 'numānato vā nopalabhyate sa na pramāṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2234: tadyathā nadyāstīre pakvamāmravanaṃ, pathi guḍaśakaṭaṃ viparyastamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2236: tasmādyathā vibhurātmā sarvatra sukhādisambhavādityevamādayo bauddhaṃ prati dharmyasiddhatvādayo yathārthāstathā vedaśabdā api prāyeṇeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2239: kā hyatra yuktiryadasmadādibhiranupalabhyamānārthaṃ pramāṇabhūtānāmapi vākyamayathārthaṃ syāt ? saveṇa cāvaśyaṃ kaścidāptastasya ca vākyamadṛṣṭārthamityabhyupagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2242: tatra yadi śabdasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ yathārthatvamāśrīyate tena na kevalaṃ svargādayaḥ kiṃ tarhi śabdā evāpramāṇamiti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2280: evaṃ siddhe yatpratijñādvayaṃ karoti tat jñāpayatyācāryaḥ vītāvītābhyāmabhipretārthasiddhiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2282: ekasmiṃśca viṣaye dvau prayuṃjānaḥ samuccayena siddhiṃ dyotayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2283: kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ? yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ na
GSP31yuktdipu:2295: āha, kiṃ punastatkāryaṃ yadbhavānpradhānasyāstitve liṅgamācaṣṭa iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2297: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31yuktdipu:2298: taddhi mahadahaṃkārendriyaviśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ pradhānena visadṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ cetyupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2300: kiṃ punaradhikṛtyedamucyate prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca mahadādi kāryamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2302: etāni ca parasparavaidharmyasādharmyapratipattimantareṇa na śakyāni vijñātumityevamarthamidaṃ prastūyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2308: kiṃ prāgutpatterasti nāstīti ? kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet
GSP31yuktdipu:2323: na hi naḥ kāraṇādarthāntarabhūtaṃ kāryamutpadyata ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2324: kiṃ tarhi viśvātmakānāṃ sattvarajastamasāmapagataviśeṣāviśeṣāḥ sanmātralakṣaṇopacayāḥ pratinivṛttapariṇāmavyāpārāḥ paramavibhāgamupasaṃprāptāḥ sūkṣmāḥ śaktayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2326: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāmasata utpattau kaḥ prasaṅga iti ? etenaiva bāhyānāṃ tantvādikāryāṇāṃ paṭādīnāṃ sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvādasata utpattiḥ pratiṣiddhā boddhavyā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2329: yadi hi sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvaṃ kāryasya siddhaṃ syādata etadyujyate vaktum-
GSP31yuktdipu:2335: iha śrotrādīnāṃ viṣayabhūtasya tatsannidhānādavaśyaṃ grahaṇena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2336: yadi ca prāgutpatteḥ satkāryaṃ syāt tadapi śrotrādisannidhānāt gṛhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:2339: anupalabdhikāraṇasadbhāvāditi cet, tatraitatsyāt, asti prāgutpatteḥ kāryasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ tasmādasya sato 'pyagrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2357: pramāṇāntaranivṛttiprasaṅgādayuktamiti cet, syādetat yadi tarhi pratyakṣaviṣayamevāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2367: guṇena, yathā mālatīlatāgandhena vyapadeśena vā, kāryādinā yathendriyāṇi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2368: na tu prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya kriyāguṇavyapadeśasambhavaḥ tasmādasatkāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2371: iha prāgvyāpāropakramāt kartārastasmātphalamupalipsamānāḥ kāryaviśeṣaniyatasāmārthyaṃ sādhanamupādāya vyāpriyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2375: pariṇāmādyupapatterna doṣa iti cet syānmataṃ kāraṇasya pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayakṣaṇāndharmān yasmāt kartrādīni kurvanti nānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2377: ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāditi ? ucyate- na śakyamevaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2380: pariṇāmo hi nāmāvasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttiḥ dharmāntarapravṛttiśca /
GSP31yuktdipu:2388: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yaḥ kriyārthaḥ sādhanānāmādau parispandaḥ so 'nte 'pi
GSP31yuktdipu:2390: vā yo 'nte virāmaḥ sa ādāvapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2395: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yathā niṣpannasyotpattidharmeṇābhisambandhaḥ tathā ādāvapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2409: yadi tantvādibhyo dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattiḥ syāt tena yathā tantukalāpe paṭastatraiva vā paṭāntaramāhitaṃ bhedenopalabhyate tathaivopalabhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:2412: samavāyādagrahaṇamiti cet syādetat, saṃyoginordravyayoḥ satyādhārādheyabhāve bhedena grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2421: mahāparimāṇaṃ dravyamanyatrāhitaṃ samavāyāt bhedena nopalabhyate ityetasminnarthe paryanuyuktasya kaste dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? na cāstyanudāhṛto vādaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2422: vyāpte na grahaṇamiti cet syānmatamakāryakāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ satyapi sambandhe na dravyāntaraṃ vyaśnuta ityato bhedena gṛhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2431: vemādivat iti cet syādetat- yathā satyarthāntarabhāve vemādayo
GSP31yuktdipu:2435: karaṇaṃ vemādayaḥ paṭasya, na kāraṇamityayamabhyupagamo naḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2449: sa hyavayaveṣu vartamānaḥ kṛtsneṣu vā vartate pratyavayavaṃ vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2452: yadanekeṣu vartate tasya kṛtsnādhāragrahaṇe sati grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2463: tataśca yacchāstraṃ mūrtimatāmasamānadeśatvamiti tasya vyāghāto 'vayavaparimāṇaṃ ca prāpnoti
GSP31yuktdipu:2465: tataśca yacchāstraṃ dravyamanekadravyamadravyaṃ vā tasya hāniretāvatā cāsya vṛttirbhavantī bhavet /
GSP31yuktdipu:2468: arthāntarāvasthāne 'rthāntarotpattivināśadarśanādanyatvamiti cet syādetat - vidyamāneṣu tantuṣu paṭo na bhavati saṃyogalakṣaṇasya
GSP31yuktdipu:2478: kimatrārthāntaramutpadyate vinaśyati vā ? āhosvittantuṣveva samavasthānaviśeṣāpekṣasya paṭābhidhānasya pravṛtinivṛttī senāvanavadbhavataḥ ? tasmādetadapi nāvayavino dravyāntarabhāve liṅgam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2497: te cāpi cānarthānatve sati senādiṣu dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2509: yo hi yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇyarthāntarabhūtānyāhitāni tathā kāraṇe kāryamastītyetadācaṣṭe taṃ pratyayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2514: yathā vastrasyopasaṃhārapratibandhādāyāmavistārau na grahaṇaviṣayatāṃ pratipadyete, sattāṃ vā na jihītaḥ kūrmasyevāṅgāni, tatha tantvādīnāmapi bhāvānāṃ kāraṇābhimatā kāryābhimatā cāvasthā krameṇa vā sthiraśca bhavat tannimittastadgrahaṇāgrahaṇavikalpaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2520: kāryakāraṇapṛthaktvavādinastatkriyāguṇānāṃ pṛthaktvamanumātuṃ yuktamityatastantvavasthāne paṭakriyāguṇagrahaṇādanumānābhāva ityayamupālambhaḥ sāvakāśaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2521: asmākantu kāraṇamātrasyaiva saṃghātādākārāntaraparigrahādvā kriyāguṇānāṃ pracitirvyaktiviśeṣo bhavatīti bruvatāmadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2528: vipratipattau hi satyāṃ liṅgataḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya samadhigamaṃ kariṣyāma iti prakṛtamevaitat
GSP31yuktdipu:2531: karmaguṇā aguṇā iti vacanādutpannamātraṃ dravyaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nirguṇamavatiṣṭhate iti vaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2536: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthaṃ pratijñāya pratiṣidhyamānena siddhabuddhiviṣayatā smartavyetyetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavivādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2544: asadakaraṇāt yadyubhayapakṣaprasiddhasyāsataḥ kriyāyogaḥ syāt ata etadyujyate vaktum kārye sati kartuḥ prayāso 'narthaka iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2547: hetvabhidhānādasiddhiriti cet syādetat- yathā niṣpannatvānmadhvādīnāṃ dhāraṇasamartho ghaṭo na kriyata
GSP31yuktdipu:2548: ityayamapadiṣṭo heturasmābhiḥ evamitthaṃ kāryasyāsataḥ kāraṇaṃ nopapannamiti noktaṃ bhavatā
GSP31yuktdipu:2552: taddhi kriyamāṇaṃ sati vā sambandhe kārakaiḥ kriyate 'sati vā ? sambandhaścāsya bhavanpravṛttikāle vā kāraṇānāṃ syāt, niṣpattikāle vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tanna tāvatpravṛttikāle sambandho yuktaḥ kasmāt ? adravyatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2553: pravṛttikāle kartrādīnāṃ kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādavastubhūtaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasthānīyaṃ vaḥ kāryam
GSP31yuktdipu:2555: atha niṣpattikāle 'bhisambadhyate yaduktaṃ sato niṣpannatvātkriyānutpattiriti tasya vyāghātaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2556: atha matamasatyapi sambandhe niṣpattirbhavatīti tena kārakavyāpāravaiyarthyaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2558: uktaṃ ca asattvānnāsti sambandhaḥ kārakaiḥ sattvasaṃgibhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2561: āha, nanu ca madhyame kāle kartrādibhiḥ kāryaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2566: yadā hetavaḥ pravṛttārambhā bhavantyuddiśya kāryaṃ na ca tāvannaimittikasyātmalābhaḥ saṃvartate sa madhyamaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2571: sadasadrūpā cāvasthā nāsti yo madhyamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2574: pūrvadoṣāparihārāduddiśya kāryaṃ tasyātmano lābhātmakena saha sambandha iti ? atrāpyayaṃ paryanuyogo naiva nivartata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2575: tasmāccitramapi vākyaṃ prasārya na kiṃcitparihṛtaṃ bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2576: tasmādyuktametat satyasati vā sambandhe doṣaprasaṃgādasanna kriyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2577: yasya punaḥ satkāryaṃ tasya doṣo nāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2581: tasmācca nārthāntaraṃ kāryam ityataḥ kāraṇenābhisambaddhānāṃ kārakāṇāṃ kāryeṇaiva sambandho bhavatītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2582: āha- nanu ca yasyāpi satkāryaṃ tasyopādānādarthāntaraṃ tatkāryaṃ syāt
GSP31yuktdipu:2594: sarvasambhavābhāvāt upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato 'rthāntaratvasāmānyāttantuvatsarvasmātkāraṇātkāryasya sambhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2598: jātibhedaprasaṃgādarthāntarārambhaprasaṅgācca upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato yathā vemādibhyo bhinnajātīyo bhinnadeśaśca, tathā tantubhyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt yathā cāvasthite paṭe vemādayaḥ paṭāntaraṃ kurvanti tathā hyavasthite paṭe tantavo 'pi paṭāntaramārabheran na caitadiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2600: yatpunaretaduktaṃ yadyadarthamupādīyate na tat tatrāstīti, atra
GSP31yuktdipu:2608: / upetya vā brūmaḥ kathaṃ tāvattilāstailārthamupādīyante, bhavati cātra tailam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2610: godhukca payo 'rthaṃ gāmādatte, bhavati ca tasyāṃ kṣīram /
GSP31yuktdipu:2612: taṇḍulārthamupādīyate, santi cātra taṇḍulā ityanaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2619: yadyatrāsti tatra tadarthamupādīyate iti pūrvaṃ bhavatātisṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2626: sato dharmāntarasya nirodhamasataścotpattiṃ pariṇāmamabhidadhato vyaktamayamupālambhaḥ syāt
GSP31yuktdipu:2628: kiṃ tarhi sādhanānugṛhītasya dharmiṇo dharmāntarasyāvirbhāvaḥ pūrvasya ca tirobhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2630: vyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayāstu kimasato dharmā uta svato 'santa iti vicāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2632: yadi tāvadasato dharmāḥ yathā kasyeti vācyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2640: upetya vaiṣāmutpattiṃ brūmaḥ- yadi hi pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayamātraṃ kāryamiṣyate yaduktaṃ dravyāṇi
GSP31yuktdipu:2646: katham ? ātmabhūtaṃ hi tantūnāṃ paṭākhyaṃ vyūhasthānīyaṃ sanniveśaviśeṣaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:2647: yadā kārakāṇi svena svena vyāpāreṇāviṣkurvanti tadā kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityevamādirlokasya vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2648: yadā tu kārakāṇi śaktyantarāvirbhāvātsaṃsthānāntareṇautsukyavartitāmavasthāmupasaṃharanti tadā prāgupalabdhaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vināśaśabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2652: sadasadviṣayaṃ janmeti vivāde 'nuṣakte janmaśabdaḥ prāgabhūtasya sadbhāvamācaṣṭa iti brūvato 'nuktasamam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2653: puruṣādāvadṛṣṭatvādasiddhiriti cet syādetat yadi tarhi kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityeṣorthaḥ sadviṣayaḥ kalpyate, pradhānapuruṣayorapi tatprasaṃgaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:2659: 'narthāntarabhūtaṃ saṃsthānaṃ bhajate tadaite śabdāḥ pravartanta ityuktam
GSP31yuktdipu:2660: / dṛṣṭaṃ ca loke tadyathā muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalāni karoti janayatyutpādayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2662: ubhayapakṣaprasiddhe tu śaśaviṣāṇādau naite śabdāḥ pravartante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2671: āsti cāyaṃ paṭasya vemādīnāṃ ca niyamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2673: sahakārivattanniyama iti cet syānmatam yathāpo bījāṅkurasyotpattau samarthā bhavanti na kāṣṭhādagnervā
GSP31yuktdipu:2676: yathā ca sūryaḥ sūryakāntādagnimutpādayituṃ samartho na candrakāntācca pānīyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2678: tathā ca tattvādīnāṃ paṭasyaiva śaktiniyamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2679: na ca paṭasya tantuṣu sattvaṃ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2688: yattūktamapāṃ vicchinnavānna tāsvaṅkuro 'stīti tatrāpi yāsāmapāṃ bījānupraveśadaṅkurabhāvena vipariṇāmastābhyastasyānanyatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2692: tadyathā vijñānotpattihetutve sati na rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nedānīṃ tatsāmānyāt rūpamapyarūpaṃ bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:2693: evaṃ paṭakāraṇatvādvemādayo na paṭa iti nedānīṃ tantavopyapaṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2699: kāraṇāntarātkāryotpattidarśanādanyatra tadbuddhiriti cet syānmataṃ prākkāraṇāntarātkāryāntarasyāsata utpattimupalabhya paścātkāraṇāntare kāraṇabuddhirbhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2703: kutaḥ punastannimittākārabuddhiḥ ? kāraṇabhāvāditi cet - syādetat, asattvāviśeṣe
GSP31yuktdipu:2709: asattvāviśeṣe 'pi paṭasya kāraṇamasti na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyatra heturanuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2710: puruṣavaditi cet syādetat, yathā tulyatve sattve paṭasya kāraṇamasti na
GSP31yuktdipu:2711: puruṣasya, evamasattve paṭasya saṃsthānaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyetadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2715: saṃsthānavattadviśeṣa iti cet syānmataṃ yathā sattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ saṃsthānaṃ na puruṣa evamasattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ kāryaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2729: kathaṃ tarhi dravyāntaraṃ paṭo neṣyate ? “tantuṣveva tathāstheṣu paṭa ityādibuddhayaḥ” ityevamādinā nyāyenāvayavipratiṣedhātsaṃyogo 'pi na saṃyogibhyasteṣāmarthāntaramiṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2730: tatraitāvatī parikalpanā syāt- yaduta tantusaṃyogo vā paṭaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:2731: saṃyogakāraṇaṃ vā dravyāntaram ? ubhayaṃ ca teṣāṃ nārthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:2736: yathā cāsatkāryaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā caśabdātsadasatkāryamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2743: kiṃ ca prakṛtam ? mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:2746: adhigatasārūpyasya hi sukhaṃ vairūpyasya pratipattirbhavatīti prāksārūpyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam
GSP31yuktdipu:2747: yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣasāmānyamuktvā dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaramityevamādiḥ viśeṣo 'bhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2752: vairūpyāpekṣaṃ hi sārūpyaṃ, sārūpyāpekṣaṃ ca vairūpyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2756: vicchinnaṃ hi vairūpyamatastatpūrvamabhidhāya prakaraṇāṅgaṃ sārūpyaṃ sukhamabhidhātumityevamarthamācāryeṇaivaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2757: kathaṃ sārūpyasya prakaraṇāṅgatvamiti cet traiguṇyābhidhānadvāreṇa guṇalakṣaṇopadeśāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2758: tatsiddhau cāvivekyādīnāṃ vyaktasiddheḥ, kāraṇaguṇātmakatvācca kāryasya pradhāne traiguṇyādipratipatteḥ, kāryakāraṇabhāvāsandehācca pradhānāstitvaprasiddhyapadeśāttatsiddhau ca bhogyasya bhoktrapekṣatvāt puruṣasiddheradhigatabhoktṛbhogyasya tatsaṃyogasya ca
GSP31yuktdipu:2762: āha- yadi tarhi bhavānprāgvairūpyābhidhānaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyate tadvaktavyaṃ kiṃ punaridaṃ vairūpyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2781: ete hetumadādayaḥ paratantrāntā nirapavādāḥ vyaktasyāsādhāraṇā pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ dharmāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2783: vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ heturastīti aviśeṣa evāyaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2785: yadyapi vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāmaviśiṣṭaṃ hetumattvaṃ tathāpi viśiṣṭasya kārakasya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2786: sa ca vyaktasyaiva nānyasyeti nāyamaviśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2794: iha yaḥ sarvasaṃbhavī dharma ekaviṣaya upādīyate tasmātprakarṣo vijñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2795: tadyathā bhoktā māṇavaka ityukte sarveṣāṃ bhoktṛtvasya saṃbhavādevaṃ vijñāyate prakarṣeṇāyaṃ bhokteti, evamihāpi sarvasambhavītyāhācāryo vyaktaṃ hetumaditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2797: kaśca prakarṣaḥ ? kārakajñāpakayorubhayorapi sambhave kārakasyaiva grahaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2805: utpādyavyaṅgyayorhi vināśaṃ paṭādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt avyabhicārāttantrāntarīyā manyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2810: antato vināśe 'pi na kaścidarthaḥ śabdabuddhibhyāṃ na vyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2813: tathā ca saṃskṛtamapyevaṃ kalpyamāne vināśi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2816: yathaiva hi nāsata utpattirastyevaṃ sato 'pi vināśena na bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2818: 'bhyupagamyate tena pralayakāle vinaṣṭānāṃ tattvādīnāṃ praścādasatāmutpattiḥ satkāryavādaṃ nirākuryāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2823: kāraṇānāṃ tu yaḥ parasparaṃ saṃsargāt saṃsthānaviśeṣaparigrahastasya virodhiśaktyantarāvirbhavādvyaktistirodhīyata ityetad vināśaśabdena vivakṣitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2827: sa tu dvividhaḥ- ā sargapralayāt tattvānāṃ kiñcitkālāntarāvasthānāditareṣām” iti
GSP31yuktdipu:2831: teṣāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyo vā na vaktavyaṃ dvividhamanityamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2836: āha- ante kṣayadarśanāt, iha yasyānte kṣayastasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2838: asti cānte kṣayaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ tasmāt kṣaṇikāḥ ucyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2846: yadi hi avinaṣṭāyāṃ jvālāyāmindhanāntarāle jvālāntaramutpadyeta vṛddhirapi syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:2850: yadāśrayā jvālotpattistadutpadyamānaivāsau niruṇaddhīti na yuktamasyā vināśrayeṇāvasthātum
GSP31yuktdipu:2858: katham ? tasyāpi yadi vināśo na syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:2862: pāṇyupaghātajo hi śabda utpatterūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti pratyakṣasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:2870: tatra yaduktaṃ sādhyatvāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvasya na saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikā ityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2871: ucyate- yaduktaṃ vṛddhyadarśanāditi, atra brūmaḥ- ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2875: sa tu vināśa ekakṣaṇamavasthitānāṃ jvālānāṃ bhavati na punaḥ kṣaṇadvayamityetadapramāṇakamājñāmātrañca gṛhītaśikṣākaḥ kaḥ pratipattumutsaheta ? yattūktamāvaraṇopanipātāt prabhābhedaprasaṅga iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2878: kiṃ tāvadyasya dvaidhībhāvo dṛṣṭastadakṣaṇikamāhosvid yasya na dṛṣṭastat kṣaṇikamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2881: atha mataṃ yasya dvaidhīkaraṇaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tat kṣaṇikamiti yathā kimatrodāharaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2886: yattūktaṃ niyamadarśanānna vyaṅgyaḥ śabda iti tadayuktam,
GSP31yuktdipu:2890: evaṃ śabdasyāpi vaktyavādiniyamaḥ syāt, na cāvyaṅgyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2891: yadapyuktaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayordeśabhedānupapatterna vyaṅgyaḥ śabda iti, tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2893: tadyathā- cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca deśabhede 'pi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ, evaṃ śabdasyāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2895: buddhestu svādhikāra eva kṣaṇikatve heturiti karaṇo (kāraṇam ?) vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2896: tatra yaduktamante kṣayadarśanāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdavat kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārā ityetadayuktamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:2897: āha- itastarhi pradīpādīnāmanyeṣāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2900: 'bhyupagamyate nanu prāptamidamutpannamātrasyāsya vināśavighno nāstīti kauṭasthyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ prāptamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2902: adhikāro hi sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃskāravaśādutpattistadavasthānameva teṣāmalaṃ sthitaye /
GSP31yuktdipu:2903: sati vinaśvaratve saṃskāropayoge tu sthityapabhraṃśa ityato
GSP31yuktdipu:2907: naṃṣṭuścedutpattisamanantaraṃ vināśa iṣyate, santatirapyante kṣayadarśanāt naṃṣṭrī /
GSP31yuktdipu:2911: kāraṇāvasthānāt na doṣa iti cet- syānmatam, asti kāraṇaṃ pūrvotpanno
GSP31yuktdipu:2913: sa cāpyuttarasya, ityevaṃ santateranucchedo virodhibhāvāntarasaṃsargāt tūbhayatastathotpatterbhraṃśa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2916: prāguktaṃ yena naṃṣṭavyamasau mantrauṣadhaprayogairapi kṣaṇādūrddhvaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2917: sāmprataṃ tu naṃṣṭrī santatiḥ kāraṇavaśādeva tiṣṭhatīti so 'yaṃ pūrvahetutyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2918: vināśahetvabhāvāt kṣaṇikatvamiti cet, syādetat nāsti bhāvānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:2928: vināśasya vināśaprasaṅgādayuktamiti cet, yadi tarhyabhāvo 'pi hetumān
GSP31yuktdipu:2935: sa tu hetumattvena kathaṃ virotsyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2942: / kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca te ghaṭādayo na bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2950: syādetadevaṃ yadi tadānīṃ sadṛśotpattau kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2964: iha ghaṭād ghaṭe nirvṛttirna prasiddhā loke /
GSP31yuktdipu:2966: buddhiśabdavaditi cet syādetat yathā buddhirbuddhyantaraṃ sadṛśaṃ sūte,
GSP31yuktdipu:2969: kasmāt ? siddhaṃ hi buddherbuddhyantaraṃ śabdācca śabdāntaraṃ jāyata
GSP31yuktdipu:2972: tatra yaduktaṃ sadṛśotpatteḥ so 'yamiti grahaṇamavicchinnaṃ kṣaṇikatve 'pi
GSP31yuktdipu:2976: yadā na kāraṇamasti na tadā kāryamutpadyate dvayorghaṭayoryugapadupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2977: yadā tu kāryamutpadyate tadā kāraṇaṃ niruddhamiti nirbījaḥ pradurbhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2980: anutpanne hetusāmarthyādadoṣa iti cet syāttadanutpanne kārye kāraṇena prayojanam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2986: aṃga tāvat aṇuśo vibhajyatāmagnau vā kṣipyantām, tantavastadāpi prasiddhavināśānāmabhūvanniti śakyamupadeṣṭuṃ, yadi tebhyaḥ paṭa utpadyate
GSP31yuktdipu:2988: yugapatkāryakāraṇayorutpattinirodhau tulānatonnatavaditi cet syādetadyathā nāmonnāmau tulāntaryā
GSP31yuktdipu:2992: kimidamudake nimajjadbhiḥ phenamavalambyate ? tulyā tasya hyekasyāvanatiravasthā tad dvitīyasyonnataye heturbhavati, bhavataḥ kāraṇavināśaḥ kāryotpattiśca
GSP31yuktdipu:2997: yadyutpannamātroparatirnāsti bhāvānāṃ, kiṃkayutaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ prāṇāpānaśramarūpādikṛto 'bjāśmaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca śītoṣṇasparśakṛto bhedaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2998: ghaṇṭādīnāṃ cāśabdakānāṃ paścācchabdavatāṃ grahaṇam, tasmādaniṣiddhaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅga ityetaccāyuktam
GSP31yuktdipu:3008: ********************** Here in the Ms, a considerable portion is left blank and it is apparent that discussion on the karikas 11 and 12 has been left out **********************
GSP31yuktdipu:3010: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3011: guru varaṇakameva tamaḥ evaśabdaḥ pratyekaṃ pariśamāpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3013: yat kiṃcitkāryakaraṇe laghu prakāśaṃ ca tatsattvarūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3022: sā ca dvividhā, pariṃṇāmalakṣaṇā praspandalakṣaṇā ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3027: yatkiṃcid gauravaṃ varaṇaṃ copalabhyate tattamorūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3031: ityeṣa sattvādīnāmavyatikareṇa svabhāvopalambho yata eṣāṃ nānātvamavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3033: guṇastrirūpaḥ, sarve vā sarvarūpā, rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiriti atra brūmaḥ na, guṇabhūtasya bhaktita upakārātpradhānarūpopapatteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3034: iha guṇabhūtasya bhaktitaḥ pradhānopakāritve sati bhaktitastadrūpopapattirdṛṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3036: taddhi mukhādiṣu dṛṣṭapratilabdhapravṛttiḥ pittasya svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārāttiktaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3038: sattvamapi straiṇaguṇabhūtaṃ sapatnīrajasaḥ svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārādduḥkhaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3040: evaṃ kṣātraṃ rajaḥ āryadāralakṣaṇasya sattvasya dasyulakṣaṇasya ca tamasaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3041: evaṃ medhyaṃ tamaḥ kārṣike sattvasya proṣitadayitāyāśca rajasaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3045: yadā caite 'ṅgabhāvamapagacchanto madhyasthāstulyasaṃskārāśca pratipadyante tadā svarūpeṇaiva
GSP31yuktdipu:3050: yathoktaṃ tatra kathamidamekāntena niścīyante guṇabhāvātsattvādīnāṃ rūpāntaragrahaṇaṃ na punastādrūpyādeveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3052: yadi straiṇaṃ sattvaṃ tādrūpyādeva sapatnyā tena gṛhyate tena bharturapi tathā grahaṇaprasaṃgo madhyasthānāṃ tulyasaṃskārāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3057: uttarakālaṃ svarūpagrahaṇānnivṛttānuśayābhiścaikārthatāmupagatābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ svenaiva rūpeṇa straiṇasya sattvasya grahaṇamupalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3061: tasmādyuktametat anyo 'nyajananavṛttayo guṇāḥ, na ca saṃkīrṇasvabhāvā iti
GSP31yuktdipu:3063: ityatra brūmaḥ - asti cāyaṃ virodho guṇānāṃ pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
GSP31yuktdipu:3065: tadyathā vartijyotistailānāṃ parasparavirodhe 'pi pradīpakaraṇaikakāryasādhanabhāvopagatānāṃ vṛttaya ekatra saṃmūrchitāḥ sahabhāvaḥ prakṛṣṭamapi kālamanubhavanti evaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3066: sattvarajastamasāṃ sati virodhe mahadādyekakāryasādhanabhāvopagatānāṃ vṛttaya ekatra mūrchitāḥ saha bhavantīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3067: yuktyabhāvādasiddhiriti cet syānmatam - kā punaratra yuktiryena
GSP31yuktdipu:3070: guṇabhūto hi pratiyogī pradhānabhūtena tadupakarakatvānna virudhyata iti saṃsargeṇa varttitumutsahate
GSP31yuktdipu:3071: tulyabalayostu dvayoḥ satyameva sahāvasthānasya nāsti sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3072: tathā ca bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ paṭhati rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3075: kāryeṣu, chāyātapau ca sūkṣmarūprakāśane, śītoṣṇe ca prajāvasthitau /
GSP31yuktdipu:3077: āha, yaduktaṃ laghvādibhāvasvabhāvabhedād guṇanānātvamityatra brūmaḥ bhinnā lakṣaṇabhedāścenmithaḥ sattvādayo guṇāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3081: evamupastambhacalatābhyāṃ gauravavaraṇābhyāṃ ca dvayaṃ dvayamiti ṣaḍguṇāḥ prāpnuvanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3082: atha mataṃ laghutvaprakāśayorabheda iti pṛthaganabhidhānaṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3088: yadi hi rajaso 'ṅgabhāvamupagacchatsattvamupakārāttadrūpaṃ bhavati tena pratijñātasya rūpāntarasyopasaṃhārāttrairūpyaṃ guṇānāmekaikasya prāptam rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3092: paramarṣerapi guṇānāṃ kāryameva pratyakṣaṃ na śaktimātreṇāvasthānamasaṃvedyatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3102: na ca laghutvaprakāśayorupastambhacalanayorgauravavaraṇayośca mithau guṇapradhānabhāvo 'sti, tadanarthāntaraṃ dharmāsta iti nāsti ṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3104: na hyetatkvacitprasiddham yathā yāvanto dharmāstāvanto dharmiṇa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3109: athaitadaniṣṭaṃ na tarhi vaktavyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇānāṃ ṣaṭtvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3114: na ca bhaktiḥ paramārtha ityasthāne yatnaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3117: tathā strīkṣatrameghāḥ prakṛtāsteṣvaṅgabhāvamagacchata iti vijñāyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3123: āha- avivekyādiridānīṃ gaṇaḥ kathaṃ pratipattavya iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3125: avivekyādiḥ siddhastraiguṇyāt yattriguṇaṃ tadaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmīti
GSP31yuktdipu:3128: tatra viṣayatvamacetanatvaṃ prasavadharmitvaṃ ca na bhavatīti purastātpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3140: yadi kārye dṛṣṭasya dharmasya kāraṇe sadbhāvo 'bhyupagamyate prāptau hetumadādīnāmapi dharmāṇāṃ kāryadṛṣṭatvātpradhāne prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3141: atha kāryopalabdhau tulyāyāṃ hetumadādayo neṣyante na tarhītareṣāmapi kāraṇāvasthitirastīti
GSP31yuktdipu:3145: katham ? yadi tāvaddhetumadādayo vyakte dṛṣṭatvātpradhāne vyañjante,
GSP31yuktdipu:3147: anityatvācca svayamucchidyamānamananugrāhakamavyāpitvādibhiścānantavikārotpādanaśaktihīnam ahetumadādayaḥ pradhāne 'bhyupagamādvyakterapi prāpyante tādṛśāḥ kāraṇāsambhavātkāryameva tanna bhavatīti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3152: siddhe hi vyaktāvyaktayoḥ kāraṇatve etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3155: viśeṣānabhidhānādubhayasāmyamiti cet syānmatam, yathā bhavānāha vyaktāvyaktayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'prasiddhaḥ, evaṃ vayaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ- tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāprasiddhirapyasiddhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3162: avyaktasya tu sadbhāva evāsiddha ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3164: kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakatvādvyaktasya ca kāryatvādavyaktasadbhāve pratipattiriti cet syādetat
GSP31yuktdipu:3176: kāryaṃ cedavyaktamataḥ saṃśayaḥ kimindradhanurvadakasmādasya prādurbhāvo 'tha māyādivadasato
GSP31yuktdipu:3180: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt yatparimitaṃ tasya sata utpattirdṛṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3185: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau tṛtīyamāhnikaṃ prathamaṃ ca
GSP31yuktdipu:3188: anekānta iti cet syānmatam, asti hi māyāsvapnendrajālānuvidhāyināmapi bhedānāṃ parimāṇamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:3195: satyaṃ, sāmprate kāle mahadādayo yuktaparimāṇāḥ pratyakṣānumānopalabdheḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3199: idānīmetāvanto bhedā ityetacchakyamanumātum atītānāgatayostu kālayornāsti prasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3202: mahadādīnāṃ ye bhedā devamanuṣyatiryañco ghaṭādayaśca teṣāmaśakyaṃ parimāṇaṃ paricchettum
GSP31yuktdipu:3205: ghaṭādīnāṃ ca pṛthivīsāmānyaṃ, tatparimāṇādete 'pi parimitā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3211: tattvabhedena parimitā bhedā ityetadvivakṣitaṃ yathoktamasmābhiruktaṃ ca yadyasti tattvāntaramucyatām
GSP31yuktdipu:3214: tathāvidhenāpi tu tena saṃvyavahāro na pratiṣidhyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3217: samanvayāt iha yena bhedānāṃ samanupagatistasya sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3226: iha śabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ sannidhāne svasaṃskāraviśeṣayogātsukhaduḥkhamohākārāḥ prāṇināṃ buddhaya utpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3244: naiva brūmo yo yasya vikāraḥ sa tajjātīyaka iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3245: kiṃ tarhi yo yajjātīyakaḥ sa tasya vikāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3248: na caitadudāharaṇaṃ prasiddhaṃ agnyādayaḥ svakāraṇajātiṃ nānuvidadhatīta /
GSP31yuktdipu:3252: bherīvikāraḥ śabdo na tu yathā bherīrūpamavasthitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3253: pradīpeneva tu daṇḍābhighātena vyajyata iti sādhyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3260: iha yāvatī kācilloke pravṛttirupalabhyate sā sarvā śaktitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3261: tadyathā kumbhakārasya daṇḍādisādhanavinyāsalakṣaṇāyāśca śakteḥ sannidhānād ghaṭakaraṇe pravṛttirasti
GSP31yuktdipu:3267: yadi śaktipūrvikā pravṛttiriti manyadhvaṃ tena yāvatpravṛttirnopalabhyate tāvacchaktirnāstītyetadāpannam
GSP31yuktdipu:3270: yadi khalvapi vidyamānā śaktiḥ kenacitprabandhena kāryaṃ notpādayecchaktitaraśaktetyetadāpannam
GSP31yuktdipu:3273: tatra yaduktaṃ prākpravṛtteḥ śaktidarśanādvyaktasyāpi niṣpādikā śaktirastītyetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3275: iha pradhānameva vā śaktiḥ syāt pradhānādvā bhinnā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvatpradhānameva śaktistena kārye bhedācchaktibhedo 'vasīyata iti śaktibhedātpradhānanānātvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3278: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti pradhānādarthāntarabhāvaḥ śaktīnāmabhyupagamyate tena bhinnānāṃ śaktīnāṃ pravṛttitaḥ siddhau pradhānasiddhirnāstītyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3287: na ca kāryānupalabdhau kāryābhāva ityetalloke prasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:3288: yatpunaruktaṃ kāryaniṣpattau śakteḥ svarūpahānamiti atra brūmaḥ na, pradīpadṛṣṭāntāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3291: na ca śakyate vaktuṃ pradīpasya prakāśanaśaktiraśakteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3294: yattūktaṃ sahakāribhāvāntarasannidhānātpravṛttisamakālamevārthānāṃ śaktiprādurbhāva iti atra brūmaḥ- tadaprasiddhiḥ śaktyapekṣatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3295: iha sarvaḥ kartā svagatāṃ śaktimapekṣya tadyogyatayā
GSP31yuktdipu:3300: yatpunaretaduktaṃ tāvadeva pradhvaṃsaṃ iti atra brūmaḥ na, kāryaniṣṭhādarśanāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3301: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na, kāryaniṣṭhādarśanat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3302: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ syātkāryaniṣṭhaiva na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3307: athāpi syādekasyāṃ śaktau kṣaṇasādhyamaṃśamavasāya vinaṣṭāyāmanyattatsadṛśaṃ śaktyantaramutpadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3312: ko hyatra heturyena vināśasamakālamanyacchaktirūpaṃ kāryamavasīyayati na punaḥ prāktanamevāvasthitamiti ? kiṃ cānyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3314: kṣaṇottarakālāvasthāne ca bhāvānāṃ yo doṣa upāttaḥ kauṭasthyaprasaṃga iti tasya parihāra uktaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3318: śaktyantarotpattau pravṛtyuttarakālamapi iti cet na, hetvabhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3319: ko hyatra nirbandhaḥ tasyāṃ vinaṣṭāyāmanyā pravṛttyantaraheturbhavati naiva punaḥ saiveti ? kṛtārthatvādi cet na anabhyupagamāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3321: tatra yenaiva hetunā ekaṃ ghaṭamavasāya na vinaśyati tenaiva yāvanti kartavyānīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3324: yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhedābhedakalpanānupapattiriti, atra brūmaḥ- astu pradhānādabhinnā śaktiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3325: na tasya nānātvaṃ śaktyekatvaṃ vā prasajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3329: yadabhinnāṃ buddhimutpādayati tadekaṃ, pradhānāvasthāyāṃ ca śaktayo
GSP31yuktdipu:3331: tasmādekaṃ tatpravṛttikāle viśeṣāvagrahaṇe bhedaṃ pratipadyate, devaśaktirmanuṣyaśaktirityādi
GSP31yuktdipu:3337: yathaiva hi devadattādhārayā kriyayā tasya deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyātyantādṛṣṭaṃ jyotiṣāṃ deśāntaraprāptergamanamanumīyate evaṃ pravṛtteḥ śaktiniyamitatvādvyaktasya ca pravṛttibhūtatvādavaśyamatyantādṛṣṭā śaktirabhyupagantavyeti siddhaṃ śaktitaḥ pravṛtterastyavyaktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3339: kāraṇakāryavibhāgāt kāraṇaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca kāraṇakārye tayorvibhāgaḥ kāryakāraṇavibhāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3340: idaṃ kāraṇamidaṃ kāryamiti buddhyā dvidhāvasthāpanaṃ vibhāgo yaḥ sa kāraṇakāryavibhāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3353: āha, kaḥ punarvyaktasya parasyaparasya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3354: ucyate guṇānāṃ tāvatsattvarajastamasāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇairdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa yathā pravṛttirbhavati, tatha prītyaprītiviṣādātmakā ityetasminsūtre (ISk 12)
GSP31yuktdipu:3364: sa khalu krameṇa vā syāt yugapadvā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tanna tāvatkrameṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3367: yadi tāvatsattvaṃ pūrvaṃ guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ svaśaktita eva prakāśate tayorupakārakamityāśrīyate
GSP31yuktdipu:3368: tena yathā sattvamevamitarāvapyupakāranirapekṣau svakāryaṃ kariṣyata ityupakārānarthakyam
GSP31yuktdipu:3369: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa ityato yaugapadyamāśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3374: iha sattvaṃ prakāśamānaṃ rajastamasorvidyamānaṃ vā prakāśamāviṣkuryāt avidyamānaṃ vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3377: yathā sattvasya prakāśaktirastītyatastad guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ prakāśate tadvaditarāvapītyadoṣaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3379: tena yaduktaṃ prākpravṛttereva tiṣṭhante śaktaya iti tad hīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3383: tathā hi sattvādayaḥ parasparopakāriṇo na cāvasthitabhāvapūrvakāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3390: yeṣāṃ tu kāryamekaṃ sahabhāve tu teṣāmupakāro na pratiṣidhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3395: dṛṣṭaḥ khalu vegenordhvagamane vāyoraraghaṭṭādīnāṃ yugapadupakāraḥ na kaściddoṣaḥ tathā guṇānāmapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3396: saṃyoganimitta iti cet sādhyaṃ kimarthāntarabhūtamuta prāptimātraṃ saṃyoga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3400: tadyathā paṅgvandhayoritaretarasambandhānna vidyamānayordṛggatiśaktyoranyonyātmani vyaktiḥ na cāvidyamānayoratha caikakāryasiddhiryathā ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ parasparopakāritvaṃ śaktayorabhivyajyate na paraśaktyā evaṃ guṇānāmapīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3404: tatra ye tāvatpradhānāvasthānubhāvino guṇāsteṣāṃ śaktimātrarūpatvādanirdeśyaprakāśādisvabhāvānāṃ nāsti tannibandhana upakāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3408: syānmatam, yadi guṇānāmādye prakope svasāmarthyādeva pūrvasmātpracyutistenottarakālamapi tadvadeva bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3409: atha pradhānāvasthāyāmapi copakāro na tarhi nānaikāntiko heturiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3413: sūkṣmaṃ prakāśaṃ svayameva karoti, ghaṭādiprakāśane tu tailavarttyādyapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3425: āha, kiṃ punastadvaiśvarūpyaṃ, ko vā viśvarūpa iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3439: anvayadarśanāttadanupapattiriti cet syānmatam pradhānānvaya eva pṛthivyādiṣu sukhādilakṣaṇa upalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3440: yacca yenānvitaṃ tasyāsau vikāra iti yuktametatprāgapadiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3457: astitve hi paramāṇūnāmabhyupagamyamāne sati satyamevaṃ syādiyamāśaṃkā, kiṃ paramāṇupūrvakamidaṃ viśvamatha pradhānapūrvakamiti ? na tu teṣāṃ sadbhāvo niścitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3459: yattu khalvidamucyate pṛthivyādiṣu rūpādyupalambhādanvayadarśanādaṇūnāṃ sadbhāvaḥ pradhānavadeva kalpayitavya ityetadapi cānupapannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3461: tanmātrapūrvakatve 'pi hi pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpyamāne rūpādisattvādato na yuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3462: sukhādīnāmātmaguṇatvenābhyupagamātpradhāne 'pi tatprasaṃga iti cet, athāpi syādyathā tanmātrāṇāṃ rūpādimattvaṃ kalpyate tatpūrvakatvaṃ ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ dṛśyamapi teṣu rūpādisattvaliṅgena
GSP31yuktdipu:3470: āha, yadi punastanmātrāṇāmeva paramāṇutvamabhyupagamyate ka evaṃ sati
GSP31yuktdipu:3476: svakāryāddhi prathīyasī prakṛtirbhavatīti ca naḥ samayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3482: / astu vā paramāṇūnāṃ sadbhāvastathāpi tebhyo jagadutpatterasambhavaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3487: tasmātsatyapi sadbhāve na teṣāṃ jagatkāraṇamiṣyate iti ? ucyate- tasyaiva kāraṇatvaprasaṃgāt
GSP31yuktdipu:3488: yaddhi tatparamāṇūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeva jagatkāraṇatvena yuktaṃ kalpayituṃ syāt na tanniṣādimatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3489: kṛtakatvāsiddherayuktamiti cet syānmataṃ yadi paramāṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvaṃ prasiddhamata etadyujyate vaktumamuṣmāddhetorakāraṇaṃ paramāṇava iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3523: iha yayormadhye antarā dravyamavasthitam prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ bhavati, tau kṛtakau /
GSP31yuktdipu:3525: tathā cāṇū dvāvantarāṇvantaramavasthitaṃ, yo yaḥ prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ tau kṛtakau tasmāttāvapi kṛtakau /
GSP31yuktdipu:3534: ataeva kṛtakatvamiti cet syānmataṃ yata eva yogināṃ pratyakṣāḥ paramāṇavastata eva kṛtakāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3536: asmadādipratyakṣaṃ ghaṭādi hi kṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3540: śarīramapi hi yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ, kāmaṃ tadapyakṛtakamastu /
GSP31yuktdipu:3545: sattādivaditi cet syānmatam, yathā sattāguṇatvarūpatvādīnāṃ sati
GSP31yuktdipu:3551: saukṣmyādaṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvāprasaṃga iti cet syānmatam, na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ sūkṣmataramanyad bhāvāntaramasti yadeṣāmārambhakaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3560: na ca yathā pradhānapuruṣāvevamaṇavo 'pi viśvaṃ vyaśnuvate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3562: yeṣāṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ pacyata iti pakṣasteṣāmayamanupālambha ityataḥ paramāṇusamavetaṃ karmodāhāryam
GSP31yuktdipu:3563: taddhi sūkṣmamatīndriyaṃ kṛtakaṃ ceti siddhaṃ kṛtakāḥparamāṇavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3572: caitanyāviśeṣādīśvarasyāpi sa eva vidhiḥ kāraṇatvapratiṣedhe boddhavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3590: asmadādibuddhipūrvikāḥ prāsādādayaḥ, atiśayabuddhipūrvikā vā iti sādhyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3594: śaktimattvātsvata iti cet syātpunaretat sarvaśaktipracita īśvaraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3595: tasya prāgapi pradhānavipariṇāmātsvata evecchāyogād buddhisadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3598: buddhiḥ svata evetyatra paryanuyukta(sya) kaste dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? tasmādasadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3599: śaktiviśeṣādadoṣa iti cet, athāpi syāt nānyeṣāṃ buddhimatāmīśvaratulyā śaktiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3605: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthamādāya pratibadhyamānena śaktiviśeṣaḥ smartavya ityetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt
GSP31yuktdipu:3607: evaṃ svata īśvarasya buddhisambhavo na cedbhavet yuktamucyate prākpradhānapravṛtterbuddhyasambhavānna buddhimatpūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3609: dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā phalamuddiśya buddhimantaḥ kāryaviśeṣānprāsādavimānādīnārabhamāṇā dṛśyante
GSP31yuktdipu:3625: dharmādharmanimittatvādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam, yadyapīśvarapūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ tathāpyādisarge sukhottarāṇāmasmadutpannānāṃ prāṇināṃ dharmādharmaparigrahād
GSP31yuktdipu:3630: īśvaraśceddharmādharmayorutpattāvīṣṭe dharmameva prāṇināṃ sukhahetutvādutpādayet nādharmaṃ, prayojanābhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3631: atha matam svābhāvikī dharmādharmayoḥ svakāraṇādutpattiḥ, yaduktaṃ sarvamīśvarabuddhipūrvakaṃ vyaktamiti tu tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3633: yatpunaretaduktaṃ cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvādīśvarasya sadbhāva iti, atra brūmaḥ- ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3636: cetanācetanayorgośakaṭayorabhisambandhaḥ sa kena cetanena kṛtaḥ ? yadi
GSP31yuktdipu:3638: atha caitraśabdavācyasya piṇḍasyopadraṣṭā kṣetrajñaḥ tatkṛta iṣyate tadayuktam,
GSP31yuktdipu:3645: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti svābhāvika īśvarasya kāryakāraṇayorabhisambandha iṣyate, na tarhyaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3646: tayorācetanyādadoṣa iti cet, syātpunaretat īśvarasya yatkāryakāraṇaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3654: ubhayacaitanyapratijñasya yatheśvarasya karaṇaṃ buddhyādayaḥ, evamīśvaro 'pi buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3663: itthaṃ cedīśvaro yadidamanumānaṃ kāryaviśeṣasyātiśayabuddhipūrvakatvācca cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvāditi tadvyāhanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3671: śrutirapi cāsya mūrtimācaṣṭe kṛttivāsāḥ pinākahasto vitatadhanvā nīlaśikhaṇḍītyādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:3679: na hyekāntena vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śaktiviśeṣaṃ pratyācakṣmahe, māhātmyaśarīrādiparigrahāt
GSP31yuktdipu:3680: yathā tu bhavatocyate pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ tayoḥ prayoktā nāstītyayamasmadabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3684: kurvāṇaḥ khalvapyayamabhisambandhaṃ śarīramātreṇa vā śarīriṇaḥ kuryāt, śarīrakāraṇena vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tanna tāvaccharīramātreṇa karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3698: padārthāntarabhūto vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tanna tāvad dravyādibhūtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3704: pṛthivyādīni manaḥparyantāni navaiva dravyāṇi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3707: sati cāsya dravyatve vaiśeṣikaguṇanirdeśa ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3718: pratyakṣapūrvakatvādvā saṃjñākarmaṇa ityetasmālliṅgādīśvaraparigraha ācāryasya siddha iti
GSP31yuktdipu:3721: satyamanena liṅgenāsmadādibhyo viśiṣṭaśakteḥ kasyacideva māhātmyaśarīrasyānyasya vā pratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3722: saṃjñāmātraṃ tu yathā bhavadbhiḥ sarvakāraṇānāṃ sṛṣṭyupasaṃhārapravṛttiheturekaḥ svatantra iṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3726: īśvaraparatantre cedaṇūnāṃ pravṛttinivṛttī syātāṃ tameva prāgupadiśet /
GSP31yuktdipu:3731: na cāsya vadhvā iva śvaśuranāmasaṃkīrtane doṣopapattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3736: katham ? yathā kṛtakatvānna jagatkāraṇamaṇavaḥ, evaṃ karmāpi na śarīranimittaṃ, tasmāttadapyakāraṇam
GSP31yuktdipu:3737: itaretaranimittatvādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam, yathāntareṇa śarīraṃ karma
GSP31yuktdipu:3738: notpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamevamantareṇa karma śarīrasyāpi kāraṇāntaramaśakyaṃ kalpayitumiti parasparanimittatvānnāsya parivartasya pūrvakoṭiḥ prajñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3743: tadyathā śukraśoṇitāccharīraṃ śarīrācchukraśoṇitamityasya parivartasya pūrvakoṭiradṛṣṭā, pratijñāyate cāyonijatvamīśvaraśarīrāṇāmādisarge ca /
