GSP31yuktdipu:3748: sādhāraṇavigrahatvaprasaṃga iti cet syādetat, yadyadhikāranimittā śarīrotpattirādisarge 'bhyupagamyate
GSP31yuktdipu:3756: apavarganiyamaprasaṃga iti cet syānmataṃ yadyadhikāramātravaśāccharīrotpattiḥ paramarṣerevāpavargasādhanaṃ śarīrādutpadyeteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3757: ucyate- na tasyaiva, kiṃ tarhi sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ prādhānyāttannimittāni śarīrāṇyādisarge sāṃsiddhikānyutpadyante
GSP31yuktdipu:3758: tatra yasya sattvapradhānaṃ kāryakaraṇaṃ sa paramarṣiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3760: evaṃ guṇasamparkād guṇapradhānāpradhānabhāvena yāvatsthāvaraśarīraprādurbhāva ityato nāsti guṇānāṃ śarīraviniyogapakṣapātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3768: na hi naḥ kālo nāma kaścidasti, kiṃ tarhi kriyamāṇakriyāṇāmevādityagatigodohaghaṭāstanitādīnāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3771: yadeva kṛtakaṃ tatraiva paramaparamityādiḥ pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3773: kvacitsāmarthādapākajavadadoṣa iti cet syānmatam- yathāgnisaṃyogaḥ pākajahetuḥ tathā cāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyāmeva pākajotpattinimittaṃ bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:3783: evaṃ yadi kriyābhyo 'nyaḥ kāla iṣyate kāraṇaparispandasya
GSP31yuktdipu:3787: sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prekṣāpūrvakṛtānāṃ śayanādīnāmupalabdhau yādṛcchikeṣu cānupalabdhau na tasyā liṅgamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3789: na hi tata utpannānāṃ parimāṇamupapadyata ityato nāpyanvayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3801: ucyate- yadyapi guṇānāṃ pradhānalakṣaṇamavasthāntaramabhinnabuddhinimittatvādekamapi kāryakāle kiṃcidvaiṣamyopajanitavyapadeśyarūpābhiritaretaropakāriṇībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ smudāyatvamāpadyate tasmādidānīṃ pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayācca pravartate ityanenotpattimācaṣṭe /
GSP31yuktdipu:3803: yatraitacchakyate vaktuṃ trayaḥ sattvādaya iti tadavasthānaṃ kāryārambhakamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3805: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kāryakāle guṇāḥ parityaktapūrvāvasthā bhedaṃ pratilabhya parasparopakāreṇa
GSP31yuktdipu:3812: dvividhā hi kriyā praspandalakṣaṇā pariṇāmalakṣaṇā ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3815: āha- nanu ca pariṇāmo 'pi saukṣmyātpradhānasya nopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3824: tattvādapracyuto dharmī pariṇāmaḥ sa ucyate // iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3825: yadā śaktyantarānugrahātpūrvadharmān tirobhāvya svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntareṇāvirbhavati tadavasthānamasmākaṃ pariṇāma ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3828: ucyate- yathā pālāśaṃ palāśādapracyutanimittāntarasyātapāderanugrahācchyāmatāṃ tirobhāvya pītatāṃ vrajati tathedaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3830: kathaṃ punaretavagamyate pālāśaṃ svarūpādapracyutaṃ dharmāntarasya parityāgamupādānaṃ ca karoti, na punaranyathā cānyathā copapadyata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3846: tatra yaduktaṃ dharmivināśe dharmavināśa iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3850: iha rūpādisāmānyaṃ vā dharmirūpatvena parikalpyamānaṃ parikalpyeta rūpādiviśeṣo vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3854: yadi tāvatpṛthivī sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣastena pṛthivyapi tanmātrāpekṣayā viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3858: tataśca yaduktaṃ svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntaraṃ vijahāti, dharmāntaramupādatte iti tadvyāhanyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3861: yattūktaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāntarāpekṣaṃ viśeṣatvamiti na pratyayanivṛttau sāmānyābhāvāvasthitestataśca dharmisvarūpasiddheḥ, yāvatpṛthivītyayaṃ pratyayo na nivartate sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣaḥ, dravyatvaṃ cāsau,
GSP31yuktdipu:3863: yadā tu pṛthivīpratyayanivṛttistadā tanmātrāṇāṃ sāmānyabhāvo dravyatvaṃ ca viśeṣo dharma iti yāvatpradhānaṃ tasya tu sāmānyāntarānupapatteḥ kauṭasthyameva /
GSP31yuktdipu:3865: yadi tu pṛthivyādīnāṃ nityamavyāvṛtaṃ sati kauṭasthyameṣāṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3868: athavā sukhaduḥkhamohaśaktaya eveha mahadādinā viśeṣāntena liṅgena pariṇāmaṃ pratipadyante
GSP31yuktdipu:3869: tāsāṃ ca satataṃ sāmānyapratyayanimittatvātsvarūpādapracyute taddravyatvaṃ liṅgasya dharmatvam
GSP31yuktdipu:3874: yadi sukhādiśaktaya eva pariṇāminyo yadidaṃ brahmādi sthāvarāntaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ tannopapadyate
GSP31yuktdipu:3876: ucyate- śaktitaśca pariṇāmini, bhavati tena vaiśvarūpyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3880: tathā guṇaśaktayo viśiṣṭāḥ parasparāśrayaviśeṣād brahmādi stambāntaṃ jātyākṛtivāgbuddhisvabhāvāhāravihārarūpaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3888: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvādityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3891: vijñānaskandhavyatirikto nāsti kaścidartha iti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3906: yaścaiṣāmāgamaḥ, sa evamāha “ātmaiva hyātmano nāsti viparītena kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3911: na dṛśyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām //
GSP31yuktdipu:3912: punarapyāha “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ, kārakastu nopalabhyate ya
GSP31yuktdipu:3929: yadi ca tairatideśaḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyate prāptamasya tadvatsaṃghātārthatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3939: sati hi saṃghātatve devadattādivadayaṃ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣata evopalabhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:3940: tathā ca sati saṃśayābhāvātpravṛttirevāsya vādasya na syāt
GSP31yuktdipu:3949: evaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sati parasparopakāritve tato 'nyenārthavattvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3951: āha, śayanādīnāṃ devadattārthatvāttasya ca bhedā bahirbhāvātparasparārthatvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3955: atha mataṃ śayanādayo na devadattārthāḥ, kiṃ tarhi kṣetrajñārthāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3964: prasiddhena hyaprasiddhaṃ taddharmatāmāpadyate bhavadbhirapyuktaṃ “yasya hi pratikṣaṇamanyathātvaṃ nāsti tasya bāhyapratyayayoḥ bhedaḥ, paścādviśeṣagrahaṇe nāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3965: tadyathā bhūmerapacyamānāyāḥ pākajānām /” na ca bhūmeḥ pratikṣaṇamanyathātvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3970: triguṇādiviparyayāt triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi ca bāhyādhyātmikaṃ tathā pradhānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3976: tasmādasti tadvyatirikto yadadhiṣṭhitānāṃ guṇānāmayaṃ citrarūpo vipariṇāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3982: yathāpuruṣārthaḥ siddhyati tathā guṇā kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyūhyanta ityatastatpāratantryādeṣāmadhiṣṭhitatvamupapadyate, puruṣasya cādhiṣṭhitṛtvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3986: puruṣo 'sti bhoktṛbhāvāt iha sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvādacetanaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca, tasmādasya paraspareṇa bhogo nopapadyate, ityavaśyaṃ bhoktrā bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3999: tasya dharmāḥ - vedanā, saṃjñā, sparśo, manaḥ, saṃskāra evamādayaḥ tasmādvijñānaskandhasyaivopabhogasāmarthānnāstyātmeti
GSP31yuktdipu:4001: tattu khalvidamiṣyate rūpaṃ pratītya cakṣuścotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamityādi,
GSP31yuktdipu:4005: yaduta yajjātīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tajjātīyakena kāryeṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4014: yathā satyetasminvilakṣaṇakāryaprādurbhāve bhavataścetanāccittānnācetanaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti niyamaḥ, tathā satyetasminvilakṣaṇakāryaprādurbhāve nācetanebhyo rūpādibhyaścetanaṃ cittamutpadyata ityayaṃ niyamo naḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4018: evaṃ rūpādibhyo 'cetanaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti nedānīṃ cetanaṃ cittaṃ notpadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4025: āha, kiṃ vyavasāyacaitanyayoḥ kaścidrūpabhedo 'sti na veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4026: ucyate- kiṃ tarhi traiguṇyātsati pratyayarūpatve saṃvedyā buddhiryathā tu vyavasāyarūpaṃ tathā caitanyarūpamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4027: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- buddhivṛttyāviṣṭo hi pratyayatvenānuvartamānāmanuyāti
GSP31yuktdipu:4029: āha ca arthākāra ivābhāti yathā buddhistathā pumān /
GSP31yuktdipu:4031: yathā yathā manovṛttiḥ puruṣo 'sti tathā tathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4034: yadi tarhi yathā vyavasāyarūpaṃ tathā caitanyarūpam, evaṃ sati vyavasāyamātraṃ parikalpanīyaṃ caitanyamātraṃ vā ? kasmāt ? na hyekāntakāriṇoryugapat kalpane sāmarthyamasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4036: atha vyavasāyacaitanyayoḥ padārthānāmantarameveti nityato viśeṣyate, tarhi vaktavyamidamamuṣyaiva rūpaṃ nāmuṣyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4037: ucyate- ya evamāha rūpābhedādarthābheda iti sa tāvadidaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ-
GSP31yuktdipu:4038: atha kim ? bhavataḥ kiṃ vijñānaviṣayayorākārahedo 'sti uta nāstīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4041: na hi viṣayasya vijñānapratyavabhāsamantareṇa śakyaṃ svarūpaṃ paricchettum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4042: tatra yadanyākāro gauranyākāraṃ govijñānaṃ syāttena yathānyākāreṇāśvavijñānenānyākārasya goraparicchedaḥ, evamanyākāreṇa govijñānenānyākārasya goparicchedaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4049: yathaiva tarhi bhavataḥ satyapyākārabhede jñānavijñeyayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaparikalpanādbheda evaṃ puruṣāntaḥkaraṇayorapīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4050: grāhyagrāhakabhāvāsiddherayuktamiti cet syādetat, yathā gotadvijñānayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvo niścito naivaṃ puruṣāntaḥkaraṇayoḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4056: idānīṃ tu rūpābhede 'pi grāhyagrāhakabhāvādevaṃ bruvato mārgāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4065: itareṣāṃ tu jñānamātrasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratiṣetsyāma iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4068: yadi viṣayiṇo 'pyadhyavasāyasya viṣayabhāvaḥ pratijñāyate, tena puruṣasyāpi viṣayiṇo 'nyo viṣayīti prāptam, tasyāpyanya ityanavasthāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4069: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti puruṣo niścayarūpatvānna viṣayo na tarhyadhyavasāyādapi niśceturarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4076: yadyacetanā buddhistena tasyā adhyavasāyo vṛttirghaṭādivanna prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4082: apratibandhena diṅniścayādiṣu suptamattamūrcchitānāṃ ca vyavasāyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4085: yasya punarantaḥkaraṇaṃ vyavasāyakaṃ tasyaivaṃ doṣo nāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4089: tatra yadādhyavasāyalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ guṇābhāvātpradhānabhūtena tamasā tiraskṛtaśakti bhavati tadādhyavasāyapratibandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4098: tasmānnānyasya paramārthasya bhoktṛtvamācetanyādupapadyate, na cet sūktaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:4105: yāvattasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛttirbhavatā puruṣāstitve liṅgamapadiśyate tadidamasiddhaṃ pradipādyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4109: sādhitaṃ tu pradhānaṃ parimāṇādibhirityato na kiṃcidetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4110: sarvācāryavipratipatteḥ puruṣārthasiddhiriti cet syānmatam, yadi puruṣasya sattvameva syāttena taṃ pratyācāryāṇāṃ na dharmavivādaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4113: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ vibhuḥ, parimito 'nyeṣāṃ, tathaiko naika iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4120: tathā śrotādīni bhautikāni, āhaṃkārikāṇi, pauruṣāṇīti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4123: tatra yuktaṃ sarvapramāṇānupalabdhernāsti puruṣa iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4126: yatpunaretaduktaṃ “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyata” iti satyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4127: na hi puruṣaskandhānāṃ nikṣepe pratisaṃdhāne 'nyatra vā kāraka iti naḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4128: tasmācchreyo 'rthibhiḥ sarvāgamatarkaviruddhāṃ nairātmyavādaparikalpanābhrāntimasamañjasāmapohya puruṣasattvaparijñānādeva jananamaraṇādisarvopadravapratipakṣabhūtaṃ paramamṛtaṃ dhruvaṃ sthānamavāptavyamiti // 17 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4132: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet, sambandhināmubhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4137: ayamapi cātmā kāryakāraṇasambandhītyataḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śrotrādivadanekaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4145: 'thaika iti, atra brūmaḥ- bahavaḥ puruṣā iti pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4147: janmamaraṇakaraṇānāṃ pratiniyamāt janmeti mahadādeḥ sūkṣmaśarīrāśritasya liṅgasya yathāsaṃskāraṃ bāhyena śarīreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4148: maraṇamiti pūrvakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalabhogaparisamāpteḥ sāmpratasya ca phalabhogasya pratyupasthāne liṅgasya pūrvaśarīratyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4150: / janma ca maraṇaṃ ca karaṇāni ca janmamaraṇakaraṇāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:4155: tatra yadyeka ātmā syāt tena yathaikaṃ dravyaṃ tamaḥprakāśāvekapradeśopanipātinau na
GSP31yuktdipu:4156: śaknotyanubhavitumasambhavāt, evamayaṃ janmamaraṇe api na śaknuyādupabhoktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4158: tena manyāmahe nānā ātmānaḥ, yeṣāṃ virodhidharmopabhogasāmarthyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4167: puruṣabahutvaṃ siddham kasmāt ? ayugapatpravṛtteḥ pradhānasyetiśeṣaḥ, yasya pravṛttirupapadyate
GSP31yuktdipu:4172: śaktaścāsau yugapadanekāni śarīrāṇi upabhoktumityato yāvadbhiḥ śarīrairapacitāsu kālamātrāsvasminbhavaparivarte bhavitavyaṃ sarveṣāmutpattiṃ prati yugapatpravarteta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4176: katham ? yadyeka ātmā syāttena tatsaṃskāropanibaddhānyeva sarvāṇi karaṇānītyataḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4178: bādhiryādyupaghāte vā sati piṇḍāntarasambandhinā karaṇenāsya śabdādikaraṇamapratiṣiddhaṃ syāt
GSP31yuktdipu:4188: iha triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmītyete dharmāḥ pratipiṇḍamupalabhyante
GSP31yuktdipu:4189: yathā caite tathā tatpratiyogino nairguṇyādayaḥ puruṣadharmāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4202: tatra sākṣitvamityanena guṇānāṃ pravṛttāvastvātantryaṃ khyāpayati, pradhānasya tadarthanibandhanatvātpravṛtteḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4204: ucyate- yathā hi kriyāsākṣiṇi kasmiṃścidavasthite kartā tadicchānuvidhāyī kāryaṃ nirvartayati, na svatantraḥ, evaṃ pradhānamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4208: kaivalyamityanena saṃsargadharmatvamātmano nivartayati, na yathā sattvādīnāṃ paraspareṇa prakāśādidharmāpekṣāṇāṃ saṃsargaḥ, evaṃ puruṣasya tairbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4209: mādhyasthyamityanenātiśayanihrāsānupapatteḥ puruṣasya guṇaiḥ saha bādhānugrahānupapattiṃ svakāryapravṛttau cāpakṣapātaṃ darśayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4213: na ca sattvādīnāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇairdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa pravartamānānāṃ svena caitanyalakṣaṇena dharmeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ pratipadyate, nāpyaṅgibhāvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4214: evaṃ saha guṇaiḥ kāryaṃ na kurute strīkumāravat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4220: tadevamanena sūtreṇācāryaḥ puruṣasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ nairguṇyamaudāsīnyaṃ bhoktṛtvamakartṛtvaṃ ca sādhyatāmāpādya triguṇayādiviparyayaṃ sādhanatvenopanyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4221: taiḥ pañcabhistriguṇādiviparītaiḥ karmabhiḥ pañcānāmeṣāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pravṛttiravagantavyā
GSP31yuktdipu:4226: yadyasya sukhādidharmatvamātmanaḥ prasiddhaṃ syādata etadyujjate vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4229: viśeṣānabhidhānāditarātsiddhirapīti cet syānmatam, ātmaguṇāḥ sukhādayo na śabdaguṇā ityatrāpi bhavatā viśeṣo nābhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4242: yadyapi gaurādīnāmavibhaktamahaṃkāreṇa grahaṇaṃ tathāpi pṛthagayaṃ prāgetānātmano gṛhītvā paścādavibhaktāngṛhṇanśaktnoti vyavasthāpayitumuṣyaite na punaramuṣyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4248: idānīṃ tu satyapi tasminpṛthaggrahaṇādabhāvaṃ bruvato mārgāntaragamanamanaikāntikasya cāparihāraḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4251: yata eva gaurādayaḥ pṛthagupalabhyante na sukhādayo eva saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4252: na ca yata eva saṃśayastata eva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4256: sukhādyātmakāḥ śabdādaya iti cet syānmataṃ, yathāgniḥ pākajanimittamupādīyate 'tha caiṣāṃ pārthivatvamevaṃ śabdādayo 'pi
GSP31yuktdipu:4260: yathā nimittasyāgnerna pākajaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pakvo 'gniḥ pacyate 'gniriti
GSP31yuktdipu:4264: āha, evamapi sukhādīnāṃ śabdādyātmabhāvo na yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4267: yathā hi śabdāḥ śabdātmakā eti sarvaiḥ śabdarūpeṇa
GSP31yuktdipu:4282: ātmaguṇākāṃkṣitvādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam nimittapradhānatvādanyaparipākavaśena sukhaduḥkhenotpādayatyātmanaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4283: tanmayatve tu nirākāṃkṣatvātpradhānasya vyavasthābhedo na yukta iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4294: puruṣaguṇatve tu pākajavannimittādutpannānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ viśeṣabhāvāttīvramandatānupapattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4300: śyāmādivattadvinivṛttiriti cet syānmatam, yathā śyāmaguṇatve satyaṇoragnisambandhāttadvinivṛttiḥ, śabdādiguṇatve cākāśasyāśabdakasyāvasthānamevamātmano 'pi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4304: sādhyatvācca, yathā hyaṇuḥ śyāmatāṃ parityajya rūpaviśeṣameva raktalakṣaṇamupādatte, na rūpavattāṃ tyajati, evamātmāpi bāhyanimittasāmarthyātsukhāntaraṃ duḥkhād duḥkhāntaramupādadīta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4306: tathā ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kasyāṃcidavasthāyāmaśabdakaṃ bhavatītyasmānprati sādhyo 'yamarthaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4307: bheryādiśabdāstu tadguṇa eveti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmātsukhaduḥkhayoḥ śabdādyātmabhāvo 'yuktaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4310: tasmādyuktametannirguṇa ātmā nairguṇyācca sākṣimātra iti kevalo viviktatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4311: tasmādayaṃ guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaḥ tasmātkevalaḥ na taiḥ saha saṃsargeṇa vartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4312: āha, kaḥ punarasyātmano guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhāvo 'bhipreta iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4314: na hi sattvādayaḥ prakāśādibhirdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa vartamānāḥ puruṣakṛtamupakāramapekṣante
GSP31yuktdipu:4320: tadyathā ime bhrātaraḥ pṛthak, eṣāṃ naikaṃ kāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4324: kiṃ kāraṇam ? viṣayāṇāṃ hyatulyabalatvāt, nyūnātiśayopapatteśca paraspareṇa bādhānugrahāvutpannau
GSP31yuktdipu:4331: na cācetanānāṃ draṣṭṛtvamupapadyate ityataḥ puruṣa eva caitanyād dṛṣṭā nānyattattvāntaram
GSP31yuktdipu:4340: acetanānāṃ hi kṣīrādīnāṃ kriyāvattvamupalabdhaṃ, cetanasya na kasyacidityato niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4345: vibhutvāditi cet syādetat, yathā vibhutve sati pradhānasya sakriyatvamevaṃ puruṣasya
GSP31yuktdipu:4353: evaṃ niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ niṣkriyatvācca pradhānātkāryakāraṇaṃ na kurute /
GSP31yuktdipu:4358: etadapyanupapannaṃ, pūrvasmādeva hetoḥ athāpi syātsvataḥ puruṣaḥ kāryakaraṇaṃ kuruta iti tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4360: atha matamubhayata iti, tadapi naiva saṃbhavati, ubhayadoṣaprasaṃgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4361: syātpunaretat avyapadiśya yoniṃ puruṣo 'bhidhyānamātreṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ kurute ityasadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4366: sa ihāpi yojyaḥ, adhyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ ca prākpratiṣiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:4368: uktaṃ ca nādhyavasāyaṃ kurute puruṣo naivaṃ sthitiṃ prayogaṃ vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4369: na svātmano na parato na vyapadeśānna cobhayataḥ //
GSP31yuktdipu:4376: guṇakartṛtve ca tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4377: puruṣasamparkād hi grahaṇadhāraṇavijñānavacanohāpohakriyā yathānyāyābhiniveśānāṃ karaṇadharmāṇāṃ pratyayarūpāṇāmivopalabdheścetanāśakteścādhyavasāyavṛttimanurudhyamānāyāstadbhāvasanniveśināṃ sattvādīnāṃ vyāpāravatāmabhisambandhād vyāpārāviṣṭāyā ivopalabdhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4380: tathā puruṣaḥ karmaṇāṃ kartā, puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4387: yadi cetanasaṃyogād buddhyādīnāṃ pratyayavadupacāraḥ vyāpitvādasya ghaṭādibhirapi saṃyogo na pratiṣidhyata ityataḥ prāptasteṣāmapi pratyayavadupacāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4388: atha saṃyogāviśeṣātkaraṇānāmeva pratyayavadupacāro na ghaṭādīnāṃ, viśeṣastarhi vaktavya iti
GSP31yuktdipu:4391: yathopadhānasaṃyogaviśeṣe satyākāśasphaṭikayoḥ sphāṭikamevopadhanasarūpaṃ pratyavabhāsate śaktito nākāśam, evaṃ puruṣasaṃyogāviśeṣe buddhighaṭayoḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4394: yadi tarhi karaṇasambandhātpuruṣaḥ kartṛtvopacāraṃ viṣayasarūpatāṃ ca pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4396: atha nāsya viṣayarūpāpattiḥ, na tarhi karaṇasvarūpaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4401: ata evāsya satyāṃ cetanāśaktau vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, mā bhūt viṣayarūpāpattau
GSP31yuktdipu:4403: tasmādviṣayasamparkādapyavikāryaḥ puruṣaḥ, na hyasya nityatvātkiṃcidanugrahāya nāpaghātāya
GSP31yuktdipu:4404: āha ca muṣṭiryathā vikīrṇaḥ sūcyagre sarṣapādīnām /
GSP31yuktdipu:4405: tiṣṭhanti na sūkṣmabhāvāttadvad dvandvāni sarvajñe // iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4408: evaṃ cedyayuktaṃ varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaścarmaṇyasti tayoḥ phalam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4411: kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmādavikāryarūpasyākāśasya sannidhānamātrānmeghapayorajodhūmaprabhṛtibhirabhinnadeśatvādatyantaśuddhasyāpi malinamiva rūpamupalakṣyate, na ca vikāryatvam, evamanātmano 'pi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4412: tadyuktametatpuruṣasaṃyogātkaraṇasya pratyayopacāraḥ, puruṣasya ca guṇasaṃyogātkartṛtvopacāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4415: puruṣasya hi guṇānāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ parikalpyamāno 'nyatarakarmajo vā parikalpyate yathā
GSP31yuktdipu:4416: sthāṇuśyenayoḥ, ubhayakarmajo yathā meṣayoḥ, saṃyogajo vā dvyaṅgulākāśayoḥ, svābhāviko vā yathāgnyuṣṇayoḥ, śaktinimitto vā yathā
GSP31yuktdipu:4417: cakṣurūpayoḥ, yogyatālakṣaṇo vā yathā matsyodakayoriti ? tanna tāvadanyatarakarmaja ubhyakarmajaśca saṃyoga eṣāmupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4421: yathāgneḥ svābhāvikādauṣṇyānmokṣo na bhavati evamātmanaḥ svābhāvikatvādguṇasaṃyogādanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4425: svasvāmiśaktinimitte hi saṃyoge parikalpyamāne śaktyoḥ satatāvasthānādanirmokṣa eva prasajyeta yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ śaktimātrarūpatvādasaṃvedyo 'tastadasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4428: tasyā eva tu pravṛtte puruṣārthamapohya nimittāntaraṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4430: tasmādayuktaṃ puruṣasya guṇānāṃ ca yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4434: yadi ca yādṛcchiko guṇapuruṣasaṃyogaḥ syāttasyājñānānnivṛttirnāstīti tadarthasyābhyutthānasyānarthakyaṃ prāptaṃ viśeṣānupapatteśca kāraṇāntaraṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4437: satatameva hi puruṣasya viṣayitvamavyāvṛttaṃ guṇānāṃ ca viṣayatvamityanirmokṣaprasaṃga eva syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4445: yatrāsau na saṃbhavati tatra sannidhimātrasāmānyād bhaktyā kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4456: ayaṃ tvanyo 'rthanimittaḥ śāstrīyaḥ saṃyogo bhavatā paribhāṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4463: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sannidhānāviśeṣe sati ātmana ākāśādeśca yasmāddṛkchaktiyuktaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmātkāryakāraṇatāmāpannena pradhānena saha
GSP31yuktdipu:4466: yathā tṛptyarthā bhujikriyā tṛptyau satyāṃ nivartate prāptyarthā gamikriyā prāptau satyām, evaṃ puruṣasya pradhānena
GSP31yuktdipu:4468: tathā ca vakṣyati dṛṣṭā mayetiyupekṣaka eko dṛṣṭāhamityuparataiketi (ISk 66) /
GSP31yuktdipu:4470: kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃ śakyaṃ vaktuṃ dṛṣṭā prakṛtiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4471: ucyate yadyapyetadevaṃ tathāpi yathā puruṣasya darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ kaivalyārthastathā pradhānasya kaivalyamiti vivekaparicchinnaṃ sattvādibhirasaṃsargadharmitvamātmanaḥ, so 'rtho 'sya so 'yaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:4473: satyapi hi darśanāviśeṣe pradhānaṃ puruṣasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4474: yadāsya buddhistamaso 'ṅgitvādye guṇāḥ kāryarūpāpannāḥ śiraḥpāṇyādaya ādhyātmikā, bāhyāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:4477: yadā tvanye guṇāḥ prakṛtibhūtā vikārabhūtāḥ kāryabhūtāḥ kāraṇabhūtā acetanāḥ parārthā anyo 'haṃ na prakṛtirna vikṛtirna kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ nācetanaḥ svārtha iti
GSP31yuktdipu:4479: so 'yaṃ puruṣasya dṛkchaktinimittaḥ pradhānasya ca kaivalyāvadhiparicchinnaḥ puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4483: tadyathā agnerdahanaṃ paraśośchedanamasati dāhye chedye na vyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4486: tathā pradhānamapyantareṇa puruṣopakāraṃ svakādasarmarthamaniṣpannakāryasamaṃ cetitamanarthakama syādityataḥ puruṣamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4489: yathā paṅgurnāntareṇāndhaṃ dṛkchaktyā viśiṣṭenārthenārthavānbhavati andhaśca nāntareṇa paṅguṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:4490: evaṃ pradhānaṃ nāntareṇa puruṣaṃ kṛtamapi kāryaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktamanavadhikaṃ ca pravartamānaṃ viśeṣābhāvānnaiva nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4491: tathā puruṣaḥ satyapi cetanatve nāntareṇa pradhānamupalabhyābhāvādupalabdhā bhavediti pradhānamapekṣate
GSP31yuktdipu:4492: tasmāditaretarāpekṣayā saṃyogatve kalpyamāne yaduktaṃ vinā sargeṇa bandho hi puruṣasya na yujyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4495: kasmāt ? na hyasau vinā sargeṇa na yujyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4496: āha ca dṛśyadarśanabhāvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:4503: mahadādiḥ, bhāvasargaśca dharmādiḥ, bhūtasargaśca brāhmādiḥ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4504: sā cāpekṣā puruṣānantyānna nivartata ityato 'rthavatīnāṃ hi prakṛtīnāṃ tadaparisamāpterna nivṛtirasti // 21 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4505: // iti śrīyuktidīpikāyāṃ saptatipaddhatau pañcamamāhnikaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca prakaraṇam //
GSP31yuktdipu:4507: evaṃ kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhātprakṛteḥ puruṣārtho 'yaṃ vyaktabhāvena vipariṇāma iti sthitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4512: tadanyeṣāṃ purāṇetihāsapraṇetḥṇāṃ mahato 'haṃkāro vidyata iti pakṣaḥ-
GSP31yuktdipu:4515: / mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti vindhyavāsimatam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4527: tathā karaṇaṃ nirlikhitasvarūpaṃ śūnyagrāmanadīkalpam, prākṛtavaikṛtikāni tu jñānāni prerakāṅgasaṃgṛhītāni pradhānādāgacchanti ceti pañcādhikaraṇaḥ, na tu tathetyanye /
GSP31yuktdipu:4528: kāraṇānāṃ mahatī svabhāvātivṛttiḥ pradhānāt, svalpā ca svata iti vārṣagaṇyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4532: evamanekaniścayeṣvācāryeṣu ye tāvatpradhānamahatorantarāle tattvāntaramicchanti tatpratikṣepāyācāryaḥ svamatamupanyasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4537: anyasya tu pakṣe naivāhaṃkāro vidyata iti pratiṣedhavivakṣayedamāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:4540: yaḥ punarāha, mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti tannirāsārthamāha
GSP31yuktdipu:4542: tasmādahaṃkārātṣoḍaśako gaṇa utpadyate, pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:4544: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4545: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakādgaṇādyaḥ pañcako gaṇastataḥ pañca mahābhūtānyutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4547: bhūtasaṃjñā hi tanmātrāṇāṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmatra tu sāṃkhyācāryāṇāmavipratipattiḥ bhūtakauṭasthyavādinastu mīmāṃsakā ārhatāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:4551: tatra vaktavyaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇā punarbuddhirityucyate adhyavasāyo buddhiḥ ko 'yamadhyavasāyaḥ ? gaurevāyaṃ, puruṣa evāyamiti yaḥ pratyayo niścayo 'rthagrahaṇaṃ so 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4558: abhivyakteradoṣa iti cetsyādetannendriyasannidhānādibhirarthagrahaṇaṃ janyate kiṃ tarhyabhivyajyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4561: sā hyabhivyaktiḥ svarūpalābho vā syāt grahaṇapratibandhavyudāso vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4562: kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvatsvarūpalābhaḥ kriyate 'rthagrahaṇamiti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4569: vṛttibhedādadoṣo mṛdvaditi cet syānmatam , yathā mṛddravyasya ghaṭādisaṃsthānavṛttibhede 'pyabheda
GSP31yuktdipu:4575: sādhyaṃ caitat kiṃ tadeva mṛddravyaṃ ghaṭādivṛttibhedamanubhavati āhosvitpratyayāntaravaśādanyaccānyaccotpadyate iti ? avayavabhedācca /
GSP31yuktdipu:4576: upetya vānuvṛttiṃ brūmaḥ- na hi tadekaṃ mṛddravyam, kiṃ tarhi bahavo
GSP31yuktdipu:4583: parimāṇādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam sattvādīnāmaṅgāṅgibhāvaniyamāttena tenārthagrahaṇātmanā vipariṇāmo vṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4586: yadi dharmāntaropādānaparityāgau vyaktavyaktī, dattottara eṣa pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4587: atha nāśotpādau tena dharmadharmiṇorananyatvāddharmāṇāṃ nāśotpādādbuddherapi nāśotpādaprasaṃgaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4598: nityeti, na tarhi satvādyātmabhūtā buddhiriti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4603: kasyātra vipratipattiranityā vā buddhiḥ syānnityā veti ? kiṃ tarhi hetumadanityaṃ vyaktamiti vacanādanityaiva /
GSP31yuktdipu:4605: ataeva kṣaṇikatvamiti cet, athāpi syāddhetvapekṣā hi saṃskṛtatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4608: tasmādanitye satyapi viśeṣānabhidhāne kṣaṇikatvamevānena hetunā buddheḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4611: tasmāt pūrvottaraviruddhatvātsakalamevedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nādhyayanaṃ, na pratyākhyānamarhati
GSP31yuktdipu:4614: svakāraṇapariniṣpannāyā hi buddhervyāpāro 'rthagrahaṇasaṃjñaka indriyādisannidhānāpekṣo na buddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4621: tathāpyuparatavyāpārasyāpi paraśvādervṛttimataḥ svarūpa noparamatīti bhedamupacarya vyavahāro nānākāryaviṣayaḥ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4623: tadyathā senāpaṅktisenākuṇḍalādyuparame na tatsanniveśināmuparamaḥ kāryabhedaśca, na cānyatvam
GSP31yuktdipu:4627: so 'pi vṛttiviṣaya iti kṛtvā tadapyuktamindriyādibhede bhedāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4633: udakasyānanasaṃyogāddravyāntarameva pratibimbalakṣaṇamutpadyate na tu mukhaṃ bhidyate iti asadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4635: na hi mukhaḥ nimittaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4639: / kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhe coktaṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmanyathā cānyathā cotpattiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4640: / yatpunaretaduktaṃ naikaṃ mṛddravyamiti tatra buddhiḥ pramāṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4641: yadekabuddhinimittaṃ tadekaṃ, tatra yadi mṛdo 'nekatvena prayojanaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:4643: yatpunaretaduktam, mṛddravyasya saṃsthānavyatirekeṇa svabhāvo 'vadhāryate na tu buddherarthagrahaṇamantareṇa svarūpagrahaṇamiti, tadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4645: upetya vā yathā bāhyādyavasthāsu vyākārā cittasantatiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4647: yathā bāhyārthākāravaccittasantatiratha ca suptamūrchitavirodhasamāpannānāmartharūpādṛte bījamātrāstītyupagamyate sā citi kāpi vāvastheti vacanāt, na ca gṛhyate tathā buddhirapīti kasmānna
GSP31yuktdipu:4651: asmābhirapi tarhyasatkāryapratyākhyāne dattottara eṣa pakṣo vyaktitarna kriyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4652: nāśotpādau tu aniṣṭāveveti na parihāraṃ pratyādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4654: / nāśotpādau kaḥ pratijānīte yaṃ pratyetadarthavatsyāt ? kiṃ ca tvatpakṣaprāpteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4655: bhavata eva naṣṭotpannebhyaḥ skandhebhyo nānyā santatiratha ca nāsti doṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4656: kayāpi yuktayā syādetadanyaivāsāviti tataścaikā santatiriti hīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4660: sattvaṃ hi prakarṣamanubhavadrajastamasī ca nyūnatāṃ dharmādirūpāṃ buddherāpyāyanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4661: nārthāntaraṃ kurvanti no khalvapyabhāvam, evaṃ rahastamo vā
GSP31yuktdipu:4668: kṣaṇiketi, atra brūmaḥ- grahaṇānyatve coktaṃ vṛttibhedo na vṛttimadbhedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4671: upetya vā brūmaḥ- yadi pratyarthamanyadanyadgrahaṇaṃ kalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4677: buddhestu triguṇātmakatvāttasya guṇasya prakarṣe tattadrūpāntaramutpadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4678: āha, kasya guṇasya prakarṣe buddheḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ rūpāntaramupajāyate
GSP31yuktdipu:4680: sāttvikametad rūpam atra tvetadrūpamiti satyapi dharmādibhede buddhirityabhedavivakṣāviṣaya ekavacananirdeśaḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4681: etaduktaṃ bhavati yadā rajastamasī vaśamāpādya buddhigataṃ sattvamutkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadā dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryamityetadrūpaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4682: tatra śrutismṛtivihitānāṃ karmaṇāmanuṣṭhānādbuddhyavasthaḥ sattvāvayava āśayabhūto dharma ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4687: akrodho guruśuśrūṣā śaucamāhāralāghavamapramāda iti pañca niyamāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4696: abhyāsajaṃ punaḥ vairāgyapūrvāvajayapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ śāntamamalaṃ dhruvaṃ sakalabhavābhavapratipakṣabhūtam
GSP31yuktdipu:4703: tatrendriyāṇāṃ viṣayābhilāṣalakṣaṇakaṣāyapācanaṃ prati yaḥ prayatna utsāhaḥ sā yatamānasaṃjñā
GSP31yuktdipu:4705: yadā tu keṣāṃcidindriyāṇāṃ paripakvaṃ sā vyatirekasaṃjñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4706: vyatiricyante hi tadā yaterindriyāṇi paripakvāṇyaparipakvebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇi bhavantītyarthaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4708: nivṛttasarvendriyaviṣayecchasya yaterekameva manolakṣaṇamindriyaṃ tadā paripakvaṃ bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:4710: saṃkalpamūlocchinnaviṣayamṛgatṛṣṇo hi ayaṃ yatirindriyāṇāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca pravṛttinivṛttyorīṣṭe
GSP31yuktdipu:4711: ekāgra ekarāmo 'vidyāparvaṇo 'tikrāntaḥ, parasya brahmaṇaḥ pratyanantaro bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4712: tadevaṃ caturavasthaṃ vairāgyaparva vijñāya tadanuṣṭhānāya yatiḥ prayateta
GSP31yuktdipu:4713: / tasyopāyo dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayapratyākhyāne ya upadiṣṭo yaśca tuṣṭiṣu
GSP31yuktdipu:4714: vakṣyamāṇastamekīkṛtyottarottarāṃ tattvabhūmiṃ vijñānasya viṣayīkurvanpūrvasyāṃ tattvabhūmau madhyasthaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4715: aiśvaryamapratighātalakṣaṇam, yatpunaraṣṭavidhaṃ aṇimā mahimā laghimā garimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4727: yathā ca jñānaṃ dvividhaṃ śabdādyupalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ caivamajñānamapi viparyayeṇa vācyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4728: yathā ca caturavasthaṃ vairāgyaṃ tathā yatamānādikaścaturavastho rāgaḥ yathā cāṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryamaṇimādi tathāṣṭaguṇamanaiśvaryamevametattāmasaṃ mahato rūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4731: anayoścābhidhānādyaḥ pañcādhikaraṇapakṣaḥ prākṛtavaikṛtānāṃ jñānānāṃ pradhānavacchuṣkanadīsthānīyāntaḥkaraṇe bāhye ca prerakajñānāṃśakakṛta upanipātaḥ tathā sāttvikasthityātmakakṛtamapratyayasyāvasthānamiti tatpratikṣiptaṃ bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:4737: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmādidameva tāvaducyatāṃ kimasyāhaṅkārasya lakṣaṇamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4740: kartuḥ svātmapratyavamarśātmako yo 'yamahamiti pratyaya utpadyate sa
GSP31yuktdipu:4745: kasmāt ? prakṛtivikārayorananyatvābhyupagamāt na hi naḥ prakṛterarthāntarabhūto vikāra iti prāgvistareṇa pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4753: “etasmāddhi mahata ātmana ime traya ātmānaḥ sṛjyante
GSP31yuktdipu:4770: abhedavivakṣāyāṃ hi kṛtvā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇamevamasmābhirupadiṣṭaṃ dvividhaḥ sarga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4771: bhedavivakṣāyāṃ punaḥ aindriya ekādaśakastānmātraḥ pañcakaścaiva // ISk_24 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4776: asya tu ṣoḍaśakasya vikārasya saṃjñālakṣaṇaprayojanānyuttaratra vakṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4778: yasyāmasmipratyayasya viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ bhavati- śabde 'haṃ sparśe 'haṃ rūpe
GSP31yuktdipu:4794: mahadādilakṣaṇānāṃ hi guṇānāmanekarūpastattvārambha iti hi na saṃjñāntaramārabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4796: dharmādiviśeṣābhyupāmānmahati prasaṃga iti cet na viśeṣitatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4797: tattvāntarārambha iti viśeṣitam, na tu dharmādayastattvāntaramato na mahati prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4798: viśeṣānabhidhānādayuktamiti cet syādetat, kaḥ punaratra viśeṣo yena dharmādi na tattvāntaram, tattvāntaraṃ tu śrotrādīti ? etacca naivam kutaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4805: āha, yadyevamidaṃ tarhi vaktavyamuṣya kāryaviśeṣasyaivaṃ saṃjñakādahaṃkārātpravṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4813: āha, tanmātrasargaḥ punaḥ kiṃguṇaḥ, kasmāccāhaṅkārātpravartate iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4820: tadyadi sattvaṃ vaikārikaśabdenocyate vaikārikāṇi caindriya ekādaśakaḥ sargaḥ pravartata ityukte gamyata etat sāttviko 'sau, bhūtādestānmātra ityukte gamyata etat tāmasa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4824: yasyaivārthasya jñāpanārthamevamiha kriyate, kathaṃ gamyate sattvaṃ vaikārikaśabdenocyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4825: tamo bhūtādiśabdena, rajastaijasaśabdena ? aprasiddhārthā hi tāntrikī
GSP31yuktdipu:4833: katham ? yadā hi vaikāriko 'haṅkāra indriyabhāvena pravartate tadā niṣkriyatvāttaijasaṃ pravartakatvenākāṃkṣati, bhūtādi bhedakatvena /
GSP31yuktdipu:4835: tadyathāgnināgnau prakṣipto 'gnireva bhavati, āpo vāpsu prakṣiptā āpa eva bhavanti, evaṃ sattvameva sattve tu bhedaṃ janayati guṇāntarasaṃsargamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4836: bhūtādilakṣaṇasya tu tamasaḥ saṃsargād bhidyamānaṃ taijasena ca rajasā kriyātmakenānugṛhītamekādaśendriyabhāvamapekṣate
GSP31yuktdipu:4837: tathā bhūtādilakṣaṇaṃ tamo 'haṅkārāttanmātrabhāvena pravartamānaṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ taijasamākāṃkṣati, vaikārikaṃ bhedatvena /
GSP31yuktdipu:4839: śāsraṃ caivamāha- “tadetasminvaikārike strakṣyamāṇa eṣa bhūtādistaijasenopaṣṭabdha evaṃ vaikārikamabhidhāvati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4840: tathaiva tasminbhūtādau srakṣyamāṇe eṣa bhūtādistaijasenoṣṭabdha etaṃ bhūtādimabhibhavati /” ityanena nyāyena taijasādubhayaniṣpattiriti
GSP31yuktdipu:4848: karṇau tvakcakṣuṣī ca rasanaṃ ca nāsikā ca karṇatvakcakṣūrasananāsikāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4863: vākca pāṇī ca pādau pāyuścopasthaśca vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4874: sambhavati, arthāntarasya ca sambhavati ityetadubhayamapi cāprasiddhamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4886: āha, kathamavagamyate bahūnīndriyāṇi, na punarekamevendriyaṃ manovatsarvārthamanekādhiṣṭhānaṃ syāditi ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4892: yadi ca bhautikānīndriyāṇi na syuḥ naiṣāṃ bhautikairañjanādibhiranugrahaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4905: yena ca yasya vaiśeṣikaguṇābhivyaktistasya tadvikāratvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4918: saṅkalpakamatra manaḥ atrendriyaparvaṇi mano bhavadbhiḥ pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4927: apohya hi manaḥ saṃkalpaṃ vyastānāmindriyāntarāṇāṃ bhavānparikalpayet samastānāṃ vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4937: yadi samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syātprāṇādivaditi cet syānmatam, yathā samastendriyavṛttiḥ prāṇādiḥ, na cānyataravaikalye tadabhāvaḥ, evaṃ samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syānna cānyataravaikalye tadabhāvaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4950: mano na kevalaṃ buddhīndriyamapi tu karmendriyamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4951: niyamahetvabhāvādayuktamiti cet syātpunaretat, ko 'tra niyamahetuḥ yadindriyatvāviśeṣe manasa evobhayapracāratvamabhyupagamyate, nānyeṣāmiti
GSP31yuktdipu:4955: iha yasyāntastriṣu ca kāleṣu karaṇasya vṛttistadubhayapracāram, tadyathā buddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4963: / sati cobhayābhidhāne vyastavṛttireva tāvaducyate, na samastavṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4970: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmāducyatāṃ tasya karaṇasya kasminnarthe vṛttiḥ, kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4971: ucyate- yaduktaṃ tasya kasminnarthe vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4973: rūpādiṣu śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu svabhedabhinneṣu pañcānāṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇānāṃ śravaṇasparśanadarśanarasanaghrāṇalakṣaṇo vyāpāro vṛttirityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4974: tatra karaṇanirdeśe śrotrendriyasya prākpāṭhāttadviṣayanirdeśātilaṃghane prayojanaṃ nāstīti kṛtvā śabdādiṣu pañcānāmityeva paṭhitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4979: tadyathā bhaikṣamātramasmingrāme labhyata ityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti jñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4981: evamālocanamātramindriyāṇāmiṣyate vṛttirityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4982: tena kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ? yaduktamanyairācāryaiḥ sāmānyajñānamindriyāṇāṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ buddheriti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4983: āha, kaḥ punarasmindarśane doṣo yata etatpratiṣidyata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4985: yadi khalvindriyasya sāmānyajñānaṃ na syāttena viśeṣāpekṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāpekṣaśca viśeṣa iti yatra sāmānyajñānaṃ tatra viśeṣajñānamapi na pratiṣidhyata
GSP31yuktdipu:4988: viśeṣavato vāntaḥkaraṇasya kaḥ sāmānyena virodha ityubhayasyāpi tatra sambhavādindriyānarthakyam
GSP31yuktdipu:5004: yadi pradīpavadindriyaṃ prakāśakaṃ syāttena yathā tatprakāśiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvartheṣu karaṇāntaramārgaṇamevamatrāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5007: antaḥkaraṇasadbhāvādayuktamiti cet syānmatam- asti kāraṇāntaraṃ buddhilakṣaṇaṃ yadindriyeṇa pradīpavatprakāśitamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5026: ucyate- viṣayasamparkāttādrūpyāpattirindriyavṛttigrahaṇaṃ, tathā viṣayendriyavṛttyanukāreṇa niścayo gaurayaṃ śuklo dhāvatītyevamādiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5029: vartamānakālatā, grahaṇasyānubhavāttu saṃskārādhānaṃ tatpūrvikā ca smṛtiriti trikālaviṣayā pratyayasyetyayamanayorviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5031: saṃskārāttu ghaṭādīnāṃ vyavadhānarūpaṃ pārthivaṃ chāyālakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvāya kalpate, cakṣuṣo 'nugrahāya /
GSP31yuktdipu:5037: bhūtebhya ityanena svaviṣayopalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ hīndriyāṇāṃ bhūtaprakṛtitve sati nirvahati (?)
GSP31yuktdipu:5040: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇi pañcendriyāṇi bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5044: evaṃ bhautikānīndriyāṇi svasvaviṣayamadhigantumutsahanta iti tallakṣaṇatvameṣāṃ sidhyatīti, ato bhūtebhya ityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5046: evaṃ hi sāṃkhyavṛddhā āhuḥ- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi arthaṃ sādhayitumarhanti nānyathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5047: tathā hi kārakaṃ kārakatvādeva prāpyakāri bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5048: bhautikāni cendriyāṇi kathaṃ prāpyakārīṇi duravartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ ? āhaṃkārikāṇāṃ tu teṣāṃ vyāpakatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5049: viṣayākārapariṇāmātmikā vṛttirvṛttimato 'nanyā satī sambhavatyeveti suvacaṃ prāpyakāritvam api ca mahadaṇuguṇagrahaṇamāhaṅkāritve teṣāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:5051: bhautikatve hi yatparimāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ tatparimāṇaṃ grāhyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5055: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthānāṃ tu vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandalakṣaṇā yathākramaṃ vṛttayaḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5057: tasmādya evārthapratyāyanasamartho varṇasamudāyaḥ padavākyaślokagranthalakṣaṇaḥ sa vāgindriyasyārtho nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5061: tataśca yadeva prakṣālanaparimārjanopasparśanādhyayanapraharaṇaśilpavyāyāmādi kṛtsnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa indriyārthā nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5066: ataśca ya evāśitapītavipariṇāmasya samyakstrotomārgānusāriṇo visargaḥ sa indriyārtho nānyaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5070: āha, prāgantaḥkaraṇavṛttinirdeśaḥ, sargakramānugamātpūrvaṃ buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ vṛttinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5071: kiṃ kāraṇam ? evaṃ hi sargakramo 'nugato bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5075: tathā ca vakṣyati- dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiriti (ISk 30) /
GSP31yuktdipu:5076: tasmātsargakrameṇa vinā tannirdeśaḥ prāgācāryeṇa kriyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5079: kā nu bhoḥ saṃjñā māturudare 'vasthitaṃ kumāraṃ pratyabhinirviśata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5090: athavā naiva vayamidaṃ praṣṭavyā yathā prāgantaḥkaraṇavṛttinirdeśaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5094: yathā buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ hi saukṣmyānna śakyaṃ svarūpamabhidhātumityato vṛttireva lakṣaṇabhāvenopadiśyate
GSP31yuktdipu:5095: śrotrādīnāmapi ca saukṣmyāllakṣaṇamapadeṣṭumaśakyamiti vṛttirevocyate, na lakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5100: tadeva vṛttitvenācakṣāṇaḥ śrotrādīnāmeva cābhidadhānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cāpyācakṣāṇo vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvaṃ jñāpayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5101: anyathā tu yathādhyavasāyādi lakṣaṇamevaṃ rūpādiṣu pañcānāmalocanamātraṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:5103: śrotrādivad buddhyādīnāmapi vyavasāyādayo vṛttirityucyate, na tu lakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5104: tasmādanyathā nirdeśo jñāpakaṃ vṛttivṛttimatoranyatvasyeti vyākhyātā karaṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5107: eṣeti sarvanāmnā pratyākṛṣṭāṃ tāmeva pratyakṣaṃ prati nirdiśati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5125: taiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaḥ prāṇa iti vedānteṣvapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5129: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya vyāpāro bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5133: kiṃ tu sāmānyakaraṇavṛttyā preryamāṇo vāyustatpravaṇatvāttatkāryatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5134: tatra prāṇādikārye vāyau prāṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā evamucyate- prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5136: 'rthāntarapreritasya vāyoriyaṃ kriyā bhavati na punaḥ svatantrasyeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5138: iheyamakasmādbhinnā kriyāvāyoḥ svato vā syāt, karaṇavṛttivyatiriktatvādvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5140: kasmāt ? sarvatra prasaṃgāt svābhāvike hi vāyordiksaṃcāre 'bhyupagamyamāne sarvatra tatsaṃbhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5153: sa cāyaṃ vāyureka eva sthānasaṃcāraviśeṣānnānākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5154: yathaiko devadattaḥ pācako lāvaka iti kvacit /
GSP31yuktdipu:5165: yo 'yaṃ mukhanāsikābhyāṃ sañcarati so 'ntarvṛttirvāyuḥ prāṇa ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5166: yā kācitpraṇatirnāma bhūteṣu tadyathā praṇateyaṃ senā, praṇato 'yaṃ vṛkṣaḥ, praṇato 'yaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:5167: dharme, praṇato 'yamarthe, praṇato 'yaṃ kāme, praṇato 'yaṃ vidyāyām /
GSP31yuktdipu:5171: tadyathā mahatā vā duḥkhenābhiplutasya mahatā vā bandhunā viyuktasya, sahitasya vā saurabheyasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:5174: yo 'yaṃ rasaṃ dhātūn śukraṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vātārtavagarbhāṃścākarṣannadhogacchannayamantarvṛttirvāyurapāna ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5175: yaccāpi kiṃcidapakramaṇaṃ nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā apakrānto
GSP31yuktdipu:5178: balavattaraścāyaṃ prāṇodvāyoḥ kasmāt ? eṣā hyetaṃ prāṇamūrdhvaṃ vartamānamarvāgeva sanniyacchati
GSP31yuktdipu:5183: yastvayaṃ prāṇāpānayormadhye hṛdyavatiṣṭhate sa samāno vāyurantarvṛttiḥ yaścāpi kaścitsaha bhāvo nāma bhūteṣu dvandvārāmatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5184: tadyathā saha dāsye, saha yakṣye, saha tapaścariṣyāmi saha bhāryāputrairbandhubhiḥ suhṛdbhiśca vartiṣya bāhyā samānavṛttireṣā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5187: eṣa hyetau prāṇāpānau ūrdhvamarvākca vartamānau madhya eva sanniyacchati, madhya eva sanniruṇaddhi, sa caiṣau 'trābhivyakto
GSP31yuktdipu:5189: tadyathā srutasārasya vā sārameyasya, anaḍuho voḍhabhārasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:5191: prāṇānte sarvaprāṇināṃ prāṇāpānāvutsṛjyordhvamadhaśca muktayoktrau hayāviva viṣamaṃ saṃcārayan śarīraṃ sa parāsyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5193: yastvayaṃ prāṇāpānasamānānāṃ sthānānyatikramya rasaṃ dhātūṃścādāya mūrdhānamārohati tataśca pratihato nivṛttaḥ sthānakaraṇānupradānaviśeṣādvarṇapadavākyaślokagranthalakṣaṇasya śabdasyābhivyaktinimittaṃ bhavati ayamantarvṛttirvāyurudāna ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5194: yaścāpi kaścidātmotkarṣo nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā hīnādasmi śreyān, sadṛśena vā sadṛśaḥ, sadṛśādasmi śreyān, śreyasā vā sadṛśaḥ, śreyaso vā śreyān /
GSP31yuktdipu:5202: bhavati śītodakena vā paryukṣitasya prāsamasiṃ vikośaṃ codyatamabhipaśyataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5204: yastvayamālomanakhāccharīraṃ vyāpya rasādīnāṃ dhātūnāṃ pṛthivyādināṃ vyūhaṃ marmaṇāṃ ca praspandanaṃ prāṇādīnāṃ ca sthitiṃ karoti so
GSP31yuktdipu:5206: yaścāpi kaścidatyantāvinābhāvo nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā pativratā bhartāraṃ mṛtamapyanugacchati bhavāntare 'pyayameva bhartā syāt tathā dharmādibhistadviparītaiśceti bāhyo vyānaviṣaya evaiṣa prabhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5208: katham ? anena hi vyāpte śarīradaṇḍake tadvaśīkṛtānāṃ prāṇādīnāṃ samā sthitirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5211: tadyathā hā tarhi pādau haimau śītībhūtau gulphe jaṅghe urū kaṭirudaramuraḥkaṇṭhe 'sya khuraghuro vartate hū(?) ityavaiṣo bāhyo vyāna iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5212: evamete prāṇādyāḥ sthānakāryaviśeṣasūcitāḥ pañca vāyavo vyākhyātāḥ teṣāṃ prerikā sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5215: āha ca vṛttirantaḥ samastānāṃ karaṇānāṃ pradīpavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:5217: sā yāvadaniruddhā tu hanti vāyuṃ rajo 'dhikā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5224: yasmādāha- tatra saṃvidahaṃkāragataṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ pūrayati yasmāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5237: tadetatprāṇāṣṭamaṃ vaikārikaṃ guṇaśarīrasya paridraṣṭuḥ kṣetrajñasya śarīramādadānasya nityaṃ stambhasthānīyaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5239: anityāni punarbhautikāni bāhyāni kuśamṛttikāsthānīyāni upacīyante ceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5240: āha, kutaḥ punariyaṃ prāṇādivṛttiḥ pravartata iti ? ucyate- sā karmayonibhyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5241: mahataḥ pracyutaṃ hi rajo vikṛtam aṇḍasthānīyāḥ pañca karmayonayo bhavanti- dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā vividiṣā avividiṣeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5242: āha ca pracyuto mahato yastu na prāpto jñānalakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5250: tatra yadāyaṃ jantuḥ śubhāśubheṣu kāryeṣu vṛttyanusārī jijñāsurajijñāsurvā śarīraṃ parityajati tāmeva karmayonimupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5253: āha ca vāci karmaṇi saṃkalpe pratijñāṃ yo na rakṣati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5256: dānaṃ parigrahaḥ śaucaṃ śraddhāyāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam //
GSP31yuktdipu:5257: sukhārthī yastu seveta vidyāṃ karma tapāṃsi vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5258: prāyaścittaparo nityaṃ sukhāyāṃ sa tu vartate //
GSP31yuktdipu:5273: uktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaviṣayasatattvaṃ traiguṇyasamanvayaṃ ca pañcānām /
GSP31yuktdipu:5274: yonīnāṃ yo vidyādyativṛṣabhaṃ taṃ tvahaṃ manye //
GSP31yuktdipu:5282: apānaviṣayastvapakramaṇaṃ dharmādiviṣaya evāparoddhavyamevaṃ hyasya khyātiviṣayākārasya tamaso nirhrāsaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5289: atyantāvinābhāvaṃ ca vyānaviṣayaṃ jñānaviṣaya eva bhāvayet /
GSP31yuktdipu:5293: 'yaṃ dharmādiṣu pravaṇastatpratipakṣāpakrāntaḥ sattvārāmo vinivṛttābhimāno jñānaniṣṭhaḥ saviśuddhayoniracireṇa parama brahmopapadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5294: āha ca bāhyāṃ prāṇavivṛttiṃ samyaṅmārge budhaḥ pratiṣṭhāpya /
GSP31yuktdipu:5300: āha, yeyamekaikasmin rūpādāvarthe karaṇacatuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ sā kiṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:5301: yugapat āhosvit krameṇeti ? kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet ubhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5306: ato naḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ cakṣurmanovadyugapadasya vṛttiḥ, āhosvinmadhvādivatkrameṇeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5309: ? sa cetsapyagupadekṣyasi ko nirbandhastadeva pratipadyāmahe iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5310: yadyavaṃ tasmādidamasmaddarśanam yugapaccatuṣṭayasya tu vṛttiḥ tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇārthaḥ yugapadevetyarthaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5312: tatra na śakyata etadvaktuṃ sati śaktisadbhāve viṣayasambandhe ca kasyacittatra vṛttiḥ kasyacinneti
GSP31yuktdipu:5315: yadi hi krameṇa śrotrādīnāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca bāhye 'rthe vṛttiḥ syādapi tarhi
GSP31yuktdipu:5321: kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmādasmākaṃ kramaśaśca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5328: tadyathā cakṣustvacoḥ samānadeśatve śaktiviṣayasambandhopapattau rajodhūmātapādigataḥ sparśa evopalabhyate, na rūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5330: tasmāt dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe kramaśa eva catuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5342: tatra duṣṭe kramaḥ prati nāsti sandehaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5343: yatpunaretaduktaṃ dṛṣṭe meghastanitakṛṣṭasarpālocanādau kramānupalabdheryugapaccatuṣṭayasya vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ- etadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5344: kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmāt trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5351: tatra yaduktaṃ meghastanitādiṣu kramānanugate yugapaccatuṣṭayasya vṛttirityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5354: 'haṃkārabuddhīnāmantaḥkaraṇānāṃ bāhyenaikena karaṇena śrotreṇa vā cakṣuṣā vā saha catuṣṭayasyetyarthaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5358: kramaśaśca krameṇaiva, yatastrayasyāntaḥkaraṇasya tatpūrvikā bāhyendriyapūrvikā vṛttiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5359: yadā yathānubhavastathā saṃskāraḥ, yathā ca saṃskārastathā smṛtirityevaṃ vṛttirbāhyendriyapūrviketi kārikā 31
GSP31yuktdipu:5360: āha, kiṃ punareṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ svaviṣayaniyamena vṛttirbhavati āhosvidvyatikareṇeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5361: ucyate- nanu ca prāgeva rūpādiṣu pañcānāmālocanamātramiṣyate vṛttiriti (ISk 28) coktvācāryeṇānte 'padiṣṭaṃ saiṣā bhavatyasāmānyeti (ISk
GSP31yuktdipu:5367: iha karaṇāntareṇa cakṣuṣāmradāḍimādirūpopalabdhau satyāṃ karaṇāntarasya jihvālakṣaṇasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiścopalabdhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5374: kiṃ tarhi svāṃ svāṃ pratipadyante parasparākūtahetukīṃ vṛttim /
GSP31yuktdipu:5375: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5376: yasya karaṇasya yā vṛttirapadiṣṭā tadyathā śrotrasya śabdagrahaṇam,
GSP31yuktdipu:5383: parasparākūtaṃ pratipatteḥ kāraṇamiti kṛtvā tācchabdyaṃ labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5385: etaduktaṃ bhavati yadā cakṣuṣāmradāḍimādi rūpamupalabdhaṃ bhavati tadā rasanendriyamupāttaviṣayasya cakṣuṣo vṛttiṃ saṃvedya svaviṣayajighṛkṣayautsuktavadvikāramāpadyate, rasanasya vṛtiṃ saṃvedya
GSP31yuktdipu:5386: pādau viharaṇamārabhete hastāvādānaṃ, tāvadyāvadasau viṣayo rasanendriyayogyatāṃ nītaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5396: indriyāntaraṃ cedindriyāntarasya vṛttiṃ saṃvedya svārthamākāṃkṣet, prāptamasya dvāritvamitarasya
GSP31yuktdipu:5401: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasya paṭoḥ sahacāriṇamarthamindriyāntaraviṣayatāmāpannaṃ saṃspṛśya svabhāvata indriyāntaraṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati sākāṃkṣaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5406: yathā buddheḥ prasādamanantaraṃ bhautikānāmavayavānāṃ mukhanayanādīnāṃ prasādo bhavati, na caiṣāṃ pratyayavattvam, evamihāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5410: athavā parasparaviṣayamākūtaṃ parasparākūtam, yathā jalaviṣayaḥ puruṣaḥ jalapuruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5413: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yathā kiṃcidindriyaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ bhavati tadā
GSP31yuktdipu:5416: tathā ca tantrāntare 'pyuktaṃ- “yasya yasyendriyasya viṣayaṃ manodhyāyatyabhisampattyarthena tasya tasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiśca bhavatīti /” etaduktaṃ svāṃ svāṃ pratipadyante parasparākūtahetukīṃ vṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5417: kimindriyaṃ manovṛttyādhiṣṭhāya svaviṣaye pravartayati yathā paraśvādīṃścaitra iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5419: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasaṃkalpānugṛhītasya manasaḥ saṃsparśātsvayamevendriyaṃ svaviṣayaṃ pratipadyate
GSP31yuktdipu:5422: na hi yathā caitrasya paraśvādiprayogaśaktiḥ siddhā evaṃ manasa indriyaprayogaśaktiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5424: raja iti cetsyānmatam, rajaso hīndriyāntaraprayogasāmarthyaṃ vidyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5428: hi tarhi rajo 'stītyata ātmabhūtenaivāsya nimittena pravṛttirapratiṣiddhā,
GSP31yuktdipu:5429: kiṃ manasā parikalpiteneti ? kiṃ cānyat, karaṇāntarānupapatteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5430: caitro hi paraśvādīnāṃ prayogaṃ karaṇāntareṇa karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5433: tadapi hi caitravyāpārāpekṣaṃ pravartate na svataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5435: yasya hi prayojakāntarāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ na tasya kadācidapi svatantrasya bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5438: na cetkārakaṃ yathā maulānāṃ guṇānāmevamihāpi puruṣārtha evaṃ heturna kena citkāryate karaṇamiti siddham // 31 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5463: evaṃ hi parikalpyamāne pradhānamahatoryadantarālaṃ tadapi ca kriyārūpatvādakriyāvata upākhyāntaramiti tattvāntarānavasthāprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5471: tatra vaktavyam kā kriyā, kiṃ ca tatkriyate
GSP31yuktdipu:5473: ucyate- yaduktaṃ kā kriyetyatra brūmaḥ- tannirvartakamihābhipretāt na daṇḍādivat, kiṃ tarhi tadāharaṇadhāraṇaprakāśakaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:5475: dhāraṇaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi kurvanti, viṣayasannidhāne sati śrotrādivṛttestadrūpāpatteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5482: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā daśadheti pañca viśeṣāḥ pañcāviśeṣāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5494: aviśeṣābhidhānād buddhyādipratipattirayukteti cetsyānmatam, aviśeṣeṇedamuktamācāryeṇa antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5495: tatra kathamidamavagamyate buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ grahaṇābhipretaṃ, na punaranyeṣāmiti ? ucyate- na, prathamasaṃkhyāvyatikramahetvanupapatteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5496: buddhyādisaṃkhyāṃ hi vyatikramamāṇasya pratipattau nāsti hetuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5499: śrotrasyāntaḥkaraṇatvaprasaṃgādayuktamiti cet syādetat- buddhimahaṃkāraṃ coktvā tata āha buddhīndriyāṇi karṇatvakcakṣūrasananāsikākhyānīti (ISk 26)
GSP31yuktdipu:5510: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhamityukte gamyata etatpariśeṣādeva daśadhā bāhyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5514: akriyamāṇe tvasmin kintat trayasya viṣayākhyamiti na jñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5517: tatra śeṣe vā yathānyāsaṃ vocyamāne na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5518: athavā nedaṃ bāhyasaṃjñāpratipattyarthamārabhyate, kiṃ tarhi niyamārtham /
GSP31yuktdipu:5520: daśadhā bāhyaṃ śabdādiviṣayagrahaṇabhūtameva trayasyāpi viṣayākhyaṃ yathā
GSP31yuktdipu:5526: buddhyahaṃkāramanolakṣaṇasya hi trayasyopāttaviṣayā buddhīndriyakarmendriyavṛttayaḥ samparkādviṣayarūpapratyavabhāsanimittatāmupagacchantyo viṣayākhyatāṃ labhante /
GSP31yuktdipu:5528: buddhistu niścayarūpatvātkaraṇāntaranirapekṣā sarvamarthaṃ pravṛttau prati niścayarūpeṇādhyastaṃ puruṣāyopasaṃharati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5529: tatra śabdādisannidhāne vṛttīnāṃ tādrūpyāpattestadapagame ca tādrūpyāpagamāt prāpyakāri /
GSP31yuktdipu:5534: tatra kiṃ tathaiva pratipattavyamathendriyāṇāṃ viṣayaviśeṣo 'stīti ? atha coktaṃ kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā viśeṣalakṣaṇamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5535: tatra kena karaṇena kasya viṣayasya grahaṇamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5538: teṣāṃ pūrvoktānāmindriyāṇāṃ yāni buddhīndriyāṇi pañca śrotrādīni tāni viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇi pratipattṛbhedena /
GSP31yuktdipu:5539: tatra devānāṃ yāni indriyāṇi tāni dharmotkarṣādviśuddhānyaviśeṣānapi gṛhṇanti prāgeva viśeṣāt, yogināṃ ca saṃprāptaviśeṣāṇām /
GSP31yuktdipu:5544: vāgindriyasya vāyvabhihateṣu vadanapradeśeṣu tālvādiṣu dhvanervarṇapadavākyaślokagranthabhāvena vikārāpādanaṃ sarvaprāṇināmaviśiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5554: sambhāvanārthamapi ca pañcaviṣayāṇyetāni prāgeva tu catustriviṣayāṇīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5555: āha, kathametadavagamyate viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi, na punarasadviṣayāṇi iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5565: yatra nāsti kiṃcid bhūtārthena pratyakṣaṃ yadapyekṣyetarat pratyakṣābhāsaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5571: tathā hi gandharvanagarādiṣu kadācittamevārthaṃ gāṃ paśyati, kaścidgajaṃ paśyati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5573: svapne caikamūrtipatitānāṃ gopuruṣāśvarāsabhanadīvṛkṣaprabhṛtīnāṃ darśanaṃ smaraṇe viparyayeṇa dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5575: vicchinnānāṃ cāvayavānāṃ punaḥ sandhānaṃ ākāśagamanamanīśvarasyānimittaṃ rājyalābha iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5581: śukravisargavaditi cet, syādetat- yathā dvayasamāptipūrvakaḥ śukravisargaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5582: sa ca tadabhāve 'pi svapne bhavati, evamitaratsyāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5595: iha pratyakṣaṃ balīya ityapratyakṣasya tena pratyākhyānamupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5599: syādetat- yadi paramārthato narakapālāḥ syusteṣāmapi duḥkhasambandhaḥ syāt, mūrtimattvāviśeṣāt
GSP31yuktdipu:5614: na cedasanto yuktamupadiṣṭaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi teṣāṃ pañca viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇīti // 34 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5620: āha, karaṇāviśeṣādayuktam antaḥkaraṇasya hīndriyānāṃ ca karaṇatvamaviśiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5624: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5627: atra cāntaḥkaraṇagrahaṇenaiva buddhergrahaṇe siddhe bhūyo buddhigrahaṇaṃ prādhānyakhyāpanārtham
GSP31yuktdipu:5629: tadyathā jagāma taṃ vanoddeśaṃ vyāsaḥ saha maharṣibhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5630: iti maharṣigrahaṇe vyāso 'pyantarbhūtaḥ prādhānyātpṛthagucyate, evaṃ sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate, viśiṣṭānaviśiṣṭāṃśca śabdādīnsannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭavyavahitānpramāṇabalena svavṛtte
GSP31yuktdipu:5634: tadyathā prāsādasya pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimānāṃ svadiṅniyamo na pūrvamuttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ paścimaṃ vā kadācidbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5636: tatrāniyatāḥ sarvadigavasthitairdvāraiḥ pravartanta evamihāpi śrotrādīni svaviṣayaniyatāni
GSP31yuktdipu:5637: sāntaḥkaraṇā tu buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate yasmāt tasmādaniyataviṣayatvādupapannamettrividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri, dvārāṇi śeṣāṇīti // 35 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5640: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5643: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśaka evaṃ karaṇamapi, tadvyāpāre sati viṣayāvirbhāvānupapatteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5647: guṇaviśeṣā ityanena sattvādīnāṃ puruṣavijñānamuddiśya tadbhāvena pariṇāmaṃ khyāpayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5648: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthamiti viśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ āhāryadhāryaprakāśyatayā yathāsambhavaṃ prakāśya svavṛttyanuguṇaṃ kṛtvā viṣayavyāpāreṇānubhūya buddhāvādhatte, atadviṣayatāmāpādayatītyarthaḥ kadācittu buddhireva bāhyakaraṇasaṃkalpābhimānagṛhītam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5649: sarvathā tvayaṃ śāstrārtho yena vā tena karaṇena viṣayamupāttaṃ buddhiradhyavasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5650: tayā cādhyavasāyarūpāpannayā cetanāśaktiranugṛhyate na karaṇāntarasya puruṣeṇa samabandho 'sti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5653: āha, kaḥ punaratra heturyena dvāritvāviśeṣe satyahaṃkāramanasī buddhau viṣayādhānaṃ kuruto na punaranayoḥ sākṣātpuruṣeṇa sambandha iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5655: sarva pratyupabhogaṃ yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5657: / aniścitaviṣayayā ca karaṇavṛttyā puruṣasya samandho 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5661: atastadvṛttyupanipātī viṣayaḥ sannidhānamātrātpuruṣeṇa saṃcetito nāsyaudāsīnyaṃ bādhitumutsahate, no khalvapyānarthakyamanuṣajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5662: etaduktaṃ sarvaṃ pratyupabhogaṃ yasmātpuruṣasya sādhayati buddhiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5663: āha, evamapi śabdādilakṣaṇo viṣayaḥ prakṛtaḥ, sa ca buddhyā sarvaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5670: yasmāt saiva ca viśinaṣṭi punaḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5671: yato yasmātkāraṇāt sā buddhireva hi kāṣṭhāpannena tamasābhibhūtatvāddharmādīnāṃ sattvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtibhūtānvikārabhūtānparatantrānupakāryānupakārakānacetanānsaṃsargadharmiṇaśca guṇānātmatvenādhyavasya puruṣāyopaharati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5672: sa ca mithyājñānābhyāsavāsanānurañjitaṃ buddhipratyayamanurudhyamāno darśitaviṣayatvāttathaiva pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5673: yadā tu dharmādyabhyāsāttamorūpāgame satyuttarottarāṇāṃ sattvadharmāṇamutkarṣastadā vinivṛttamithyāpratyayā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5676: tato viparītāśca guṇā iti śuddhādhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5684: tasya ca purastāduddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ- kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā pañca viśeṣā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5686: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmādidameva tāvaducyatāṃ ke viśeṣāḥ, ke 'viśeṣā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5688: tanmātrāṇyaviśeṣāḥ yāni tanmātrāṇi pañcāhaṃkārādutpadyante iti prāgapadiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5695: sati viśeṣā udātānudāttasvaritānunāsikādayastatra na santi tasmācchabdatanmātram /
GSP31yuktdipu:5705: utpadyante ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ tatra śabdatanmātrādākāśam, sparśatanmātrādvāyuḥ, rūpatanmātrāttejaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5707: tebhyo bhūtānītyetāvati vaktavye pañca pañcabhya iti grahaṇaṃ samasaṃkhyākatastadutpattijñāpanārtham
GSP31yuktdipu:5709: tataśca yadanyeṣāmācāryāṇāmabhipretam ekalakṣaṇebhyastanmātrebhyaḥ parasparānupraveśādekottarā viśeṣāḥ sṛjyanta iti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5710: kintarhi antareṇāpi tanmātrānupraveśamekottarebhyo bhūtebhya ekottarāṇāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāmutpattiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5716: atra ca vāyoḥ śītaḥ sparśa apāṃ ca, tejasa uṣṇaḥ, anuṣṇāśītaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5717: rūpaṃ ca śuklaṃ bhāsvaraṃ ca tejaso 'pāṃ ca, kṛṣṇaṃ pṛthivyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5724: ākāro gaurāṃ raukṣyaṃ varaṇaṃ sthairyameva ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5728: snehaḥ saukṣmyaṃ prabhā śauklyaṃ mārdavaṃ gauravaṃ ca yat /
GSP31yuktdipu:5730: ūrdhvagaṃ pāvakaṃ dagdhṛ pācakaṃ laghu bhāsvaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:5736: saṃhatānāṃ tu yatkāryaṃ sāmānyaṃ te gavādayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5738: tatrākārādidharmaiḥ pṛthivyā lokasya copakriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5765: pācakatvātsvedya svedanamannapaktiḥ pṛthivyavayavānāṃ kriyāyogyatā, tathā bāhyāntarapariṇāmaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5770: tathā tiryakpātādibhirdharmairvāyunā lokasya copakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5780: tathā sarvatogatyādibhirdharmairnabhasā lokasyopakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5791: tadete yathā vyākhyātā aviśeṣā viśeṣāḥ puruṣārthasiddhyarthaṃ bahudhā vyavatiṣṭhante /
GSP31yuktdipu:5798: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtaistridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5799: tatra sūkṣmā nāma ceṣṭāśritaṃ prāṇāṣṭakaṃ saṃsarati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5808: yathā kośakāraḥ kośenāveṣṭito 'svatantraḥ, evaṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ saprāṇametairāveṣṭitamasvatantraṃ tattatkarmopacinoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5810: tatra devānāṃ caturvidhaṃ śarīraṃ pradhānānugrahāt, yathā paramarṣerviriñcasya ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5811: tatsiddhibhyo yathā brahmaṇaḥ putrāṇāṃ tatputraputrāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5817: tiryagyonīnāmapi caturvidham jarāyujaṃ gavādīnāmaṇḍajaṃ caiva pakṣiṇām /
GSP31yuktdipu:5820: tatra kecinniyatāḥ kecidaniyatā ityāha- ke punaratra niyatāḥ, ke vāniyatāḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5828: mātāpitṛjāśca prabhūtāśca ityato yukta eṣāṃ parigrahaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5833: priyaṃ khalvapi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣya kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5841: tadetadadyāpyanuvartate- yatpriyaṃ cirādālokya pāṇau saṃspṛśya prītirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5846: strīpuṃsau saṃdhṛṣyāpatyamutpādayetāṃ mamedaṃ mamedamiti ca parigrahāḥ pravṛttāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5849: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvadvaivartaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛsaṃsargakāle karaṇāviṣṭaṃ śukraśoṇitamanupraviśati
GSP31yuktdipu:5851: vyūḍhāvayavaṃ tūpalabdhapratyayaṃ māturudarānnissṛtya yau dharmādharmau ṣaṭsiddhyupabhogakāle kṛtau tadvaśādavatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5853: yadi dharmasaṃskṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ tato dyudeśaṃ sūkṣmaśarīreṇa prāpyate, tadviparyayāttu yātanāsthānaṃ tiryagyoniṃ vā, miśrībhāvena mānuṣyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5854: evamātivāhikaṃ sūkṣmaśarīramindriyāṇāṃ dhāraṇaprāpaṇasamarthaṃ nityaṃ bāhyenāpāyinā pariveṣṭyate parityajyate ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5855: patañjalestu sūkṣmaśarīraṃ yatsiddhikāle pūrvamindriyāṇi bījadeśaṃ nayati tatra tatkṛtāśayavaśāt dyudeśaṃ yātanāsthānaṃ vā karaṇāni vā prāpayya nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5856: tatra caivaṃ yuktāśayasya karmavaśādanyadutpadyate yadindriyāṇi bījadeśaṃ nayati tadapi
GSP31yuktdipu:5867: punaścānyadutpadyate, tat sūkṣmāsteṣāṃ niyatā iti vacanādasmābhirnābhyupagamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5872: na hi liṅgaṃ kvacidvyāhanyate, kiṃ tarhi likṣādi bījamapyāviśati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5876: mahadādītyanena prāṇāṣṭakaṃ parigṛhṇāti pūrvātmānaḥ prāṇādyāśca pañca vāyava iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5887: dyutiryakpreteṣu saṃsaratīti tenaiva cārthasiddhau śarīrāntaraparikalpanānarthakyamato na bahūni śarīrāṇi // 40 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5904: tasmāt citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5905: tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // ISk_41 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5906: yathā hi citrasya kuḍyamṛte 'vasthānaṃ nāsti, sthāṇupuruṣādibhyo vā vinā cchāyāyāḥ tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5919: atha matamagṛhyamāṇena sambandhāt sthūlasyāpi śarīrasyāgrahaṇaṃ pretāñjanasiddhamālyādivat
GSP31yuktdipu:5937: kṛtsnasyāśayasya pariṇāmaṃ jānannevamupālabhyaḥ syādekadeśastu no vipariṇāmī /
GSP31yuktdipu:5951: tatra kṛteneti cet na, kalalādyavasthānāśe tadasambhavāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5952: tatra kṛtābhyāṃ hi bījāveśaḥ karaṇasya niṣpādito yāvatkalalādyasthāyāmeva taccharīraṃ vinaṣṭamiti tatra kṛtāśayasyāsambhavāccharīrāntarānupapattiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5954: āśayasya sthāvaraśarīrārambhe caritārthatvātsthāvaraśarīreṇa cāśayopādānasambhavāttasya saṃsārābhāvaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5956: yāvacca sa puruṣārtho na parisamāpyate tāvattiṣṭhata iti // 41
GSP31yuktdipu:5959: tatsamanantaramevānena puruṣārtho 'vasāyayitavyo na punardevamānuṣatiryagbhāvena punaḥ punarājañjavībhāvo 'nuṣṭhātavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5963: yadyapi puruṣārthasiddhyarthaṃ liṅgamutpadyate, tathāpi sattvarajastamasāṃ trayāṇāmapi prādhānyādrajastamobhyāmabhibhūte sattve tatpreritaṃ nimittanaimittikaśarīrendriyaviṣayopabhoganirvartakaṃ śṛṇoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5965: tatra phalecchayā yonīḥ prāṇādīṃśca sammukhīkṛtya kriyāmārabhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5967: tataśca prakṛtervibhutvayogāttena tena nimittenopasthāpitaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakpretādiśarīramekasvabhāvamapi sannaṭavadvyavatiṣṭhate liṅgamākṛtiviśeṣopādānatyāgasāmyataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5972: āha, bhāvā iti tatra bhavatābhidhīyate, na cāsya śabdasyārthaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:5979: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvaddvividhaṃ jñānaṃ prākṛtikaṃ vaikṛtikaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5981: tatra tattvasamakālaṃ saṃhataśca mahāṃstattvātmanā mahati pratyayo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5985: vaikṛtaṃ tu dvividhaṃ svavaikṛtaṃ paravaikṛtaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5988: āha ca tattvasamaṃ vaivartam tatrābhiṣyandikaṃ dvitīyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5991: vaikṛtamapi ca dvividhaṃ svavaikṛtaṃ tatra tārakaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5996: tatra paramarṣerapi sargasaṃghātavyūhottarakālameva jñānaṃ niṣpadyate yasmād gurumukhābhipratipatteḥ pratipatsyata ityapītyāha- siddhaṃ nimittaṃ naimittikasyānugrahaṃ kurute,
GSP31yuktdipu:5999: tatra paramarṣeḥ paṭurūhaḥ anyeṣāṃ kliṣṭa ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6000: sarveṣāmeva tu tārakādyaviśiṣṭamācārya āha- trividhā bhāvāḥ sāṃsiddhikāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtikāśceti
GSP31yuktdipu:6003: katham ? yadi hi tathā syāttattvāntarānutpattisaṃghāto vyūhaścānarthakaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6004: mahatyutpannaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivopalabdhamiti kaḥ saṃghātārthaḥ ? tathā carṣerūho nopapadyate, pratibandhābhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6007: tasmādasya sahaiva kāryakāraṇābhyāṃ jñānamabhiniṣpadyate pradīpaprakāśādityataḥ sāṃsiddhikam
GSP31yuktdipu:6008: / anyeṣāṃ tu sattvasyāpaṭutvātkālāntareṇa prakṛtyabhiṣyandād drāgiti bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6020: tasyāmapahatāyāṃ prakṛteḥ śuddhisrotaḥ pravṛttaṃ yenānugṛhīto duḥkhatrayābhighātādutpannajijñāsaḥ pravrajitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6024: evaṃ trividhabhāvaparigrahāttvācāryasya na sarvaṃ svataḥ patañjalivat, na sarvaṃ parataḥ pañcādhikaraṇavat
GSP31yuktdipu:6025: kintarhi mahatī svabhāvātivṛttiḥ prakṛtito 'lpā svato vikṛtitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6026: evam sāṃsiddhikāśca bhāvāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtāśca dharmādyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6027: dṛṣṭāḥ karaṇāśrayiṇaḥ yathā caite tathā kāryāśrayiṇaśca kalalādyāḥ // ISk_43 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6033: prākṛtaṃ yathāmāhātmyaṃ śarīrābhimānāt tasya hyabhimāno bhavati- hantāhaṃ putrānsrakṣye ye me karma kariṣyanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6043: āha, kasya punarbhāvasyānuṣṭhānātko gamanaviśeṣo liṅgasya niṣpadyata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6051: yadi bhāvānāṃ bhūmiviśeṣanimittatvaṃ niyamyate tenaikasyāṃ bhūmau hīnamadhyamotkṛṣṭatvaṃ jātyākṛtisvabhāvānugrahopaghātānāṃ na prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6052: ucyate- na tarhyanena bhūmiviśeṣo niyamyate, kiṃ tarhi ūrdhvaśabda
GSP31yuktdipu:6054: dharmeṇa deveṣu mānaveṣu tiryakṣu cordhvagamanamutkṛṣṭaṃ janma bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6060: āha, yadi punarvairāgyātpuruṣakaivalyamabhyupagamyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6064: yadi rāganimittaḥ pradhānapuruṣasaṃyogaḥ syāt prāptamidaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa vairāgyeṇa viyogo bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6070: pakṣaḥ, tasya pratipakṣādajñānādbandha iti prāptamasti, na cāsau prāgapi
GSP31yuktdipu:6078: tasmād bandhastrividho bhavati prakṛtibandho dakṣiṇābandho vaikārikabandhaśceti // 44 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6082: vairāgyāt prakṛtilayaḥ vairāgyādaṣṭasu prakṛtiṣu layaṃ gacchati, asāvucyate prakṛtibandha iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6083: āha, yadi vairāgyātprakṛtilayaḥ prāpto yadetatprakṛtau vairāgyamāñjasam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6086: anyaḥ puruṣo nirguṇo, na kāryaṃ, na kāraṇaṃ, na kāryakāraṇaṃ, tadviparītaḥ cetanaḥ svatantraśceti tato 'pi prakṛtau layaḥ tataścānirmokṣaprasaṃga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6089: tataśca viparītaṃ yadeva vairāgyaṃ tuṣṭikāṇḍānupatitaṃ prakṛtyādiṣu paratvābhimānaḥ tata eva prakṛtilayo bhavati nānyasmāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6090: athavātrāpi yattatprakṛtāvanyatvajñānaṃ tata eva mokṣo na vairāgyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6106: dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayābhilāṣadvāreṇa tannirvartake karmaṇi pravartamāno guṇavṛttivaicitryādaniṣṭaphalanirvartakamapi karma karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6107: evaṃ mānuṣye gatyantare yopapattiḥ sarvāsau rāgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6113: viṣaye yo rāgaḥ sa saṃsāraheturityasyārthasya jñāpanārthamidamucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6114: anyathā yo yateḥ sāttviko yamaniyamadhyānādyanuṣṭhānānurāgaḥ pravacanarāgo vā so 'pi
GSP31yuktdipu:6116: aiśvaryādavighātaḥ yadaṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryamaṇimādi prāgupadiṣṭaṃ tasmātsve sve viṣaye
GSP31yuktdipu:6123: jñānavarjitānāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ yatphalaṃ tatrājñānaṃ mūlam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6126: tathetarāṇi paramarṣyādāvadṛṣṭatvād vicitraṃ kāryamekasmātkāraṇādayuktamiti vairāgyādīnyasādhāraṇāni pṛthak kalpyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:6141: pratyayasarga iti pratyayaḥ padārtho lakṣaṇamiti paryāyāḥ, pratyayānāṃ sargaḥ pratyayasargaḥ padārthasargo lakṣaṇasarga ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6143: tasya sargo 'yamataḥ pratyayasargaḥ pratyayakāryaṃ pratyayavyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6148: utpannakāryakaraṇastu māhātmyaśarīra ekākinamātmānamavekṣyābhidadhyau hantāhaṃ putrānsrakṣye ye me karma kariṣyanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6149: ye māṃ paraṃ cāparaṃ ca jñāsyanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6159: sa viparyayākhyaḥ aśaktyākhyaḥ tuṣṭyākhyaḥ siddhyākhyaśceti /” tatrāśreyasaḥ śreyastvenābhidhānaṃ viparyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6178: pañca viparyayabhedā bhavanti tamo moho mahāmohastāmisro 'ndhatāmisra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6179: tatrāśreyasi pravṛttasya pratyayāvare śreyo 'bhimāne ādyo viparyayastama ityabhidhīyate
GSP31yuktdipu:6180: / bhautikeṣvākāreṣu śiraḥpāṇyādiṣvātmagraho yo 'yaṃ vyūḍhoraskaḥ sitadaśanastāmrākṣaḥ pralambabāhuḥ so 'hamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6181: tathā śravaṇasparśanarasanaghrāṇavacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandasaṃkalpābhimānādhyavasāyalakṣaṇāsu karaṇavṛttiṣvahaṃ śrotā draṣṭā cetyevamādirādyakālapravṛtto grahaḥ sarvasmādavaro moha ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6182: kathaṃ punarayamavaraḥ ityucyate pūrvaṃ śarīrendriyavyatiriktamupalabdhumicchansaukṣmyāttattadanadhigame bhūtākāramabhūtaṃ pramāṇaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ vānumanyeta, svayaṃ vā parikalpayediti na mārgād dūrāpagatametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:6184: bāhye tu viṣaye mamedamityabhiniveśaḥ pūrvasmādavara ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6185: pūrvaḥ śarīriṇo 'pratyakṣatvātkaraṇavṛttyaviśeṣād vātmavṛtteḥ kāryakaraṇe kuryādātmabuddhimiti śakyametad bhinnanimittākāradeśasvabhāvaprayojanānugrahopaghātotpattisthitivināśāṃśca mātṛpitṛputrabhrātṛputradāragohirāyavasanācchādanādīnayamakasmādātmatvena paśyati, tasmātpūrvasmādavaraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6187: kathaṃ punarayaṃ pūrvasmādavara iti ? ucyate- pūrvo 'bhiniveśapratiṣedhamabhyanujānāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6188: yadāsya bāhyadravyaviyoge kaścitkuśalasaṃsṛṣṭa evaṃ bravīti saṃsārasya ___
GSP31yuktdipu:6189: buddhāvavasthāpya vimṛśyatāṃ yāvadayaṃ kālo yadi kaścitpriyeṇāviyuktapūrvaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6190: tasmādāgamāpāyiṣu bāhyeṣu dravyeṣu viduṣā nābhiniveśaḥ kārya iti, tadā pratyāha satyamevametaditi
GSP31yuktdipu:6191: sannikṛṣṭastu viyogakāla iti na buddhiravasthāpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6199: na tu brahmādau stambaparyante saṃsāre svanimittaniyatatamapātasya vināśasya kenacitpratīkāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6208: evaṃ caturvidhasya pratyayasargasya guṇavaiṣamyavimardena pañcāśadbhedā bhavanti // 47 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6213: ya ete pañca viparyayabhedā vyākhyātāḥ teṣu tamaso 'ṣṭavidho bhedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6216: mohasya ca kim ? aṣṭavidho bheda iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6224: aṣṭavidhe kāryakaraṇasāmarthye daśavidhe ca kuṭumbe viṣayeṣu vā yaḥ pratihanyamānasyāveśaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:6230: evamete pañca viparyayabhedāḥ svalakṣaṇato viṣayaviśeṣā lakṣitāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6231: tatrāpi cāṣṭāsu prakṛtiṣu sattvarajastamasāṃ saṃhataviviktapariṇatavyastasamastānāṃ paratvābhimānabhedādekaikā prakṛtiḥ pañcadaśabhedā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6232: ata eva te 'ṣṭau pañcadaśa viṃśaṃ śataṃ ca bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6246: tadyathā bādhiryamāndhyamaghratvaṃ mūkatā jaḍatā ca yā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6248: tatra bādhiryaṃ śrotrasya, āndhyaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ, aghratvaṃ nāsikāyāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6249: mūkatā vācaḥ, jaḍatā rasanasya, unmādo manasaḥ, kauṣṭhyaṃ tvacaḥ, kauṇyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:6250: pāṇeḥ, klaibyamupasthasya, udāvartaḥ pāyoḥ, paṅgutā pādayorityevamindriyavadhā ekādaśa /
GSP31yuktdipu:6251: anye tu saptadaśa vadhā buddherviparyayāttuṣṭisiddhīnām // ISk_49 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6252: tatra tuṣṭayaḥ prakṛtyādyā vakṣyamāṇāḥ, tāsāṃ dvividho viparyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6253: avyutpannasya yogadharmeṇa tasyāṃ bhūmāvapravṛttiḥ, vyutpannasya cottarabhūmyaparijñānātpūrvasyāṃ bhūmāvakṣemarūpeṇa grahaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6258: tathā vijitāsmitārūpo mahadādyavasthāpekṣayā tuṣṭaḥ, pūrvabhūmyapekṣayā siddhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6265: tuṣṭistu sannihitaviṣayasantoṣāccikīrṣitādarthādūnena nivṛttiḥ sāmānyata ekaiva, pratyarthamanantā, śatena tuṣṭaḥ sahasreṇeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6266: śāstre tu bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ prāptiṣvapagameṣu vācāvyavasthyalakṣaṇā upāyanavatvānnava tuṣṭayo bhavanti // 49 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6270: ādhyātmikī iti śarīraśarīriṇorviśeṣamupalipsamānena yoginā yadanātmanyātmabuddhiravasthāpyate sā khalvādhyātmikī siddhiḥ tuṣṭiḥ santoṣaḥ kṣema ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6272: yadā vītāvītaiḥ pradhānamadhigamya tatpūrvakatvaṃ ca mahadādīnāṃ vikārāṇāmānantyācca pradhānātmanaḥ kṛtsnasya mahadādibhāvena vipariṇāmāsambhavādekadeśasyāprakṛtivikārabhūtasya bhoktṛtvamakartṛtvaṃ cādhyavasya saṅgadveṣanivṛttiṃ labhate, sādyā tuṣṭirambha ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6273: kasmāt ? amitaṃ hi pradhānatattvaṃ bhāti jagadbījabhūtatvānmahadādibhāvapariṇāmena nyūnasyaikadeśasyātmana
GSP31yuktdipu:6276: tathā ca śāstramāha- ambha iti guṇaliṅgasannicayamevādhikurute /
GSP31yuktdipu:6278: liṅgaṃ ca mahadādi atra sannihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6280: sa khalvayaṃ yogī pradhānalakṣaṇāṃ bhūmimavajitya tanmahimnā ca tadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyatiriktasya padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6281: bhinne ca dehe prakṛtau layaṃ gacchati, tataśca punarāvartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6282: tasyāṃ ca tuṣṭāvanye sapta mahadādikāraṇino 'varuddhā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6283: tatra yathā prādhānikasya puruṣe nāsti vijñānaṃ evamitareṣāmuttareṣu tattveṣu /
GSP31yuktdipu:6286: atrāpi ca sattvādīnāṃ saṃhataviviktapariṇatavyastasamastānāṃ bhedādavidyāvacchedānantyamavaseyam āha, tuṣṭyavidyayorabhedaḥ lakṣaṇaikatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6291: tamaḥpradhānapuruṣopadeśe sati pratyayanirdidhārayiṣayā tayoḥ pradhānameva jyāyo na puruṣa ityabhiniviśeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:6292: tuṣṭistu kiṃ paramityāśritya pravṛttaḥ pradhānajñānamātre santoṣātpadārthāntaraṃ vijñātumeva nādriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6300: tasmānna padārthasaṃkara iti vyākhyātā prakṛtyākhyā tuṣṭiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6301: yadā tu satyapi prakṛtisāmarthye nānapekṣya yathāsvamupādānaṃ bhāvānāmutpattiḥ sambhavati prakṛtyaviśeṣe sarvakālamutpattiprasaṃgāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:6309: upādānaikadeśa eva ca kāryakāraṇavidhātmā bhoktetyetasmād darśanātsaṅgadveṣanivṛttiṃ labhate, sā dvitīyā tuṣṭiḥ salilamityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6314: sa khalvayaṃ yogī pārthivānavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6317: yadā ca satyupādānasāmarthye na tāvataiva bhāvānāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ kiṃ tarhi sannihitasādhanānāmapi kālaṃ pratyapekṣā bhavati-
GSP31yuktdipu:6318: kālaviśeṣādbījādaṅkuro jāyate, aṅkurānnālaṃ, nālātkāṇḍam, kāṇḍātprasava ityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:6329: tadyathā salilaughastṛṇaṃ kāṣṭhamaśmānaṃ prāṇinaṃ vā svamūrtisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ sarvamevābhyāvahati, evamayaṃ kālo garbhādbālyaṃ, bālyātkaumāraṃ, kaumārādyauvanaṃ, yauvanātsthāviryam,
GSP31yuktdipu:6331: tathā cāha yāmeva prathamāṃ rātriṃ garbhe bhavati pūruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6334: sa khalvayaṃ yogī kālamavajitya padārthāntarābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti manyate
GSP31yuktdipu:6337: yadā tu satyapi kālasāmarthye bhāvānāmutpattiḥ bhāgyānapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6339: satyapi sādhanasāmarthye kālaviśeṣe ca kasyacidutpattirbhavati kasyacinneti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6352: yathā hi śīrṇānāmapi tṛṇalatādīnāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya punarāpyāyanaṃ bhavati, evameva sarveṣāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:6356: sā hi vṛṣṭivatsarvamāpyāyatīti /” sa khalvayaṃ yogī bhāgyānyavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6360: prakṛtyātmakasya tāvadyogino 'ṣṭau prakṛtayo viṣaya ityuktaṃ purastāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6381: athavā bāhya evāyaṃ kālaḥ karmakāraṇaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6382: tatra cānye 'pi svamatiparikalpitapadārthāntarātmabhāvagrahā eveti sāṅkhyāḥ pravādinaḥ pratikṣiptā boddhavyā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6383: apara āha, prakṛticaitanikaḥ pradhānabhāvāśādyupādānakālabhāgyavādino mahadahaṅkāratanmātravādina iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6385: na hi mahadahaṅkāratanmātralakṣaṇāḥ prakṛtaya upādānakālabhāgyabhāvena prasiddhāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6388: bāhyā viṣayoparamāt pañca ca nava tuṣṭayo 'bhihitāḥ // ISk_50 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6391: tatra yadārjanadoṣamavagacchati na tāvatsarvasyābhijātirastīti arthināvaśyaṃ viṣayārjane vartitavyam
GSP31yuktdipu:6394: svābhāvikamavasthānaṃ viṣayāṇāmaparikalpyāpi yadā pratigrahādibhirarjanaṃ pratyādriyate tadapyayuktam
GSP31yuktdipu:6396: evamapi nāsti kaścidapratyanīka viṣayopārjanāya iti tadvighāte 'vaśyaṃ prayatitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6409: sukhārthaṃ ca pravṛttasya bhūyiṣṭhaṃ duḥkhamevetyetasmāddarśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate, sā pañcamī
GSP31yuktdipu:6411: kathaṃ punaḥ sutāramityucyate ? sukhamanenopāyena taranti viṣayasaṃkaṭamiti sutāram /
GSP31yuktdipu:6412: yadā tu yogī pūrvadoṣādhigame 'bhijātyā vā yatnārjitaviṣayatve sati
GSP31yuktdipu:6414: katham ? bhoktṛbhogyabhāvāvyatirekāt sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇā viṣayāḥ, tasmātteṣāṃ rakṣā vidheyā
GSP31yuktdipu:6415: tasyāṃ ca pravartamāno yadi paramuparundhyāt tadā pūrvoktadoṣaḥ, athātmānaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6417: rātrindivaṃ ca tadekāgramanasaḥ sukhārthaṃ pravṛtasya bhūyiṣṭhaṃ duḥkhamevetyetasmāddarśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6419: kathaṃ punaḥ supāramityucyate ? sukhamanena pāraṃ viṣayārṇavasya prayāntīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6420: yadā tu sati pūrvadoṣe, sati vā grāmanagaranigamasanniveśādyupāyānuṣṭhānādvā kṛtaviṣayarakṣo
GSP31yuktdipu:6431: iti etasmāddarśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate, sā saptamī tuṣṭiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:6447: ityetasmād darśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate sāṣṭamī tuṣṭiḥ sumārīcamityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6448: kathaṃ sumārīcamityucyate ? arcateḥ pūjārthasya śobhanamarcitaṃ viṣayasaṃganivṛttasya yogino 'vasthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6457: striyamāsevamānenānyāsāṃ strīṇāṃ mātṛpitṛbhrātṛprabhṛtīnāṃ ca, anyathā tadabhāvo hayādīnām
GSP31yuktdipu:6458: tasmādupabhogārthināvaśyamanyopaghātaḥ kāryo nihitadaṇḍena vā viṣayopabhogastyājya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6459: āha ca yathā yathā hi viṣayo vṛddhiṃ gṛhṇāti dehinām /
GSP31yuktdipu:6466: katham ? uttamaṃ hi prāṇināṃ sarvebhyo hiṃsābhayamiti tadapagamāduttamābhayamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6471: tatra yeṣāmarjanarakṣaṇe pratyādriyate viṣayī tadarthinā pratyanīkānāmavaśyamabhighāto 'nuṣṭhātavya
GSP31yuktdipu:6472: / iha tu yeṣāmevārjanarakṣaṇe tadanupaghātenāśakyo viṣayopabhoga ityetadvivakṣitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6475: jñānināṃ tu vairāgyaparvasaṃjñitā svāsu svāsu tattvabhūmiṣu siddhā eveti // 50 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6481: tatroho nāma yadā pratyakṣānumānāgamavyatirekeṇābhipretamarthaṃ vicāraṇābalenaiva pratipadyate, sādyā siddhiḥ tārakamityapadiśyate-
GSP31yuktdipu:6483: yadā tu svayaṃ pratipattau pratihanyamāno gurūpadeśāt pratipadyate sā dvitīyā siddhiḥ sutāramityapadiśyate
GSP31yuktdipu:6485: yadā tvanyopadeśādapyasamarthaḥ pratipattumadhyayanena sādhayati sā tṛtīyā siddhiḥ tārayantamityapadiśyate
GSP31yuktdipu:6486: tadetat tāraṇakriyāyā adyatve 'pi avyāvṛtatvāt mahāviṣayatvāt tārayantamityapadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6487: ta ete trayaḥ sādhanopāyairābrāhmaṇaḥ prāṇino 'bhipretamarthaṃ prāpnuvanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6492: bilmaṃ bhāsanam- samyak pratibhāsāya viśiṣṭaḥ saṃketa uktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6496: tatra cādhyātmikānāṃ vātādīnāṃ siddhipratyanīkānāmāyurvedakriyānuṣṭhānena vighātaṃ kṛtvā pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati sā caturthī siddhiḥ pramodamityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6497: katham ? nivṛttarogā hi prāṇinaḥ pramodanta iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6498: yadā tvādhibhautikānāṃ mānuṣādinimittānāṃ siddhipratyanīkānāṃ sāmādinā yatidharmānuguṇena vopāyena pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati, sā pañcamī siddhiḥ pramuditamityabhidhīyate katham ? anudvigno hi pramudita
GSP31yuktdipu:6500: yadā tu śītādīnyādhidaivikāni dvandvāni siddhipratyanīkāni svadharmānurodhena pratihatya pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati, sā ṣaṣṭhī siddhirmodanāmamityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6501: katham ? dvandvānupahatā hi prāṇino modanta iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6502: suhṛtprāptiḥ- yadā tu kṛśalaṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sanmitramāśritya sandehanivṛttiṃ labhate, sā ramyakamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:6504: ramyo hi loke sanmitrasamparkaḥ, tasya saṃjñāyāṃ ramyameva ramyakam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6505: dānam- yadā tu daurbhāgyaṃ dānenātītya pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati sāṣṭāmī siddhiḥ sadāpramuditamityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6506: subhago hi sadāpramudito bhavati, tasmāddaurbhāgyanivṛttiḥ sadāpramuditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6508: etāsāṃ saṃśrayeṇābhipretamarthaṃ yataḥ saṃsādhayantītyataḥ pūrvācāryāgataṃ mārgamārurukṣustatpravaṇaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:6509: āha, kaḥ punaratra heturyena puruṣārthatvāviśeṣe sati guṇānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:6523: sattvarajastamasāṃ cāṅgāṅgibhāvaniyamādviparyayāśaktituṣṭibhiḥ pratihanyata iti na sarveṣāṃ sarvadā siddhirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6525: yathā ca sidddheḥ viparyayāśaktituṣṭayaḥ pratipakṣāḥ, evaṃ siddhirapi viparyayādīnām /
GSP31yuktdipu:6528: aviparītajñānaṃ viparyayamatītānāgatavartamāneṣu sannikṛṣṭeṣu viprakṛṣṭeṣu indriyagrāhyeṣvatīndriyeṣu cāpratighātādaśaktiṃ puruṣasya prakṛtivikāravyatiriktasya darśanātsarvāsu bhūmiṣu tuṣṭim /
GSP31yuktdipu:6531: āha ca yonīnāṃ sapramāṇānāṃ samyaṅmārge niyojanāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6535: evaṃ yatpūrvamapadiṣṭaṃ saṃyogakṛtaḥ sarga (ISk 21) iti tadvyākhyātam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6539: tasmādekarūpa evāyaṃ yathaivādyatve tathaivātikrāntāsvanāgatāsu kālakoṭiṣu sarga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6540: ācārya āha- naitadevam, kiṃ tarhi prākpradhānapravṛtterdharmādharmayorasambhavo buddhidharmatvāttasyāśca pradhānavikāratvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6541: tatastadvyatiriktaṃ śabdādyupalabdhiguṇalakṣaṇaṃ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ cārthamuddiśya sattvādayo mahadahaṅkāratanmātrendriyabhūtatvenāvasthāya paramarṣihiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ śarīramutpādayanti ṣaṭsiddhikṣayakālottaraṃ tu guṇavimardavaicitryādrajastamovṛttyanupāti saṃsāracakraṃ pravṛttam
GSP31yuktdipu:6542: na vinā bhāvairliṅgam devamanuṣyatiryagbhāvena vyavatiṣṭhata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6545: liṅgākhyo bhāvākhyastasmād dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ // ISk_52 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6549: yeṣāṃ tu dharmādharmaśarīrayoḥ paryāyeṇa hetuhetumadbhāvasteṣāṃ kāraṇamastyavyaktamityatra (ISk 16) prativihitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6552: katham ? yadi tāvadadhikāra evāyaṃ pradhānapravṛttaye 'lam, kiṃ dharmādharmābhyām ? atha tāvadantareṇādhikārasya pradhānapravṛttāvasāmarthyam, evamapi kimadhikāreṇa ? tayoreva pravṛttisāmarthyāt /
