GSP31yuktdipu:6554: tatra yathedaṃ śarīramavibhaktaṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣalakṣaṇāsu kriyāsu vibhaktaṃ bhavedityataḥ pāṇyādivikalpo 'sya bhavati, evaṃ sattvasargo 'pyavibhakto
GSP31yuktdipu:6568: ayaṃ tu samāsato bhautikaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_53 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6577: daivamānuṣatairyagyonā iti trividho bhūtānāṃ vikalpa upadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6586: itareṣvanantarbhāvādabhedena vopadeśaḥ kāryā na tu daivamānuṣatiraśca iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6597: sa cāyam ūrdhvaṃ sattvaviśālaḥ ūrdhvamityanenāṣṭau devasthānānyāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:6599: piśācebhyo rakṣasām, rakṣobhyo nāgānām, nāgebhyo gandharvāṇām,
GSP31yuktdipu:6600: gandharvebhyaḥ pitḥṇām, pitṛbhyastridaśānām, tebhyaḥ prajāpatīnām, tebhyo
GSP31yuktdipu:6606: tamaḥ, mṛgebhyaḥ pakṣiṇām, pakṣibhyaḥ sarīsṛpāṇām, sarīsṛpebhyaḥ sthāvarāṇām /
GSP31yuktdipu:6607: madhye rajoviśālaḥ devebhyastiryagbhyaścāvakṛṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu yathā yathā sattvatamaso nirhrāsaḥ, tathā tathā rajaso vṛddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6610: yathā ca mānuṣeṣu rajaḥprakarṣa evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthāne
GSP31yuktdipu:6616: atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prānoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6624: indriyādhiṣṭhānavikārācchabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ satāmagrahaṇamasatāṃ ca grahaṇamabhūtākāraṃ sambhavaviparītaṃ vā sarvārthānāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6625: tadyathā paurṇamāsyāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ khaṇḍasyendumaṇḍalasya piśācādīnāṃ pāṇḍarasya ca nabhasa ityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:6627: sabrahmalokeṣvapi lokeṣu trātāramavindan rāgādyanekakālātpakvenātmagraheṇātmakāryakaraṇopahyimāṇabuddhirmandamandeṣvapi smṛtipralambheṣu dayitajanasyātmanaścānusmarandaśavidhātkuṭumbādyaḥ prabhraśyate so 'yamavaśyambhāvī sarvasattvānāṃ prakṛṣṭodvegakārī cāvyutpannaścāparihāryaścāniyatakālaśca mahātmabhiḥ paramarṣyādibhirandhatāmisraśabdenāpadiṣṭo maraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkham /
GSP31yuktdipu:6629: tadapi samīkṣyoktamācāryeṇa atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6631: yathaiva hi jarāmaraṇaṃ cātmanaḥ prakṛṣṭodvegakārakamevaṃ janmāpi /
GSP31yuktdipu:6632: tathā hyayaṃ māturudare jarāyupariveṣṭitaśarīro 'medhyaparisnuto vraṇamātrāyāṃ garbhadhānyāṃ yathāsukhasambhavātparipītitagātro māturaśanādibhiḥ pīḍyamāno garbhāvāse duḥkhamanubhūya paścātsaṃvṛtenāsthidvayavivareṇa nissṛto mūtrarudhirakalilaiḥ pariṣiktagātro bāhyena vāyunā karaiśca
GSP31yuktdipu:6633: saṃsparśadasibhiriva tudyamānaḥ svasaṃvedyaṃ duḥkhamātmani vartamānamākhyātumasamarthaḥ svasukhaduḥkhasāmanyātparatra parikalpitasukhaduḥkhabuddhibhirdṛḍhagātrairupacitakleśaiśca yātyamāno janmaduḥkhamanubhavati tasmāttadapi vaktavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6635: mānuṣatiraścāmeva janmakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati na devānām /
GSP31yuktdipu:6640: na hi devasthāneṣu jarāmaraṇaṃ vā śrūyate, tasmādavyāpitvāttayorapyagrahaṇaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6649: evaṃ hyāha- “tvāṣṭrīyaṃ sāma bhavati indraṃ kṣāmamapi na sarvabhūtāni prasvāpayituṃ nāśaknuvaṃ stametena sāmnā tvāṣṭrīyeṇāsvāpayaditi /” tathā prajāpatervāyurakṣayīt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6651: tathā “prajāpatirvai somāya rājñe duhitḥradānnakṣatrāṇi, sa rohiṇyāmevāvasat /
GSP31yuktdipu:6658: / candramā vai somo rāja yadrājānaṃ yakṣmogṛhṇāttadrājayakṣmasya janma /
GSP31yuktdipu:6664: taṃ vaiśvadevena caruṇāmāvasyāṃ rātrīmayā yajante nainaṃ yakṣmodamuñcadityādi /” tasmāddevabhūmāvapi jarākṛtaṃ duḥkhamasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6667: gopathabrāhmaṇam- “devānāṃ ha vā pañcadaśaśatāni āsaṃstāni brahmakilbiṣādakṣīyanta /
GSP31yuktdipu:6670: śeṣāḥ prāsīyanteti /” śvetāraṇye cāntakasya rudreṇa kṛtaṃ duḥkhamastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6683: yataśca brahmādau stambaparyante jagati jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kaścidativartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6686: yāvadidaṃ liṅgaṃ na nivartate tāvadavaśyaṃ duḥkhena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6689: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca hi saṃśayaṃ vāreṇāyaṃ sevate tatra tatra /
GSP31yuktdipu:6697: jaratkāro pitḥṇāṃ ca garte 'valambanāt, piśācānāṃ mantrauṣadhimaṅgalaprayogairudvāsanānmānuṣatiraścāṃ pratyakṣata eva prāyeṇa duḥkhāspadatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6698: tasmānnāsti saṃsāre kaścitpradeśo yatra saha liṅgenātmānaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāvāpnuyādityata evaṃ prayatitavyaṃ yena liṅgasyaivātyantocchedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6705: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6713: pravṛtto na pravartsyati kiṃ tarhi pravartata evānantānāṃ śarīrādibhāvena parasparānugraheṇa ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6716: yathā vahanti nadyaḥ, tiṣṭhanti parvatā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6724: tatra kāryasya tāvacchabdādeḥ svārtha ivendriyāṇāṃ viṣayabhāvaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6726: karaṇānāṃ ca saṃkalpābhimānādhyavasāyānāṃ viṣayadvāribhāvopagamanaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ ca svapravṛttiviṣayatvam
GSP31yuktdipu:6728: 'haṃkārayośca buddhau svapravṛttyupasaṃhāro buddheśca śāntaghoramūḍhatvaṃ vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ ca sattarajastamasāṃ ca prakāśapravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇairdharmaiḥ parasparopakāritvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6735: teṣāṃ ca māhātmyaśarīrapradhānaṃ yadā pravartate tadetarāṇyapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:6736: tannivṛttau ca teṣāmapi nivṛttiriti paurikaḥ sāṃkhyācāryo manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6746: parimitamiti cedatha matam, parimitaṃ pradhānamiti na, ucchedaprasaṃgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6756: yattūktaṃ māhātmyaśarīrapradhānapravṛttāvitareṣāṃ pravṛtistannivṛttau nivṛttirityatra brūmaḥ- na, atiśayābhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6763: sā cediyamacetanā prakṛtirasyā apyuddiśya puruṣārthaṃ pravṛttirnopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6765: tatra yaduktaṃ pratipuruṣavimokṣārtha prakṛteḥ pravṛttiriti etadayuktamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6769: yathā kṣīramacetanaṃ vatsavivṛddhimuddiśya pravartate, evaṃ pradhānamapi puruṣavimokṣamuddiśya pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6771: sādhyatvādayuktamiti cet syānmatam, sādhyametat kiṃ kṣīrasyoddiśya
GSP31yuktdipu:6772: vatsavivṛddhiṃ pravṛttiḥ, atha neti ? tasmādudāharaṇaṃ sādhyatvādayuktamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6775: yatra nāsti vatsavivṛddhistatra na kṣīrasya pravṛttirupalabdhā
GSP31yuktdipu:6777: yadyasmin sati bhavati tasya tadarthā pravṛttirdṛṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6783: śāstraṃ tāvat sattāmātro mahān vyaktimātra ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6785: na kvacidapi kūpe salilaṃ nāstyabhivyaktaṃ na tad bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6788: dharmādharmapreritaṃ kṣīraṃ pravartate na vatsavivṛddhyarthamiti, tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6791: dharmādharmāvacetanau vivṛddhikāle kṣīraṃ pravartayatastadavasāne ca nivartayataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6793: īśvarapreraṇāditi cet syānmatam īśvarastatra kṣīraṃ pravartayate vatsārthaṃ, na svayamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:6799: vārṣagaṇānāṃ tu yathā strīpuṃśarīrāṇāmacetanānāmuddiśyetaretaraṃ pravṛttistathā pradhānasyetyayaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6800: āha, kathamavagamyate tādarthyādutpannena vyaktena puruṣasya sambandho na punaḥ sānnidhyamātrāt, bhikṣuvaditi ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6804: apravartayitāraṃ prati kāryakāraṇānāṃ pravṛttirayukteti cet syānmatam- apravartayitā kṛṣṇādīnāṃ bhikṣurato na teṣāmapi taṃ prati pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6807: vatso hi kṣīrasyāpravartayitātha ca taṃ prati tasya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6811: yadi pradhānasya puruṣakaivalyārthā pravṛttistena tadabhāve kaivalyaṃ siddhamevetyapravṛttiprasaṃgaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:6812: atha kevale puruṣe pradhānaṃ pravartate na tarhyasya tadarthā pravṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6816: dṛṣṭā coparamārthāpi lokasyautsukyanivṛttyarthā pravṛttistathā pradhānasyāpyuparamārthā pravṛttiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:6817: atha dṛśyadarśanaśaktyorautsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ pravartata ityekatra kṛtārthatvāditareṣvapravṛttiprasaṃga iti cet syādetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:6823: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6824: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6825: tatra nānāvarṇasvabhāvavijñānānāṃ prekṣārthināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ saṃghāto raṅga ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6827: yadi vātra kaścid brūyāt nṛttācāryeṇa kuśīlavairvā dṛṣṭaiveyaṃ kasmānna nivartate ? katham ? akṛtārthatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6828: evaṃ sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhenautsukyavatāṃ nirākāṃkṣīkaraṇārthaṃ pravṛttā prakṛtiḥ kathamekasya puruṣasyautsukyanivṛttau kṛtārthā syāt ? tasmānnaikasya puruṣasyātmānaṃ prakāśya prakṛternivṛttiryukteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6833: tasmādye bhautikāḥ śiraḥpāṇyādayo ye cāhaṃkārikāḥ śravaṇādayo vacanādayaḥ saṃkalpābhimānādhyavasāyāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:6835: tadetadevaṃ tattvānāmabhyāsaikāgramanaso yateḥ punaḥ punarabhyāsāt ekasyāpyasmitārūpasya parikalpitaviṣayabhedapratiṣedhamukhena
GSP31yuktdipu:6837: āprakṛteḥ pratipakṣagrahaṇāt aviparyayāt pañcasrotaso 'syāvidyāparvaṇo nivṛtteḥ śāntaṃ dhruvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:6838: sakalabhāvānubandhapratipakṣabhūtaṃ dharmādyāpyāyitasya buddhitattvasyāsandigdhamaviparītaṃ viśuddhaṃ kevalamutpadyate jñānam // ISk_64 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6843: rajastamodharmāṇāṃ tāvad grahaṇācchuddhaṃ saṃśayaviparyayavyatiriktaṃ ca kevalaṃ kṣetrajñaparijñāne 'pūrvameva iti // 64 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6854: buddhi___mupasaṃprāptā akṛtārthatvād buddhiśca pradhānaṃ tadā tiṣṭhatyayaṃ nānātvadarśī tasya saṃskārasya sāmarthyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6857: tadyathā kumbhakāraprayatnaviśiṣṭena daṇḍena ghaṭādiniṣpattiyogyakriyā cakrasya bhramaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6863: niṣpanne ghaṭe pūrvasaṃskārānurodhānna nivartate na ca tadā nivṛttamiti kṛtvā saṃskārakṣaye 'pyavatiṣṭhate, evaṃ samyagdarśanārthaṃ śarīraṃ samyagjñānādhigame 'pi na nivartate pūrvasaṃskāravaśāt na ca tadā nivṛttamiti kṛtvā saṃskārakṣaye 'pyavasthāpyata iti // 67 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6865: yadā tu saṃskārakṣaye tannimittasya śarīrasya bhedaḥ, ataḥ prāpte śarīrabhede
GSP31yuktdipu:6866: dharmādharmau kṛtārthau kāraṇe buddhilakṣaṇe layaṃ gacchataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6867: yaścāsya bhūtāvayavaḥ śarīrārambhakaḥ sa sarvabhūteṣu bhūtāni tanmātreṣu,
GSP31yuktdipu:6868: indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi cāhaṃkāre, ahaṃkāro buddhau buddhiravyakte /
GSP31yuktdipu:6869: seyaṃ tattvānupūrvī tadarthapradhānādutpannā parisamāpte punaḥ pradhāne pralayaṃ gacchatīti
GSP31yuktdipu:6870: pradhānamapyarthavaśādevāsya śarīrāṇi teṣu teṣu jātyantaraparivarteṣu karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6873: atīndriyamasaṃvedya laghu sarvatra sannihitaṃ praśastamanirmitaṃ viśuddhamakṣayaṃ niratiśayam
GSP31yuktdipu:6876: etatparaṃ brahmaṃ dhruvamamalamabhayamatra sarveṣāṃ guṇadharmāṇāṃ pratipralayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6878: etadarthaṃ brāhmaṇā dayitaputradāradhanasambandhamapahāya guruśuśrūṣāparāḥ śarīramaraṇyeṣu yātayanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6879: kathaṃ nāmaikāntikamātyantikaṃ ca kaivalyaṃ syāditi yatraivotthānaṃ śāstrasya tatraivopasaṃhāra ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ // 68
GSP31yuktdipu:6881: āha, kimarthaṃ punaridaṃ śāstraṃ kena vā pūrvaṃ prakāśitamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6883: puruṣārthārthamidam kathaṃ nāmājñānavaśāttatsaṃskāropanipatitānāṃ prāṇināmapavargaḥ syādityevamarthamidaṃ śāstraṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6891: syādetat, kathamidaṃ guhyamiti ? ucyate- kathaṃ vedaṃ guhyaṃ na syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6892: bhavāgrotpannairapi sanakasanātanasanandanasanatkumāraprabhṛtibhiranityānāṃ sthityutpattipralayāścintyante ca yatra bhūtānām // ISk_69 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6909: yāvat kiṃcidavitathaṃ bhūtaṃ tasya sarvasyeha sthityādaya ucyanta iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6918: āha, kasmai punaridaṃ śāstraṃ paramarṣiṇā prakāśitamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6931: ucyate- nākasmāt, kiṃ tarhi anukampayā pradadau /
GSP31yuktdipu:6932: ādhyātmikādhidaivikādhibhautikairduḥkhaiḥ pīḍyamānamāsurimupalabhya svātmani ca jñānasāmarthyātsati kāryakāraṇasamprayoge duḥkhānāmapravṛttiṃ parijñāya śiṣyaguṇāṃśca kathaṃ nāma yathā mama sukhaduḥkheṣu jñānopanipātātsāmyamevamāsurerapi syāttaddvāreṇānyeṣāmapi
GSP31yuktdipu:6934: yathā ca paramarṣirāsuraye tathā āsurirapi daśamāya kumārāya bhagavat-
GSP31yuktdipu:6935: pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6937: asya tu śāstrasya bhagavato 'gre pravṛttatvānna śāstrāntaravad vaṃśaḥ śakyo varṣaśatasahasrairapyākhyātum kārikā 71
GSP31yuktdipu:6941: pūrvācāryasūtraprabandhe gurulāghavamanādriyamāṇaḥ paurastyānyākhyānavyā___na garbhamatipramādaṃ dadātīti granthabhūyastvamupajāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6942: taccedānīntanaiḥ prāṇibhiralpatvādāyuṣo granthata eva na sūpapādaṃ kiṃ punaḥ śravaṇaprayogābhyām
GSP31yuktdipu:6944: caturbhiḥ prakārairvidyā sūpayuktā bhavati- āgamakālena svādhyāyakālena prayogakālena ca
GSP31yuktdipu:6946: ityasya mandadhiyāmapyāśu grahaṇadhāraṇaprayogasampatsyāditi ṣaṣṭitantrādupākhyānagāthāvyavahitāni vākyānyekata upamṛdya śiṣyānukampārthaṃ yāvat īśvarakṛṣṇena caitadāryābhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6947: saptatyā saṃkṣiptamāryamatinā sarvasattvahitapravṛttena samyag vijñāya siddhāntam // ISk_71
GSP31yuktdipu:6948: kathaṃ cāsya samyaksiddhāntavijñānasyāpyanekagranthaśatasahasrākhyeyaṃ sāṃkhyapadārthaṃ satattvamakhaṇḍamācāryāṇāṃ saptatyā saṃkṣiptavān // 71 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6953: yataśca nārāyaṇamanujanakavaśiṣṭhadvaipāyanapravṛttibhirācāryaiḥ pradhānapuruṣādayaḥ padārthāḥ parigṛhītāścopadiṣṭāśca praśastāścātaḥ svabhāvataḥ prasiddhamaiśvaryasya phalata ṛddhyā āryamārgamalaṃkartumiti bhagavadīśvarakṛṣṇena padārthasvarūpanirūpaṇanipuṇasāramatinā paramarṣyādiyathoktāgamena pramāṇatrayaṃ puraskṛtya tarkadṛśā vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6960: sphuṭābhidheyā madhurāpi bhāratī manīṣiṇo nopakhalaṃ virājate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6962: nayanti santaśca yataḥ svaśaktito guṇaṃ pareṣāṃ tanumapyudāratām /
GSP31yuktdipu:6963: iti prayātveṣa mama śramaḥ satāṃ vicāraṇānugrahamātrapātratām //
GSP31yuktdipu:6964: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau caturthaṃ prakaraṇamekādaśaṃ cāhnikaṃ sampūrṇam
